trans-unit.source: The MerchantValidationEvent method complete() takes merchant-specific information previously received from the validationURL and uses it to validate the merchant. All you have to do is call complete() from your handler for the merchantvalidation event, passing in the data fetched from the validationURL.
trans-unit.target: 该 MerchantValidationEvent 方法 complete() 需要预先从接收到的商家专用信息 validationURL 并使用它来验证商家。您所需要做的就是从您的处理程序中调用 merchantvalidation 事件的 complete() ，并传入从 validationURL 获取的数据。

trans-unit.source: The MerchantValidationEvent property methodName is a read-only value which returns a string indicating the payment method identifier which represents the payment handler that requires merchant validation.
trans-unit.target: 所述 MerchantValidationEvent 属性 methodName 是一个只读值返回一个字符串，表示其表示需要商家确认所述支付处理程序支付方法标识符。

trans-unit.source: The MerchantValidationEvent property validationURL is a read-only string value providing the URL from which to fetch the payment handler-specific data needed to validate the merchant.
trans-unit.target: 该 MerchantValidationEvent 财产 validationURL 是提供从中获取验证商家需要支付处理特定数据的URL只读字符串值。

trans-unit.source: The MouseEvent this method belongs to.
trans-unit.target: 此方法所属的 MouseEvent 。

trans-unit.source: The MutationObserver method disconnect() tells the observer to stop watching for mutations. The observer can be reused by calling its observe() method again.
trans-unit.target: 该 MutationObserver 方法 disconnect() 告诉观察者驻足观望的突变。可以通过再次调用其 observe() 方法来重用观察者。

trans-unit.source: The MutationObserver method observe() configures the MutationObserver callback to begin receiving notifications of changes to the DOM that match the given options. Depending on the configuration, the observer may watch a single Node in the DOM tree, or that node and some or all of its descendant nodes.
trans-unit.target: 该 MutationObserver 方法 observe() 配置 MutationObserver 回调开始接收的变化的通知，以匹配给定的选项的DOM。根据配置，观察者可以观察DOM树中的单个 Node ，也可以观察该节点以及它的一些或全部后代节点。

trans-unit.source: The MutationObserver method takeRecords() returns a list of all matching DOM changes that have been detected but not yet processed by the observer's callback function, leaving the mutation queue empty. The most common use case for this is to immediately fetch all pending mutation records immediately prior to disconnecting the observer, so that any pending mutations can be processed when stopping down the observer.
trans-unit.target: 该 MutationObserver 方法 takeRecords() 返回已检测到但尚未被观察者的回调函数处理的所有匹配的DOM更改的列表，离开队列清空突变。最常见的用例是在断开观察者连接之前立即获取所有未决的突变记录，以便在停止观察者时可以处理任何未决的突变。

trans-unit.source: The Node at the specified index, or null if index is less than zero or greater than or equal to the length property.
trans-unit.target: 的 Node 指定的索引，或者在 null 如果 index 小于零或大于或等于长度属性。

trans-unit.source: The Node before which the Range should start.
trans-unit.target: 该 Node 之前，其 Range 应该开始。

trans-unit.source: The Node interface it belongs to.
trans-unit.target: 它所属的 Node 接口。

trans-unit.source: The Node to compare with the Range.
trans-unit.target: 与 Range 比较的 Node 。

trans-unit.source: The Node to end the Range after.
trans-unit.target: 之后结束 Range 的 Node 。

trans-unit.source: The Node to end the Range before.
trans-unit.target: 结束 Range 的 Node 之前。

trans-unit.source: The Node to insert at the start of the range.
trans-unit.target: 该 Node 以在开始插入 range 。

trans-unit.source: The Node to select within a Range.
trans-unit.target: 在 Range. 选择的 Node 。

trans-unit.source: The Node to start the Range after.
trans-unit.target: 之后要启动 Range 的 Node 。

trans-unit.source: The Node to use as the root of the DOM tree or subtree for which to construct an XML representation.
trans-unit.target: 要用作为其构建XML表示形式的DOM树或子树的根的 Node 。

trans-unit.source: The Node where the Range should end.
trans-unit.target: 该 Node 在 Range 应该结束。

trans-unit.source: The Node where the Range should start.
trans-unit.target: 该 Node 在 Range 应该开始。

trans-unit.source: The Node whose contents will be selected within a Range.
trans-unit.target: 将在 Range 内选择其内容的 Node 。

trans-unit.source: The NonDocumentTypeChildNode pure interface.
trans-unit.target: 该 NonDocumentTypeChildNode 纯接口。

trans-unit.source: The Notifications API lets a web page or app send notifications that are displayed outside the page at the system level; this lets web apps send information to a user even if the application is idle or in the background. This article looks at the basics of using this API in your own apps.
trans-unit.target: 该通知API允许一个网页或显示在系统级的页面之外的应用程序发送通知; 这样，即使应用程序处于空闲状态或在后台，Web应用程序也可以将信息发送给用户。本文介绍了在您自己的应用中使用此API的基础知识。

trans-unit.source: The OscillatorNode comes with basic waveforms out of the box — sine, square, triangle or sawtooth. However, instead of using the standard waves that come by default, we're going to create our own using the PeriodicWave interface and values set in a wavetable. We can use the BaseAudioContext.createPeriodicWave method to use this custom wave with an oscillator.
trans-unit.target: 所述 OscillatorNode 自带开箱基本波形-正弦波，方波，三角波或锯齿波。但是，我们将不使用默认提供的标准波形，而是使用 PeriodicWave 接口和在波形表中设置的值来创建自己的波形。我们可以使用 BaseAudioContext.createPeriodicWave 方法将此自定义波与振荡器一起使用。

trans-unit.source: The coneInnerAngle and coneOuterAngle properties specify where the volume emanates from. By default, both are 360 degrees. Our boombox speakers will have smaller cones, which we can define. The inner cone is where gain (volume) is always emulated at a maximum and the outer cone is where the gain starts to drop away. The gain is reduced by the value of the coneOuterGain value. Let's create constants that store the values we'll use for these parameters later on:
trans-unit.target: 该 coneInnerAngle 和 coneOuterAngle 属性指定音量从发出。默认情况下，两者均为360度。我们的音箱可以定义较小的音盆。内锥体是始终最大模拟增益（体积）的地方，而外锥体是增益开始下降的地方。增益会根据 coneOuterGain 增益值的值减小。让我们创建一个常量来存储稍后将用于这些参数的值：

trans-unit.source: The ParentNode and ChildNode interfaces.
trans-unit.target: 该 ParentNode 和 ChildNode 接口。

trans-unit.source: The ParentNode and ChildNode pure interfaces.
trans-unit.target: 该 ParentNode 和 ChildNode 纯接口。

trans-unit.source: The ParentNode mixin defines the querySelector() method as returning an Element representing the first element matching the specified group of selectors which are descendants of the object on which the method was called.
trans-unit.target: 所述 ParentNode 混入定义 querySelector() 方法为返回一个 Element 代表选择器，其是在其上被调用的方法的对象的后代的指定的组相匹配的第一个元素。

trans-unit.source: The ParentNode mixin defines the querySelectorAll() method as returning a NodeList representing a list of elements matching the specified group of selectors which are descendants of the object on which the method was called.
trans-unit.target: 所述 ParentNode 混入定义 querySelectorAll() 方法为返回一个 NodeList 表示匹配选择器，其是在其上被调用的方法的对象的后代的指定组的元素的列表。

trans-unit.source: The ParentNode property children is a read-only property that returns a live HTMLCollection which contains all of the child elements of the node upon which it was called.
trans-unit.target: 该 ParentNode 物业 children 是一个只读属性，返回现场 HTMLCollection 其中包含所有子 elements 后，它被称为节点。

trans-unit.source: The Payment Request API makes it easy to handle payments in a web site or app. In this article, we'll take a look at how the API operates and what each of its components does.
trans-unit.target: 该付款申请API可以很容易地处理在一个网站或应用程序内支付。在本文中，我们将研究API的运行方式及其每个组件的作用。

trans-unit.source: The Payment Request API provides a browser-based method of connecting users and their preferred payment systems and platforms to merchants that they want to pay for goods and services. This article is a guide to making use of the Payment Request API, with examples and suggested best practices.
trans-unit.target: 该付款申请API为用户提供与他们的首选支付系统和平台连接到商家，他们希望支付商品和服务的基于浏览器的方法。本文是有关使用Payment Request API的指南，包括示例和建议的最佳做法。

trans-unit.source: The PaymentCurrencyAmount property currency is a string which specifies the currency in which the value is specified. The value is always specified using the 3-letter codes defined by the ISO 4127 standard.
trans-unit.target: 所述 PaymentCurrencyAmount 属性 currency 是一个字符串，它指定在其中的货币 value 被指定。该值始终使用ISO 4127标准定义的3个字母的代码指定。

trans-unit.source: The PaymentCurrencyAmount property value is a string containing the decimal numeric value of the payment, specified in the currency units indicated by the currency property. The contents of this string must be a valid decimal number; that is, some number of digits between 0 and 9 with up to one optional decimal point. An optional leading minus sign ("-") can be included to indicate a negative value, such as to represent a refund or discount.
trans-unit.target: 所述 PaymentCurrencyAmount 属性 value 是包含所述支付的十进制数值，在由指示的货币单位指定一个字符串 currency 属性。该字符串的内容必须是有效的十进制数字；也就是说，介于0到9之间的一些数字，最多可以有一个可选的小数点。可以包括可选的前导负号（“-”）来表示负值，例如代表退款或折扣。

trans-unit.source: The PaymentDetailsUpdate dictionary's shippingAddressErrors property, if present, contains an AddressErrors object whose contents provide error messages for one or more of the values in the PaymentAddress specified as PaymentRequest.shippingAddress.
trans-unit.target: 该 PaymentDetailsUpdate 字典的 shippingAddressErrors 属性，如果存在，包含一个 AddressErrors 对象，其内容以获取更多的所述值中的一个或提供错误消息 PaymentAddress 指定为 PaymentRequest.shippingAddress 。

trans-unit.source: The PaymentRequest event handler onmerchantvalidation is invoked when the merchantvalidation is fired, indicating that the payment handler (e.g., Apple Pay) requires the merchant to validate themselves. This is usually the first event to be fired, and the user won't be able to proceed with a payment until the merchant validate themselves.
trans-unit.target: 该 PaymentRequest 事件处理 onmerchantvalidation 当调用 merchantvalidation 被触发，这表明支付处理程序（例如，苹果公司支付），需要商家来验证自己。通常这是第一个要触发的事件，在商家验证自己之前，用户将无法继续付款。

trans-unit.source: The PaymentRequest event handler onpaymentmethodchange is invoked when the paymentmethodchange is fired, indicating that the user has changed payment methods within a given payment handler. For example, when using Apple Pay, the user can swipe to select different credit cards, debit cards, and so forth. Each time the user does so, this event is fired.
trans-unit.target: 该 PaymentRequest 事件处理 onpaymentmethodchange 当调用 paymentmethodchange 被触发，表明用户已经改变了某个指定的支付处理程序中的付款方式。例如，当使用Apple Pay时，用户可以滑动以选择不同的信用卡，借记卡等。每次用户这样做，都会触发此事件。

trans-unit.source: The PaymentRequest method complete() of the Payment Request API notifies the user agent that the user interaction is over, and causes any remaining user interface to be closed. This method must be called after the user accepts the payment request and the Promise returned by the PaymentRequest.show() method is resolved.
trans-unit.target: 该 PaymentRequest 方法 complete() 的的付款申请API通知所述用户代理，用户交互结束时，并且使得任何剩余的用户接口被关闭。用户接受付款请求并且由 PaymentRequest.show() 方法返回的 Promise 被解析后，必须调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: The PaymentResponse interface's reply() method makes it possible to ask the user to retry a payment after an error occurs during processing. This lets your app gracefully deal with situations such as invalid shipping addresses or declined credit cards.
trans-unit.target: 该 PaymentResponse 接口的 reply() 方法使得有可能以要求用户处理过程中出现错误之后重试付款。这样一来，您的应用就可以轻松应对诸如无效的收货地址或信用卡被拒等情况。

trans-unit.source: The PaymentResponse object's onpayerdetailchange property is an event handler which is called to handle the payerdetailchange event, which is sent to the PaymentResponse when the user makes changes to their personal information while filling out a payment request form.
trans-unit.target: 该 PaymentResponse 对象的 onpayerdetailchange 属性是事件处理程序被调用来处理该 payerdetailchange 事件，该事件被发送到 PaymentResponse 当用户更改他们的个人信息，同时填写付款申请表。

trans-unit.source: The Performance interface has a onresourcetimingbufferfull event handler that gets called (with an Event of type Event.type of "resourcetimingbufferfull") when the browser's resource performance entry buffer is full. The following code example sets a onresourcetimingbufferfull event callback in the init() function.
trans-unit.target: 该 Performance 接口有一个 onresourcetimingbufferfull 事件处理程序被调用（与 Event 类型的 Event.type 的“ resourcetimingbufferfull ”）时，浏览器的性能资源进入缓冲区已满。以下代码示例在 init() 函数中设置 onresourcetimingbufferfull 事件回调。

trans-unit.source: The Performance interface it belongs to.
trans-unit.target: 它所属的 Performance 接口。

trans-unit.source: The PerformanceNavigation interface it belongs to.
trans-unit.target: 它所属的 PerformanceNavigation 接口。

trans-unit.source: The performance observer entry list interface has the same three getEntries*() methods as the Performance interface and these methods are used to retrieve observed performance entries within the observer callback. These methods have been used in the above stated example.
trans-unit.target: 在 performance observer entry list 接口具有相同的三个 getEntries*() 方法的 Performance 接口和这些方法用于检索观察的观察者回调中表现的条目。这些方法已在上述示例中使用。

trans-unit.source: The PerformanceTiming interface it belongs to.
trans-unit.target: 它所属的 PerformanceTiming 接口。

trans-unit.source: The PerformanceTiming interface it belongs to.PerformanceTiming.fetchStart
trans-unit.target: 它所属的 PerformanceTiming 接口。 PerformanceTiming .fetchStart

trans-unit.source: The Plugin object exposes a small interface for getting information about the various plugins installed in your browser. A list of plugins is also available by entering about:plugins in the browser's Location bar.
trans-unit.target: 该 Plugin 对象公开用于获取有关安装在浏览器的各种插件信息的一小接口。也可以通过在浏览器的位置栏中输入 about:plugins 来获得插件列表。

trans-unit.source: The identifier for a pointer event.
trans-unit.target: 该 identifier 用于一个 pointer event 。

trans-unit.source: The Position interface it belongs to.
trans-unit.target: 它所属的 Position 接口。

trans-unit.source: The Position interface, which is the top-level interface used to return geolocation data from the Geolocation API functions Geolocation.getCurrentPosition() and watchPosition().
trans-unit.target: 的 Position 接口，这是用来从地理位置API函数返回地理位置数据的顶级接口 Geolocation.getCurrentPosition() 和 watchPosition() 。

trans-unit.source: The PositionError interface it belongs to.
trans-unit.target: 它所属的 PositionError 接口。

trans-unit.source: The PositionOptions interface it belongs to.
trans-unit.target: 它所属的 PositionOptions 接口。

trans-unit.source: The ProgressEvent interface it belongs to.
trans-unit.target: 它所属的 ProgressEvent 接口。

trans-unit.source: The PromiseRejectionEvent interface's promise read-only property indicates the JavaScript Promise which was rejected. You can examine the event's PromiseRejectionEvent.reason property to learn why the promise was rejected.
trans-unit.target: 该 PromiseRejectionEvent 接口的 promise 只读属性表示JavaScript的 Promise 这遭到了拒绝。您可以检查事件的 PromiseRejectionEvent.reason 属性，以了解为什么拒绝了承诺。

trans-unit.source: The Range object that will be returned.
trans-unit.target: 将返回的 Range 对象。

trans-unit.source: The ReadableStream that is the source of the media segment data you want to append to the SourceBuffer.
trans-unit.target: 该 ReadableStream 是要追加到媒体段数据的来源 SourceBuffer 。

trans-unit.source: The ReadableStream to be controlled.
trans-unit.target: 要控制的 ReadableStream 。

trans-unit.source: The ReadableStream to be read.
trans-unit.target: 要读取的 ReadableStream 。

trans-unit.source: The Request want to return, if a specific key is desired.
trans-unit.target: 该 Request 希望返回，如果一个特定的密钥需要。

trans-unit.source: The Request you are attempting to find in the Cache.
trans-unit.target: 您尝试在 Cache 中找到的 Request 。

trans-unit.source: The Request you are attempting to find in the Cache. This can be a Request object or a URL.
trans-unit.target: 您尝试在 Cache 中找到的 Request 。这可以是 Request 对象或URL。

trans-unit.source: The Request you are looking to delete.
trans-unit.target: 您要删除的 Request 。

trans-unit.source: The Request you want to add to the cache.
trans-unit.target: 您要添加到缓存的 Request 。

trans-unit.source: The Request you want to match. This can be a Request object or a URL string.
trans-unit.target: 您要匹配的 Request 。这可以是 Request 对象或URL字符串。

trans-unit.source: The Response you want to match up to the request.
trans-unit.target: 该 Response 要匹配的请求。

trans-unit.source: The Response() constructor takes two optional arguments — a body for the response, and an init object (similar to the one that Request() accepts.)
trans-unit.target: 的 Response() 构造函数有两个可选的参数- （类似于一个用于响应的主体，和一个init对象 Request() 。接受）

trans-unit.source: The RTCDataChannel interface is a feature of the WebRTC API which lets you open a channel between two peers over which you may send and receive arbitrary data. The API is intentionally similar to the WebSocket API, so that the same programming model can be used for each.
trans-unit.target: 该 RTCDataChannel 接口是一个功能的WebRTC API，它可以让你打开两个同伴在你可以发送和接收任意数据之间的通道。该API有意类似于WebSocket API，因此可以对每个API使用相同的编程模型。

trans-unit.source: The RTCDTMFSender interface's toneBuffer property returns a string containing a list of the DTMF tones currently queued for sending to the remote peer over the RTCPeerConnection. To place tones into the buffer, call insertDTMF().
trans-unit.target: 该 RTCDTMFSender 接口的toneBuffer属性返回包含列表的字符串DTMF音当前排队等待发送到在远程节点 RTCPeerConnection 。要将音调放入缓冲区，请调用 insertDTMF() 。

trans-unit.source: The RTCDTMFSender object for the connection. This will be obtained while setting up the connection, in the gotStream() function shown in Adding the audio to the connection.
trans-unit.target: 用于连接的 RTCDTMFSender 对象。这将在建立连接时获得，如将音频添加到连接中所示的 gotStream() 函数中。

trans-unit.source: The RTCIceCandidate method toJSON() converts the RTCIceCandidate on which it's called into JSON in the form of an RTCIceCandidateInit object.
trans-unit.target: 该 RTCIceCandidate 方法 toJSON() 转换 RTCIceCandidate 在其上，它被称为成JSON在一个形式 RTCIceCandidateInit 对象。

trans-unit.source: The RTCIceServer dictionary's credential property is a string providing the credential to use when connecting to the described server. This is typically a password, key, or other secret.
trans-unit.target: 该 RTCIceServer 字典的 credential 属性是连接到服务器的描述时，提供的凭证使用的字符串。这通常是密码，密钥或其他机密。

trans-unit.source: The RTCIceServer dictionary's credentialType property is a string value from the RTCIceCredentialType enum which indicates what type of credential the RTCIceServer.credential value is. The default is "password".
trans-unit.target: 该 RTCIceServer 字典的 credentialType 属性是从一个字符串值 RTCIceCredentialType 枚举指示证书的类型是什么 RTCIceServer.credential 值。默认值为“密码”。

trans-unit.source: The RTCIceServer dictionary's urls property specifies the URL or URLs of the servers to be used for ICE negotiations. These are typically STUN and/or TURN servers.
trans-unit.target: 该 RTCIceServer 字典的 urls 属性指定的URL或用于ICE谈判服务器的网址。这些通常是STUN和/或TURN服务器。

trans-unit.source: The RTCIceServer dictionary's username property is a string which specifies the username to use when authenticating with the ICE server being described.
trans-unit.target: 该 RTCIceServer 词典的 username 属性是一个字符串与身份验证时，指定的用户名使用ICE所描述的服务器。

trans-unit.source: The RTCIceTransport interface's onselectedcandidatepairchange event handler specifies a function to be called to handle the selectedcandidatepairchange event, which is fired when the ICE agent selects a new candidate pair to be used for the connection.
trans-unit.target: 该 RTCIceTransport 接口的 onselectedcandidatepairchange 事件处理程序指定要调用的函数来处理 selectedcandidatepairchange 情况下，当ICE代理选择一个新的候选对要用于连接该被激发。

trans-unit.source: The RTCIceTransport is currently gathering local candidates, or is waiting for the remote device to begin to transmit the remote candidates, or both. In this state, checking of candidates to look for those which might be acceptable has not yet begun.
trans-unit.target: 所述 RTCIceTransport 目前收集本地的候选，或正在等待远程设备开始传输远程候选，或两者。在这种状态下，尚未开始检查候选人以寻找可以接受的候选人。

trans-unit.source: The RTCIceTransport is found by getting the list of RTCRtpSender objects for the RTCPeerConnectionpc. In the first RTCRtpSender, we get the RTCDtlsTransport over which the media data is being transmitted and finally, from that, the RTCIceTransport.
trans-unit.target: 该 RTCIceTransport 是通过获取的列表中找到 RTCRtpSender 为对象 RTCPeerConnection pc 。在第一 RTCRtpSender ，我们得到了 RTCDtlsTransport 在该媒体正在传输数据，最后，来自中， RTCIceTransport 。

trans-unit.source: The RTCIceTransport is newly created and has not yet started to gather ICE candidates.
trans-unit.target: 该 RTCIceTransport 是新建的，且尚未开始收集ICE候选人。

trans-unit.source: The RTCIceTransport method getSelectedCandidatePair() returns an RTCIceCandidatePair object containing the current best-choice pair of ICE candidates describing the configuration of the endpoints of the transport.
trans-unit.target: 该 RTCIceTransport 方法 getSelectedCandidatePair() 返回一个 RTCIceCandidatePair 包含当前最佳选择对对象ICE描述传输的端点的配置候补。

trans-unit.source: The RTCIceTransport object is serving as the controlling agent.
trans-unit.target: 所述 RTCIceTransport 对象被用作控制剂。

trans-unit.source: The RTCPeerConnection is closed.
trans-unit.target: 该 RTCPeerConnection 关闭。

trans-unit.source: The RTCPeerConnection method addTransceiver() creates a new RTCRtpTransceiver and adds it to the set of transceivers associated with the RTCPeerConnection. Each transceiver represents a bidirectional stream, with both an RTCRtpSender and an RTCRtpReceiver associated with it.
trans-unit.target: 该 RTCPeerConnection 方法 addTransceiver() 创建一个新的 RTCRtpTransceiver 并将其添加到所述一组与相关联的收发器 RTCPeerConnection 。每个收发器代表一个双向流，同时具有一个 RTCRtpSender 和一个 RTCRtpReceiver 。

trans-unit.source: The RTCPeerConnection method getSenders() returns an array of RTCRtpSender objects, each of which represents the RTP sender responsible for transmitting one track's data. A sender object provides methods and properties for examining and controlling the encoding and transmission of the track's data.
trans-unit.target: 该 RTCPeerConnection 方法 getSenders() 返回的数组 RTCRtpSender 对象，其中每一个代表负责发送一个磁道的数据的RTP发送者。发送方对象提供用于检查和控制轨道数据的编码和传输的方法和属性。

trans-unit.source: The RTCPeerConnection method getStats() returns a promise which resolves with data providing statistics about either the overall connection or about the specified MediaStreamTrack.
trans-unit.target: 该 RTCPeerConnection 方法 getStats() 返回它解决一个承诺数据提供关于任一的整体连接或有关指定的统计 MediaStreamTrack 。

trans-unit.source: The RTCPeerConnection method addTrack() adds a new media track to the set of tracks which will be transmitted to the other peer.
trans-unit.target: 该 RTCPeerConnection 方法 addTrack() 增加了一个新的媒体轨道到将被发送到其它对等体的集合磁道。

trans-unit.source: The RTCPeerConnection objects representing the caller and the receiver, respectively. These will be initialized when the call starts up, in our connectAndDial() function, as shown in Starting the connection process below.
trans-unit.target: 所述 RTCPeerConnection 对象表示呼叫者和接收机，分别。这些将在调用开始时在我们的 connectAndDial() 函数中初始化，如下面的启动连接过程所示。

trans-unit.source: The RTCPeerConnection property ontrack is an EventHandler which specifies a function to be called when the track event occurs, indicating that a track has been added to the RTCPeerConnection. The function receives as input the event object, of type RTCTrackEvent; this event is sent when a new incoming MediaStreamTrack has been created and associated with an RTCRtpReceiver object which has been added to the set of receivers on connection.
trans-unit.target: 所述 RTCPeerConnection 属性 ontrack 是一个 EventHandler ，当被调用指定的函数 track 事件发生时，指示轨道已被添加到该 RTCPeerConnection 。该函数接收 RTCTrackEvent 类型的事件对象作为输入；创建新的传入 MediaStreamTrack 并将其与 RTCRtpReceiver 对象相关联时发送此事件，该对象已添加到连接时的接收者集中。

trans-unit.source: The RTCPeerConnection was instantiated without specifying any ICE servers. If, for example, the RTCPeerConnection() constructor was called with no parameters, you would have to then call setConfiguration() to add ICE servers before ICE negotiation could begin.
trans-unit.target: 在不指定任何ICE服务器的情况下实例化了 RTCPeerConnection 。例如，如果调用 RTCPeerConnection() 构造函数时不带任何参数，则必须先调用 setConfiguration() 来添加ICE服务器，然后才能开始ICE协商。

trans-unit.source: The RTCRtpReceiver method getStats() asynchronously requests an RTCStatsReport object which provides statistics about incoming traffic on the owning RTCPeerConnection, returning a Promise whose fulfillment handler will be called once the results are available.
trans-unit.target: 该 RTCRtpReceiver 方法 getStats() 异步请求的 RTCStatsReport 对象，它提供统计信息在拥有传入流量 RTCPeerConnection ，返回一个 Promise ，其履行处理程序将被调用一次的结果是可用的。

trans-unit.source: The RTCRtpReceiver which is being used to receive the track's media.
trans-unit.target: 该 RTCRtpReceiver 正在使用接收轨道的媒体。

trans-unit.source: The RTCRtpSender method getStats() asynchronously requests an RTCStatsReport object which provides statistics about outgoing traffic on the RTCPeerConnection which owns the sender, returning a Promise which is fulfilled when the results are available.
trans-unit.target: 该 RTCRtpSender 方法 getStats() 异步地请求一个 RTCStatsReport 对象，它提供在大约传出通信统计 RTCPeerConnection 拥有该寄件人，返回一个 Promise 当结果是可以得到满足。

trans-unit.source: The RTCRtpSender method replaceTrack() replaces the track currently being used as the sender's source with a new MediaStreamTrack. The new track must be of the same media kind (audio, video, etc) and switching the track should not require negotiation.
trans-unit.target: 该 RTCRtpSender 方法 replaceTrack() 代替当前正被用作发送者的一个新的源轨迹 MediaStreamTrack 。新曲目必须是相同的媒体类型（音频，视频等），并且切换曲目无需协商。

trans-unit.source: The RTCRtpSender object which will be used to transmit the media data.
trans-unit.target: 该 RTCRtpSender 将被用于传输媒体数据对象。

trans-unit.source: The RTCRtpStreamStats dictionary's codecId property is a string which uniquely identifies the object that was inspected to produce the data in the RTCCodecStats for the RTP stream.
trans-unit.target: 该 RTCRtpStreamStats 字典的 codecId 属性是唯一地标识了检查，以产生在数据中的对象的字符串 RTCCodecStats 用于RTP流。

trans-unit.source: The RTCRtpStreamStats dictionary's ssrc property is an integer which uniquely identifies the source of the RTP packets whose statistics are covered by the RTCStatsReport that includes this RTCRtpStreamStats dictionary.
trans-unit.target: 该 RTCRtpStreamStats 字典的 ssrc 属性是唯一地标识的源的整数RTP报文统计由覆盖 RTCStatsReport 包括该 RTCRtpStreamStats 字典。

trans-unit.source: The RTCRtpStreamStats dictionary's transportId property is a string which uniquely identifies the object from which the statistics contained in the RTCTransportStats properties in the RTCStatsReport.
trans-unit.target: 该 RTCRtpStreamStats 字典的 transportId 属性是其唯一地标识从其中包含在统计信息的对象的字符串 RTCTransportStats 在属性 RTCStatsReport 。

trans-unit.source: The RTCRtpStreamStats dictionary's trackId property is a string which uniquely identifies the RTCMediaStreamTrackStats object which contains the track statistics for the MediaStreamTrack for which statistics are provided in this object.
trans-unit.target: 该 RTCRtpStreamStats 字典的 trackId 属性是唯一标识字符串 RTCMediaStreamTrackStats 其中包含了跟踪统计对象 MediaStreamTrack 对于在这个对象提供的统计数据。

trans-unit.source: The RTCRtpTransceiver associated with the event.
trans-unit.target: 与事件关联的 RTCRtpTransceiver 。

trans-unit.source: The RTCRtpTransceiver associated with the sender has a RTCRtpReceiver whose track property specifies a MediaStreamTrack whose kind is the same as the kind of the track parameter specified when calling RTCPeerConnection.addTrack(). This ensures that a transceiver only handles audio or video and never both.
trans-unit.target: 与发送方关联的 RTCRtpTransceiver 具有一个 RTCRtpReceiver ,其 track 属性指定一个 MediaStreamTrack ,其 kind 与调用 RTCPeerConnection.addTrack() 时指定的 track 参数的 kind 相同。这样可以确保收发器仅处理音频或视频，而不能同时处理两者。

trans-unit.source: The RTCRtpTransceiver method setCodecPreferences() configures the transceiver's codecs given a list of RTCRtpCodecParameters objects specifying the new preferences for each codec. The specified set of codecs and configurations will be used for all future connections including this transceiver until this method is called again.
trans-unit.target: 在给定 RTCRtpCodecParameters 对象列表的情况下， RTCRtpTransceiver 方法 setCodecPreferences() 配置收发器的编解码器，为每个编解码器指定新的首选项。指定的编解码器和配置集将用于所有将来的连接，包括此收发器，直到再次调用此方法为止。

trans-unit.source: The RTCRtpTransceiver which pairs the receiver with a sender and other properties which establish a single bidirectional SRTP stream for use by the track associated with the RTCTrackEvent.
trans-unit.target: 所述 RTCRtpTransceiver 其对所述 receiver 与发送器和其它性质，这建立了单个双向SRTP流使用由 track 与相关联的 RTCTrackEvent 。

trans-unit.source: The RTCRtpTransceiver which pairs the receiver with a sender and other properties which establish a single bidirectional SRTP stream for use by the track associated with the RTCTrackEvent.
trans-unit.target: 所述 RTCRtpTransceiver 其对所述 receiver 与发送器和其它性质，这建立了单个双向SRTP流使用由 track 与相关联的 RTCTrackEvent 。

trans-unit.source: The RTCSessionDescription specified by the sessionDescription parameter is invalid.
trans-unit.target: sessionDescription 参数指定的 RTCSessionDescription 无效。

trans-unit.source: The RTCStats dictionary's property type is a string which specifies the type of statistic represented by the object, where the permitted values are drawn from the enum type RTCStatsType. The string can be used to determine which of the RTCStats-based dictionaries are the foundation of the statistics object.
trans-unit.target: 该 RTCStats 字典的属性 type 是一个字符串，它指定该对象，其中，所述允许值从枚举类型绘制表示统计信息的类型 RTCStatsType 。该字符串可用于确定哪些基于 RTCStats 的词典是统计对象的基础。

trans-unit.source: The RTCTrackEventInit dictionary's receiver property specifies the RTCRtpReceiver associated with the event.
trans-unit.target: 该 RTCTrackEventInit 字典的 receiver 属性指定 RTCRtpReceiver 与事件相关联。

trans-unit.source: The RTCTrackEventInit dictionary's track property specifies the MediaStreamTrack associated with the track event.
trans-unit.target: 该 RTCTrackEventInit 字典的 track 属性指定 MediaStreamTrack 与相关的 track 事件。

trans-unit.source: The RTCTrackEventInit dictionary's optional streams property provides an array containing a MediaStream object for each of the streams associated with the event's track.
trans-unit.target: 该 RTCTrackEventInit 字典的可选 streams 属性提供了含有一个阵列 MediaStream 对于每个与该事件的轨道相关联的流的对象。

trans-unit.source: The Screen.lockOrientation() accepts a string (or series of strings) to define the kind of lock to apply. Accepted values are: portrait-primary, portrait-secondary, landscape-primary, landscape-secondary, portrait, landscape (See Screen.lockOrientation to know more about each of those values).
trans-unit.target: 该 Screen.lockOrientation() 接受一个字符串（或一系列的字符串）来定义类型的锁适用的。可接受的值包括： portrait-primary ， portrait-secondary ， landscape-primary ， landscape-secondary ， portrait ， landscape （请参阅 Screen.lockOrientation 以了解有关这些值的更多信息）。

trans-unit.source: The SharedWorker interface it belongs to.
trans-unit.target: 它所属的 SharedWorker 接口。

trans-unit.source: The SourceBuffer is not a member of the parent media source's sourceBuffers list, or the buffer's updating property indicates that a previously queued appendBuffer() or remove() is still being processed.
trans-unit.target: 该 SourceBuffer 不是父媒体源的任何成员 sourceBuffers 列表，或者该缓冲区的 updating 属性指示先前排队 appendBuffer() 或 remove() 仍在处理。

trans-unit.source: The SourceBuffer method changeType() sets the MIME type that future calls to appendBuffer() should expect the new media data to conform to. This makes it possible to change codecs or container type mid-stream.
trans-unit.target: 该 SourceBuffer 方法 changeType() 设置MIME类型，未来的呼叫 appendBuffer() 应该期望新媒体数据符合。这样就可以在中间更改编解码器或容器类型。

trans-unit.source: The SourceBuffer object is being updated (i.e. its SourceBuffer.updating property is currently true), the last media segment appended to this SourceBuffer is incomplete, or this SourceBuffer has been removed from the MediaSource.
trans-unit.target: 所述 SourceBuffer 对象被更新（即，其 SourceBuffer.updating 属性是目前 true ），附加到最后一个媒体段 this SourceBuffer是不完整的，或该 SourceBuffer 已经从除去 MediaSource 的。

trans-unit.source: The SourceBuffer object to be removed.
trans-unit.target: 要删除的 SourceBuffer 对象。

trans-unit.source: The SpeechRecognitionResultList object is not an array, but it has a getter that allows it to be accessed by array syntax.
trans-unit.target: 所述 SpeechRecognitionResultList 对象是不是一个数组，但它有一个吸气允许其通过数组的语法来访问。

trans-unit.source: The Storage.getItem() method is used to get a data item from storage; in this case, we are testing to see whether the bgcolor item exists; if not, we run populateStorage() to add the existing customization values to the storage. If there are already values there, we run setStyles() to update the page styling with the stored values.
trans-unit.target: 所述 Storage.getItem() 方法被用来获得从存储的数据项; 在这种情况下，我们正在测试以查看 bgcolor 项是否存在；如果没有，我们运行 populateStorage() 将现有的自定义值添加到存储中。如果那里已经有值，我们运行 setStyles() 来使用存储的值更新页面样式。

trans-unit.source: The Storage Access API should be used by embedded cross-origin documents to verify whether they have access to their first-party storage and, if not, to request access. We’ll briefly look at a common storage access scenario.
trans-unit.target: 该存储访问API应该通过嵌入跨源文件使用，以验证他们是否有访问他们的第一方存储，如果没有，则请求访问。我们将简要介绍一个常见的存储访问方案。

trans-unit.source: The StorageEstimate dictionary's quota property is a conservative approximation of how much storage is allotted to the origin or Web app that called StorageManager.estimate(); there may be more space available, but there will not be less. This value is an estimate to help prevent its use for fingerprinting—that is, identifying a device using an amalgamation of the values of seemingly innocuous properties.
trans-unit.target: 该 StorageEstimate 字典的 quota 财产的多少存储空间分配给原产地或Web应用程序，叫做保守近似 StorageManager.estimate() ;可能会有更多的可用空间，但不会更少。此值是一个估计值，有助于防止其用于指纹识别-即使用看似无害的属性值的组合来识别设备。

trans-unit.source: The StorageEstimate dictionary's usage property is a conservative approximation of how much storage is allotted to the origin or Web app that called StorageManager.estimate(); there may be more space available, but there will not be less. The value is an estimate because the user agent may use compression, duplication prevention techniques, and other methods to improve storage efficiency.
trans-unit.target: 该 StorageEstimate 词典的 usage 性质是多少存储空间分配给原产地或Web应用程序，叫做保守近似 StorageManager.estimate() ;可能会有更多的可用空间，但不会更少。该值是估计值，因为用户代理可以使用压缩，复制防止技术和其他方法来提高存储效率。

trans-unit.source: The StorageEvent is fired whenever a change is made to the Storage object (note that this event is not fired for sessionStorage changes). This won't work on the same page that is making the changes — it is really a way for other pages on the domain using the storage to sync any changes that are made. Pages on other domains can't access the same storage objects.
trans-unit.target: 该 StorageEvent 每当一个变化是对由被激发 Storage 对象（注意，此事件不解雇的sessionStorage改变）。这将无法在进行更改的同一页面上进行-实际上，这是域中其他页面使用存储来同步所做的任何更改的一种方式。其他域上的页面无法访问相同的存储对象。

trans-unit.source: The Streams API adds a very useful set of tools to the web platform, providing objects allowing JavaScript to programmatically access streams of data received over the network and process them as desired by the developer. Some of the concepts and terminology associated with streams might be new to you — this article explains all you need to know.
trans-unit.target: 该流API增加了工具一组非常有用的网络平台，提供了允许JavaScript通过网络接收到的数据的编程访问流对象和由开发商根据需要对其进行处理。与流相关的一些概念和术语可能对您来说并不新鲜-本文介绍了您需要了解的所有知识。

trans-unit.source: The Text interface it belongs to.
trans-unit.target: 它所属的 Text 接口。

trans-unit.source: The TextDecoder interface it belongs to.
trans-unit.target: 它所属的 TextDecoder 接口。

trans-unit.source: The TextEncoder interface it belongs to.
trans-unit.target: 它所属的 TextEncoder 接口。

trans-unit.source: The Touch interface represents a single contact point on a touch-sensitive device. The contact point is typically referred to as a touch point or just a touch. A touch is usually generated by a finger or stylus on a touchscreen, pen or trackpad. A touch point's properties include a unique identifier, the touch point's target element as well as the X and Y coordinates of the touch point's position relative to the viewport, page, and screen.
trans-unit.target: 所述 Touch 接口表示一个接触点触敏设备上。接触点通常称为接触点或仅仅是触摸。触摸通常是由手指或手写笔在触摸屏，笔或触控板上产生的。触摸点的属性包括唯一标识符，触摸点的目标元素以及触摸点相对于视口，页面和屏幕的位置的X和Y坐标。

trans-unit.source: The touch interfaces enable applications to create enhanced user experiences on touch enabled devices. However, the reality is the vast majority of today's web content is designed only to work with mouse input. Consequently, even if a browser supports touch, the browser must still emulate mouse events so content that assumes mouse-only input will work as is without direct modification.
trans-unit.target: 该 touch 接口使应用程序能够创建增强用户体验的触摸功能的设备。但是，现实情况是，当今的绝大多数Web内容仅设计用于鼠标输入。因此，即使浏览器支持触摸，浏览器仍必须模拟鼠标事件，以便假定仅鼠标输入的内容将按原样工作而无需直接修改。

trans-unit.source: The TouchEvent interface represents an event sent when the state of contacts with a touch-sensitive surface changes. The state changes are starting contact with a touch surface, moving a touch point while maintaining contact with the surface, releasing a touch point and canceling a touch event. This interface's attributes include the state of several modifier keys (for example the
trans-unit.target: 所述 TouchEvent 接口代表一个事件时发送具有触敏表面的变化的接触的状态。状态变化包括开始与触摸表面接触，在保持与表面接触的同时移动触摸点，释放触摸点并取消触摸事件。该界面的属性包括几个修改键的状态（例如，

trans-unit.source: The TouchList interface represents a list of contact points with a touch surface, one touch point per contact. Thus, if the user activated the touch surface with one finger, the list would contain one item, and if the user touched the surface with three fingers, the list length would be three.
trans-unit.target: 所述 TouchList 接口表示列表的接触点与触摸面，每个接触一个触摸点。因此，如果用户用一根手指激活了触摸表面，则列表将包含一项；如果用户用三根手指触摸了表面，则列表长度将为三。

trans-unit.source: The TreeWalker interface it belongs to.
trans-unit.target: 它所属的 TreeWalker 接口。

trans-unit.source: The TreeWalker interface.
trans-unit.target: 该 TreeWalker 接口。

trans-unit.source: The URLUtilsReadOnly interface it belongs to.
trans-unit.target: 它所属的 URLUtilsReadOnly 接口。

trans-unit.source: The VideoPlaybackQuality interface.
trans-unit.target: 该 VideoPlaybackQuality 接口。

trans-unit.source: The VRDisplayEvent constructor creates a VRDisplayEvent object instance.
trans-unit.target: 该 VRDisplayEvent 构造函数创建一个 VRDisplayEvent 对象实例。

trans-unit.source: The VRFrameData constructor creates a VRFrameData object instance.
trans-unit.target: 该 VRFrameData 构造函数创建一个 VRFrameData 对象实例。

trans-unit.source: The VRFrameData object you want to populate.
trans-unit.target: 要填充的 VRFrameData 对象。

trans-unit.source: The Web Animations API dictionary EffectTiming's iterations property specifies the number of times the animation should repeat. The default value is 1, indicating that it should only play once, but you can set it to any floating-point value (including positive Infinity defaults to 1, and can also take a value of Infinity to make it loop infinitely.
trans-unit.target: 该网页动画API字典 EffectTiming 的 iterations 属性指定动画应该重复的次数。默认值为1，表示它只能播放一次，但是您可以将其设置为任何浮点值（包括正的 Infinity 默认值为 1 ，也可以采用 Infinity 的值使其无限循环。

trans-unit.source: The Web Animations API opens the browser’s animation engine to developers and manipulation by JavaScript. This API was designed to underlie implementations of both CSS Animations and CSS Transitions, and leaves the door open to future animation effects. It is one of the most performant ways to animate on the Web where supported, letting the browser make its own internal optimizations without hacks, coercion, or Window.requestAnimationFrame().
trans-unit.target: 该网页动画API打开浏览器的动画引擎，以开发和操作由JavaScript。该API旨在作为CSS动画和CSS Transitions的实现的基础，并为将来的动画效果打开了大门。这是在支持的Web上进行动画制作的最高性能的方法之一，它使浏览器可以进行自己的内部优化，而不会受到黑客攻击，胁迫或 Window.requestAnimationFrame() 的影响。

trans-unit.source: The Web Animations API's EffectTiming dictionary's fill property specifies a fill mode, which defines how the element to which the animation is applied should look when the animation sequence is not actively running, such as before the time specified by iterationStart or after animation's end time.
trans-unit.target: 该网页动画API的 EffectTiming 字典的 fill 属性指定填充模式，它定义了如何在动画序列不积极跑动，如规定的时间之前，应用了动画元素应 iterationStart 或动画的结束时间之后。

trans-unit.source: The Web Audio API involves handling audio operations inside an audio context, and has been designed to allow modular routing. Basic audio operations are performed with audio nodes, which are linked together to form an audio routing graph. Several sources — with different types of channel layout — are supported even within a single context. This modular design provides the flexibility to create complex audio functions with dynamic effects.
trans-unit.target: 该网络音频API包括处理内部音频业务音频上下文，并已被设计为允许模块化路由。基本的音频操作是通过音频节点执行的，这些音频节点链接在一起形成一个音频路由图。即使在单个上下文中，也支持具有不同类型的通道布局的多个源。这种模块化设计提供了创建具有动态效果的复杂音频功能的灵活性。

trans-unit.source: The WebGL API provides several constants that are passed into or returned by functions. All constants are of type GLenum.
trans-unit.target: 该WebGL的API提供了被传递到或通过函数返回几个常数。所有常量均为 GLenum 类型。

trans-unit.source: The WebGLContextEvent signals changes in the context state.
trans-unit.target: 所述 WebGLContextEvent 信号改变所述上下文状态。

trans-unit.source: The WebGLProgram in which to locate the specified uniform variable.
trans-unit.target: 在其中定位指定统一变量的 WebGLProgram 。

trans-unit.source: The WebGLRenderingContext method enableVertexAttribArray(), part of the WebGL API, turns on the generic vertex attribute array at the specified index into the list of attribute arrays.
trans-unit.target: 该 WebGLRenderingContext 方法 enableVertexAttribArray() ，所述的部分的WebGL API，通用顶点属性阵列的指定索引处入属性阵列的列表上匝。

trans-unit.source: The WebGLRenderingContext.getSupportedExtensions() method returns an array of strings, one for each supported extension.
trans-unit.target: 所述 WebGLRenderingContext.getSupportedExtensions() 方法返回字符串数组，一个用于每个支持的扩展名。

trans-unit.source: The WebRTC API interface RTCTrackEvent's read-only streams property specifies an array of MediaStream objects, one for each of the streams that comprise the track being added to the RTCPeerConnection.
trans-unit.target: 所述的WebRTC API接口 RTCTrackEvent 的只读 streams 属性指定的数组 MediaStream 对象，每一个对应一个包括被添加到轨道中的流的 RTCPeerConnection 。

trans-unit.source: The WebRTC API interface RTCTrackEvent's read-only track property specifies the MediaStreamTrack that has been added to the RTCPeerConnection.
trans-unit.target: 的的WebRTC API接口 RTCTrackEvent 的只读 track 属性指定 MediaStreamTrack 已添加到 RTCPeerConnection 。

trans-unit.source: The WebVR API is a nascent, but very interesting new feature of the web platform that allows developers to create web-based virtual reality experiences. It does this by providing access to VR headsets connected to your computer as VRDisplay objects, which can be manipulated to start and stop presentation to the display, queried for movement data (e.g. orientation and position) that can be used to update the display on each frame of the animation loop, and more.
trans-unit.target: 该WebVR API是一个新生的，但网络平台，允许开发者创建基于Web的虚拟现实体验非常有趣的新功能。它通过提供对作为 VRDisplay 对象连接到计算机的VR头戴式耳机的访问来实现此目的，可以通过操作该VR头戴式耳机来开始和停止向显示器显示，并查询可用于更新每个显示器上的显示的运动数据（例如方向和位置）。动画循环的框架等等。

trans-unit.source: The WheelEvent interface it belongs to.
trans-unit.target: 它所属的 WheelEvent 接口。

trans-unit.source: The Window global object
trans-unit.target: 该 Window 全局对象

trans-unit.source: The Window interface's opener property returns a reference to the window that opened the window using open().
trans-unit.target: 该 Window 界面的 opener 属性返回到使用打开窗口时，窗口的引用 open() 。

trans-unit.source: The Window interface's open() method loads the specified resource into the browsing context (window, <iframe> or tab) with the specified name. If the name doesn't exist, then a new window is opened and the specified resource is loaded into its browsing context.
trans-unit.target: 的 Window 界面的 open() 方法加载指定的资源到浏览上下文（窗口， <iframe> 或标签）具有指定名称。如果名称不存在，则将打开一个新窗口，并将指定的资源加载到其浏览上下文中。

trans-unit.source: The Window interface's performance property returns a Performance object, which can be used to gather performance information about the current document. It serves as the point of exposure for the Performance Timeline API, the High Resolution Time API, the Navigation Timing API, the User Timing API, and the Resource Timing API.
trans-unit.target: 该 Window 接口的 performance 属性返回一个 Performance 对象，它可以用来收集关于当前文档的性能信息。它用作Performance Timeline API，High Time Time API，Navigation Timing API，User Timing API和Resource Timing API的公开点。

trans-unit.source: The Window method routeEvent(), which is obsolete and no longer available, used to be called to forward an event to the next object that has asked to capture events.
trans-unit.target: 该 Window 方法 routeEvent() ，这是过时的，不再可用，曾经被称为一个事件转发到已要求捕获事件的下一个对象。

trans-unit.source: The Window property devicePixelRatio returns the ratio of the resolution in physical pixels to the resolution in CSS pixels for the current display device. This value could also be interpreted as the ratio of pixel sizes: the size of one CSS pixel to the size of one physical pixel. In simpler terms, this tells the browser how many of the screen's actual pixels should be used to draw a single CSS pixel.
trans-unit.target: 的 Window 属性 devicePixelRatio 返回在分辨率的比例物理像素在分辨率CSS像素用于当前显示装置。此值也可以解释为像素大小的比率：一个CSS像素的大小与一个物理像素的大小。简单来说，它告诉浏览器应使用多少屏幕实际像素来绘制单个CSS像素。

trans-unit.source: The getComputedStyle() method on the document.defaultView object returns all styles that have actually been computed for an element. See Example 6: getComputedStyle in the examples chapter for more information on how to use this method.
trans-unit.target: 所述 getComputedStyle() 的上方法 document.defaultView 对象返回实际已计算了的元件的所有样式。有关如何使用此方法的更多信息，请参见示例章节中的示例6：getComputedStyle。

trans-unit.source: The Worker interface it belongs to.
trans-unit.target: 它所属的 Worker 接口。

trans-unit.source: The Worker interface spawns real OS-level threads, and mindful programmers may be concerned that concurrency can cause “interesting” effects in your code if you aren't careful.
trans-unit.target: 该 Worker 接口产卵实时操作系统级线程，并铭记程序员可能会担心并发可能会导致在你的代码“有趣”的效果，如果你不小心。

trans-unit.source: The WorkerGlobalScope interface it belongs to.
trans-unit.target: 它所属的 WorkerGlobalScope 接口。

trans-unit.source: The WritableStream to be controlled.
trans-unit.target: 要控制的 WritableStream 。

trans-unit.source: The WritableStream to be written to.
trans-unit.target: 要写入的 WritableStream 。

trans-unit.source: The XMLHttpRequest method getAllResponseHeaders() returns all the response headers, separated by CRLF, as a string, or returns null if no response has been received. If a network error happened, an empty string is returned.
trans-unit.target: 的 XMLHttpRequest 的方法 getAllResponseHeaders() 返回所有响应头，通过分离CRLF，作为一个字符串，或者返回 null ，如果没有响应已被接收。如果发生网络错误，则返回一个空字符串。

trans-unit.source: The XMLHttpRequest method getResponseHeader() returns the string containing the text of of a particular header's value. If there are multiple response headers with the same name, then their values are returned as a single concatenated string, where each value is separated from the previous one by a pair of comma and space. The getResponseHeader() method returns the value as a UTF byte sequence.
trans-unit.target: 的 XMLHttpRequest 的方法 getResponseHeader() 返回包含的特定标头的值的文本串。如果存在多个具有相同名称的响应标头，则它们的值将作为单个串联字符串返回，其中每个值与前一个值之间用一对逗号和空格分隔。的 getResponseHeader() 方法返回的值作为UTF字节序列。

trans-unit.source: The XMLHttpRequest method open() initializes a newly-created request, or re-initializes an existing one.
trans-unit.target: 的 XMLHttpRequest 的方法 open() 初始化新创建的请求时，或重新初始化一个现有的。

trans-unit.source: The XMLHttpRequest method overrideMimeType() specifies a MIME type other than the one provided by the server to be used instead when interpreting the data being transferred in a request. This may be used, for example, to force a stream to be treated and parsed as "text/xml", even if the server does not report it as such. This method must be called before calling send().
trans-unit.target: 的 XMLHttpRequest 的方法 overrideMimeType() 指定其他的MIME类型为不是由服务器提供的一个解释在请求被传送的数据时，被代替使用。例如，这可以用于强制将流视为并解析为 "text/xml" ，即使服务器没有这样报告也是如此。必须在调用 send() 之前调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: The XMLHttpRequest method send() sends the request to the server. If the request is asynchronous (which is the default), this method returns as soon as the request is sent and the result is delivered using events. If the request is synchronous, this method doesn't return until the response has arrived.
trans-unit.target: 的 XMLHttpRequest 的方法 send() 将请求发送到服务器。如果请求是异步的（默认设置），则此方法将在发送请求并使用事件传递结果后立即返回。如果请求是同步的，则在响应到达之前该方法不会返回。

trans-unit.source: The XMLHttpRequest method setRequestHeader() sets the value of an HTTP request header. When using setRequestHeader(), you must call it after calling open(), but before calling send(). If this method is called several times with the same header, the values are merged into one single request header.
trans-unit.target: 的 XMLHttpRequest 的方法 setRequestHeader() 设置的HTTP请求报头的值。使用 setRequestHeader() 时，必须在调用 open() 之后但在调用 send() 之前调用它。如果使用相同的标头多次调用此方法，则值将合并为一个请求标头。

trans-unit.source: The XMLHttpRequest property responseType is an enumerated string value specifying the type of data contained in the response. It also lets the author change the response type. If an empty string is set as the value of responseType, the default value of "text" is used.
trans-unit.target: 的 XMLHttpRequest 的属性 responseType 是枚举的字符串值指定包含在响应数据的类型。它还允许作者更改响应类型。如果将空字符串设置为 responseType 的值，则使用默认值 "text" 。

trans-unit.source: The XMLHttpRequestresponse property returns the response's body content as an ArrayBuffer, Blob, Document, JavaScript Object, or DOMString, depending on the value of the request's responseType property.
trans-unit.target: 所述 XMLHttpRequest response 属性返回响应的主体内容作为 ArrayBuffer ， Blob ， Document ，JavaScript的 Object ，或 DOMString ，取决于请求的值 responseType 属性。

trans-unit.source: The XMLHttpRequestupload property returns an XMLHttpRequestUpload object that can be observed to monitor the progress of an upload. It is an opaque object, but being an XMLHttpRequestEventTarget, event listeners can be set on it to track its process.
trans-unit.target: 所述 XMLHttpRequest upload 属性返回一个 XMLHttpRequestUpload 可以观察到的，以监视上传进度对象。它是一个不透明的对象，但是作为 XMLHttpRequestEventTarget ，可以在其上设置事件侦听器以跟踪其过程。

trans-unit.source: The XMLSerializer method serializeToString() constructs a string representing the specified DOM tree in XML form.
trans-unit.target: 所述 XMLSerializer 方法 serializeToString() 构造一个表示指定的字符串DOM树的XML形式。

trans-unit.source: The TouchEvent.altKey example includes an example of this property's usage.
trans-unit.target: 该TouchEvent.altKey例子包括该物业的使用的一个例子。

trans-unit.source: The latencyHint property can be number specifying a preferred maximum latency in seconds or a string from the AudioContextLatencyCategory enumerated string, which selects a standard value for a given type of audio usage:
trans-unit.target: 所述 latencyHint 属性可以指定以秒为优选的最大等待时间或从一个字符串数 AudioContextLatencyCategory 列举字符串，选择用于给定类型的音频使用的标准值：

trans-unit.source: The language is in standard (RFC 5646) format. For US English, this would be "en-US", for example.
trans-unit.target: 该 language 为标准（RFC 5646）格式。例如，对于美国英语，这将是 "en-US" 。

trans-unit.source: The sampleRate to be used by the AudioContext, specified in samples per second. The value may be any value supported by AudioBuffer. If not specified, the preferred sample rate for the context's output device is used by default.
trans-unit.target: AudioContext 要使用的 sampleRate ，以每秒的样本数指定。该值可以是 AudioBuffer 支持的任何值。如果未指定，则默认使用上下文输出设备的首选采样率。

trans-unit.source: The Battery Status API
trans-unit.target: 该电池状态API

trans-unit.source: The Blob() constructor allows one to create blobs from other objects. For example, to construct a blob from string:
trans-unit.target: 将 Blob() constructor 允许一个创建其他对象斑点。例如，从字符串构造一个blob：

trans-unit.source: The ServiceWorkerGlobalScope.caches read-only property returns the CacheStorage object associated with the service worker.
trans-unit.target: 该 ServiceWorkerGlobalScope.caches 只读属性返回 CacheStorage 与服务工作者关联的对象。

trans-unit.source: The ChildNode pure interface.
trans-unit.target: 该 ChildNode 纯接口。

trans-unit.source: The Node.replaceWith() method (to replace an existing node with the new one)
trans-unit.target: 所述 Node.replaceWith() 方法（更换用新的现有节点）

trans-unit.source: The id of the same-origin client that initiated the fetch.
trans-unit.target: 启动提取的同源 client 的 id 。

trans-unit.source: The KeyframeEffect.composite operation used to combine the values specified in this keyframe with the underlying value. This will be auto if the composite operation specified on the effect is being used.
trans-unit.target: 所述 KeyframeEffect.composite 操作用来在此关键帧与下面的值指定的值相结合。如果使用效果上指定的复合操作，这将是 auto 的。

trans-unit.source: The KeyframeEffect.composite operation used to combine the values specified in this keyframe with the underlying value. This will be absent if the composite operation specified on the effect is being used.
trans-unit.target: 所述 KeyframeEffect.composite 操作用来在此关键帧与下面的值指定的值相结合。如果使用效果上指定的复合操作，则将不存在。

trans-unit.source: The Window.crypto read-only property returns the Crypto object associated to the global object. This object allows web pages access to certain cryptographic related services.
trans-unit.target: 该 Window.crypto 只读属性返回的 Crypto 相关的全局对象的对象。该对象允许网页访问某些与密码相关的服务。

trans-unit.source: The dropEffect property is used to control the feedback (typically visual) the user is given during a drag and drop operation. It affects which cursor the browser displays while dragging. For example, when the user hovers over a target drop element, the browser's cursor may indicate the type of operation that will occur.
trans-unit.target: 所述 dropEffect 来属性用于控制反馈（通常目测）一个拖放操作期间向用户给出。它会影响浏览器在拖动时显示的光标。例如，当用户将鼠标悬停在目标放置元素上时，浏览器的光标可以指示将要发生的操作的类型。

trans-unit.source: The DataTransferItemList object is a list of DataTransferItem objects. The list object has methods to: add a drag item to the list, remove a drag item from the list and clear the list of all drag items.
trans-unit.target: 该 DataTransferItemList 对象的列表 DataTransferItem 对象。列表对象具有以下方法：将拖动项添加到列表，从列表中删除拖动项，并清除所有拖动项的列表。

trans-unit.source: The DeviceProximityEvent event provides an exact match for the distance between the device and the object through its value property. It also provides the closest and farthest distance the device is able to detect something through its min and max properties.
trans-unit.target: 所述 DeviceProximityEvent 事件为器件提供，并通过其的对象之间的距离的精确匹配 value 属性。它还通过设备的 min 和 max 属性提供了设备能够检测到的最接近和最远的距离。

trans-unit.source: The Document and Element methods append() and prepend()
trans-unit.target: 的 Document 和 Element 的方法 append() 和 prepend()

trans-unit.source: The Document.exitPointerLock() method is used to exit pointer lock, and like requestPointerLock, works asynchronously using the pointerlockchange and pointerlockerror events, which you'll see more about below.
trans-unit.target: 该 Document.exitPointerLock() 方法被用来退出指针锁定，而像 requestPointerLock ，异步工作使用 pointerlockchange 和 pointerlockerror 事件，你会看到更多的下面。

trans-unit.source: The DOMHighResTimeStamp type, as its name implies, represents a high resolution point in time. This type is a double and is used by the performance interfaces. The value could be a discrete point in time or the difference in time between two discrete points in time.
trans-unit.target: 该 DOMHighResTimeStamp 类型，顾名思义，代表了时间上的高分辨率点。此类型是 double 类型，由性能接口使用。该值可以是离散时间点，也可以是两个离散时间点之间的时间差。

trans-unit.source: The DOMString"fieldset".
trans-unit.target: 该 DOMString "fieldset" 。

trans-unit.source: The DOMString"output".
trans-unit.target: 该 DOMString "output" 。

trans-unit.source: The DragEvent interface has a constructor and one property, the dataTransfer property which is a DataTransfer object. DataTransfer objects include the drag event's state such as the type of drag being done (for example copy or move), the drag's data (one or more items) and the type of each drag item (a MIME type). DataTransfer objects also have methods to add items to the drag's data and to remove a drag item. The DragEvent and DataTransfer interfaces should be the only ones needed to add HTML drag and drop capabilities to an application. However, note Firefox supports some Gecko-specific extensions to the DataTransfer object that may be used, although those extensions will only work on Firefox.
trans-unit.target: 所述 DragEvent 接口具有一个构造函数和一个属性，所述 dataTransfer 属性是一个 DataTransfer 对象。 DataTransfer 对象包括拖动事件的状态，例如完成拖动的类型（例如 copy 或 move ），拖动的数据（一个或多个项目）以及每个拖动项的类型（MIME类型）。 DataTransfer 对象还具有将项目添加到拖动数据中并删除拖动项目的方法。该 DragEvent 和 DataTransfer 的接口应该是HTML拖放功能添加到应用程序所需的唯一。但是请注意，Firefox支持一些可以使用的 DataTransfer 对象的Gecko特定扩展，尽管这些扩展仅在Firefox上有效。

trans-unit.source: The EffectTiming object associated with the animation containing all the animation's timing values.
trans-unit.target: 与动画关联的 EffectTiming 对象包含所有动画的定时值。

trans-unit.source: The Element whose intersection with the root changed.
trans-unit.target: 与根的交集已更改的 Element 。

trans-unit.source: The origin of the window that sent the message at the time postMessage was called. This string is the concatenation of the protocol and "://", the host name if one exists, and ":" followed by a port number if a port is present and differs from the default port for the given protocol. Examples of typical origins are https://example.org (implying port 443), http://example.net (implying port 80), and http://example.com:8080. Note that this origin is not guaranteed to be the current or future origin of that window, which might have been navigated to a different location since postMessage was called.
trans-unit.target: 在调用 postMessage 时发送消息的窗口的来源。此字符串是协议和“：//”，主机名（如果存在）和“：”（如果存在端口且与给定协议的默认端口不同）后面的端口号的串联。典型来源的示例是 https://example.org （暗示端口 443 ）， http://example.net （暗示端口 80 ）和 http://example.com:8080 。请注意，不能保证此原点是该窗口的当前或将来原点，自调用 postMessage 以来，该原点可能已导航到其他位置。

trans-unit.target: 该 CharacterData 和 Element 实施了新的接口。

trans-unit.source: The mozSetDataAt() method allows you to add multiple items during a dragstart event. This function similarly to setData()
trans-unit.target: 该 mozSetDataAt() 方法允许你在过程中添加多个项目 dragstart 事件。此功能类似于 setData()

trans-unit.source: The pointerLockElement property is useful for determining if any element is currently pointer locked (e.g., for doing a Boolean check) and also for obtaining a reference to the locked element, if any.
trans-unit.target: 所述 pointerLockElement 属性是用于确定是否任何元件当前指针锁定（例如，用于做一个布尔检查），并且还用于获得到锁定元件的参考，如果任何有用的。

trans-unit.source: The FileSystemDirectoryEntry interface's method createReader() returns a FileSystemDirectoryReader object which can be used to read the entries in the directory.
trans-unit.target: 该 FileSystemDirectoryEntry 接口的方法 createReader () 返回一个 FileSystemDirectoryReader 其可被用于读取在该目录中的条目的对象。

trans-unit.source: The FileSystemDirectoryEntry interface's method getDirectory() returns a FileSystemDirectoryEntry object corresponding to a directory contained somewhere within the directory subtree rooted at the directory on which it's called.
trans-unit.target: 该 FileSystemDirectoryEntry 接口的方法 getDirectory () 返回一个 FileSystemDirectoryEntry 对应于一个目录对象包含某处在其上，它被称为目录为根的子树的目录内。

trans-unit.source: The FileSystemDirectoryEntry interface's method getFile() returns a FileSystemFileEntry object corresponding to a file contained somewhere within the directory subtree rooted at the directory on which it's called.
trans-unit.target: 该 FileSystemDirectoryEntry 接口的方法 getFile () 返回一个 FileSystemFileEntry 对应于文件对象某处包含在其上，它被称为目录为根的子树的目录内。

trans-unit.source: The FileSystemDirectoryEntry interface's method removeRecursively() removes the directory as well as all of its content, hierarchically iterating over its entire subtree of descendant files and directories.
trans-unit.target: 该 FileSystemDirectoryEntry 接口的方法 removeRecursively () 删除该目录以及其中的所有内容，层次遍历的后裔文件和目录的整个子树。

trans-unit.source: The FileSystemDirectoryReader interface's readEntries() method retrieves the directory entries within the directory being read and delivers them in an array to a provided callback function. The objects in the array are all based upon FileSystemEntry. Generally, they are either FileSystemFileEntry objects, which represent standard files, or FileSystemDirectoryEntry objects, which represent directories.
trans-unit.target: 该 FileSystemDirectoryReader 接口的 readEntries() 方法检索目录被读取中的目录项，并提供它们在阵列中的提供回调函数。数组中的对象均基于 FileSystemEntry 。一般情况下，他们要么 FileSystemFileEntry 对象，代表标准的文件，或 FileSystemDirectoryEntry 对象，它代表目录。

trans-unit.source: The FileSystemEntry interface's method copyTo() copies the file specified by the entry to a new location on the file system. There are some typical restrictions on what you can do:
trans-unit.target: 该 FileSystemEntry 接口的方法 copyTo () 复制由进入到一个新的位置在文件系统中指定的文件。您可以执行的操作有一些典型的限制：

trans-unit.source: The FileSystemEntry interface's method getMetadata() obtains a Metadata object with information about the file system entry, such as its modification date and time and its size.
trans-unit.target: 该 FileSystemEntry 接口的方法 getMetadata () 获得 Metadata 与有关文件系统的条目，信息对象，如它的修改日期和时间以及它的大小。

trans-unit.source: The FileSystemEntry interface's method getParent() obtains a FileSystemDirectoryEntry.
trans-unit.target: 该 FileSystemEntry 接口的方法 getParent () 获得 FileSystemDirectoryEntry 。

trans-unit.source: The FileSystemEntry interface's method moveTo() moves the file specified by the entry to a new location on the file system, or renames the file if the destination directory is the same as the source. There are some typical restrictions on what you can do:
trans-unit.target: 该 FileSystemEntry 接口的方法 moveTo () 移动由入口到一个新的位置中的文件系统指定的文件，或重命名文件如果目标目录相同的来源。您可以执行的操作有一些典型的限制：

trans-unit.source: The FileSystemEntry interface's method remove() deletes the file or directory from the file system. Directories must be empty before they can be removed.
trans-unit.target: 该 FileSystemEntry 接口的方法 remove () 删除从文件系统中的文件或目录。目录必须为空，然后才能将其删除。

trans-unit.source: The FileSystemEntry interface's method toURL() creates and returns a string containing a URL which can be used to identify the file system entry. This is done by exposing a new URL scheme—filesystem:—that can be used as the value of src and href attributes.
trans-unit.target: 该 FileSystemEntry 接口的方法 toURL () 创建并返回包含可用于识别该文件系统项的URL的字符串。这是通过公开一个新的URL方案（ filesystem: ：）完成的，该方案可以用作 src 和 href 属性的值。

trans-unit.source: The FileSystemEntry refers to an item which doesn't exist.
trans-unit.target: 该 FileSystemEntry 指的是不存在的项目。

trans-unit.source: The FileSystemFileEntry interface's method file() returns a File object which can be used to read data from the file represented by the directory entry.
trans-unit.target: 该 FileSystemFileEntry 接口的方法 file () 返回一个 File ，其可被用于从由目录条目所代表的文件中读取数据对象。

trans-unit.source: The FileSystemFileEntry interface's method createWriter() returns a FileWriter object which can be used to write data into the file represented by the directory entry.
trans-unit.target: 该 FileSystemFileEntry 接口的方法 createWriter() 返回一个 FileWriter 的可用于将数据写入到由目录项表示的文件对象。

trans-unit.source: The Gamepad.index property is unique numerical index that identifies each connected controller.

trans-unit.source: The Gamepad API is a fairly well-supported API that allows developers to access gamepads/controllers connected to your computer and use them to control web apps. The basic Gamepad API provides access to connected controllers as Gamepad objects, which can then be queried to find out what buttons are being pressed and thumbsticks (axes) are being moved at any point, etc.
trans-unit.target: 该游戏手柄API是一个相当良好支持的API，允许开发人员访问游戏手柄/连接到您的电脑控制器，并利用它们来控制Web应用程序。基本的Gamepad API提供对连接的控制器的访问，作为 Gamepad 对象，然后可以查询该对象以找出正在按下的按钮以及在任意点移动的指尖（轴）等。

trans-unit.target: 该 @supports 在规则允许相同的功能，但在声明的方式。

trans-unit.source: The calc() function is one of those useful little utility features that's cropped up in CSS that doesn't look like much initially, but soon starts to make you think "Wow, why didn't we have this before? Why was CSS2 layout so awkward?" It allows you do a calculation to determine the computed value of a CSS unit, mixing different units in the process.
trans-unit.target: 该 calc() 函数是那些有用的小工具功能，在CSS出现了，它貌不惊人最初的一个，但很快就开始让你觉得“哇，为什么我们没有在这之前？为什么CSS2布局好尴尬吗？” 它允许您进行计算以确定CSS单位的计算值，并在此过程中混合使用不同的单位。

trans-unit.source: The cursor to use when the mouse is over this region (defaults to "inherit"). Inherits the cursor of the parent hit region, if any, or the canvas element's cursor.
trans-unit.target: 鼠标悬停在此区域上时要使用的 cursor （默认为 "inherit" ）。继承父匹配区域的光标（如果有的话）或canvas元素的光标。

trans-unit.source: The display property is set to "none".
trans-unit.target: 在 display 属性设置为 "none" 。

trans-unit.source: The timing function used from this keyframe until the next keyframe in the series.
trans-unit.target: 从此关键帧到系列中的下一个关键帧使用的计时功能。

trans-unit.source: The touch-action CSS property is used to specify whether or not the browser should apply its default (native) touch behavior (such as zooming or panning) to a region. This property may be applied to all elements except: non-replaced inline elements, table rows, row groups, table columns, and column groups.
trans-unit.target: 该 touch-action CSS属性用于指定浏览器是否应该申请其默认（本地）的触摸行为（如缩放或平移）的区域。此属性可能适用于所有元素，但以下除外：非替换行内元素，表行，行组，表列和列组。

trans-unit.source: The touch-action property is set to none to prevent the browser from applying its default touch behavior to the application.
trans-unit.target: 该 touch-action 属性设置为 none ，以防止浏览器将其默认触摸行为的应用程序。

trans-unit.target: 该结构克隆算法可以接受JSON和几件事情，JSON不能-像循环引用。

trans-unit.source: The <audio> and <video> elements
trans-unit.target: 所述 <audio> 和 <video> 元素

trans-unit.source: The <audio> and <video> elements.
trans-unit.target: 所述 <audio> 和 <video> 元素。

trans-unit.source: The <canvas> element and its associated interface, HTMLCanvasElement
trans-unit.target: 所述 <canvas> 元件和与之相关的接口， HTMLCanvasElement

trans-unit.source: The <canvas> element and its associated interface, HTMLCanvasElement.
trans-unit.target: 所述 <canvas> 元素及其相关联的接口， HTMLCanvasElement 。

trans-unit.source: The <canvas> element creates a fixed-size drawing surface that exposes one or more rendering contexts, which are used to create and manipulate the content shown. In this tutorial, we focus on the 2D rendering context. Other contexts may provide different types of rendering; for example, WebGL uses a 3D context based on OpenGL ES.
trans-unit.target: 所述 <canvas> 元素创建一个固定大小的绘图表面暴露一个或多个渲染上下文，其被用于创建和操纵所示的内容。在本教程中，我们专注于2D渲染上下文。其他上下文可以提供不同类型的渲染；例如，WebGL使用基于OpenGL ES的3D上下文。

trans-unit.source: The <canvas> element creates a fixed-size drawing surface that exposes one or more rendering contexts, which are used to create and manipulate the content shown. In this tutorial, we focus on the 2D rendering context. Other contexts may provide different types of rendering; for example, WebGL uses a 3D context based on OpenGL ES.
The <canvas> element is also used by Canvas 2D to do 2D graphics on web pages.
trans-unit.target: 所述 <canvas> 元件也使用画布2D做2D图形上的网页。

trans-unit.source: The <canvas> element is one of the most widely used tools for rendering 2D graphics on the web. However, when websites and apps push the Canvas API to its limits, performance begins to suffer. This article provides suggestions for optimizing your use of the canvas element to ensure that your graphics perform well.
trans-unit.target: 所述 <canvas> 元素是用于在网络上渲染2D图形的最广泛使用的工具之一。但是，当网站和应用程序将Canvas API推到极限时，性能开始下降。本文为优化使用canvas元素提供了建议，以确保图形性能良好。

trans-unit.source: The <canvas> element on its own is just a bitmap and does not provide information about any drawn objects. Canvas content is not exposed to accessibility tools like semantic HTML is. In general, you should avoid using canvas in an accessible website or app. The following guidelines can help to make it more accessible.
trans-unit.target: 所述 <canvas> 自身元件仅仅是一个位图，并且不提供任何绘制的对象的信息。Canvas内容不会像语义HTML那样暴露于可访问性工具中。通常，您应该避免在可访问的网站或应用程序中使用画布。以下准则可帮助使其更易于访问。

trans-unit.source: The <div> named "container" is the scrollable box that lets the keyboard be scrolled horiontally if it's too wide for the available space. The keys themselves will be inserted into the block of class "keyboard".
trans-unit.target: 该 <div> 的名为 "container" 是滚动的框，让如果它太宽的可用空间键盘horiontally滚动。按键本身将插入到 "keyboard" 类的块中。

trans-unit.source: The <div> with the class "box" is just a container for layout purposes, presenting the contents with a box around it. The <div> whose class is "log" is the container for the log text itself.
trans-unit.target: 带有类 "box" 的 <div> 只是出于布局目的的容器，在其内容周围带有一个框。类为 "log" 的 <div> 是日志文本本身的容器。

trans-unit.source: The <form>, <fieldset>, <input> elements.
trans-unit.target: 在 <form> ， <fieldset> ， <input> 元素。

trans-unit.source: The <iframe> element's sandbox attribute has a new token, allow-storage-access-by-user-activation, which permits sandboxed <iframe>s to use the Storage Access API to request storage access.
trans-unit.target: 所述 <iframe> 元素的 sandbox 属性有一个新令牌， allow-storage-access-by-user-activation ，这允许沙盒 <iframe> s至使用存储访问API来请求存储访问。

trans-unit.source: The <iframe>allowfullscreen attribute

trans-unit.source: The Voice-change-O-matic is a fun voice manipulator and sound visualization web app that allows you to choose different effects and visualizations. The application is fairly rudimentary, but it demonstrates the simultaneous use of multiple Web Audio API features. (run the Voice-change-O-matic live).

trans-unit.source: The Web Speech API repo on GitHub contains demos to illustrate speech recognition and synthesis.
trans-unit.target: GitHub上的Web Speech API存储库包含演示，用于演示语音识别和合成。

trans-unit.source: The A readable stream with an underlying push source and backpressure support example in the spec provides a good example of using ReadablestreamDefaultController.desiredSize to manually detect when the stream is full and apply backpressure, and also of using error() to manually trigger a stream error if another part of the system it relies on fails.
trans-unit.target: 规范中具有基础推送源和反压支持示例的A可读流提供了一个很好的示例，该示例使用 ReadablestreamDefaultController.desiredSize 手动检测流何时已满并施加反压，还使用 error() 手动触发流错误如果它依赖的系统的另一部分失败。

trans-unit.source: The A readable stream with an underlying push source and backpressure support example in the spec provides a good example of using desiredSize to manually detect when the stream is full and apply backpressure, and also of using ReadablestreamDefaultController.error() to manually trigger a stream error if another part of the system it relies on fails.
trans-unit.target: 规范中带有底层推压源和反压支持示例的A可读流提供了一个很好的示例，该示例使用 desiredSize 手动检测流何时已满并施加反压，还使用 ReadablestreamDefaultController.error() 手动触发流错误。如果它依赖的系统的另一部分失败。

trans-unit.source: The W3C DOM and WHATWG DOM standards are implemented in most modern browsers. Many browsers extend the standard, so care must be exercised when using them on the web where documents may be accessed by various browsers with different DOMs.
The HTML5 Drag and Drop Specification dictates a drag data store mode. This may result in unexpected behavior, being DataTransfer.getData() not returning an expected value.
trans-unit.target: 的HTML5拖放规范规定一个 drag data store mode 。这可能会导致意外行为，因为 DataTransfer.getData() 没有返回预期值。

trans-unit.source: The controlling user agentSHOULD initiate presentation using the default presentation request, only when the user has expressed an intention to do so via a user gesture. For example, by clicking a button in the browser.
trans-unit.target: 所述控制用户代理应该使用发起呈现缺省呈现请求，仅当用户已表示有意经由用户手势这样做。例如，通过单击浏览器中的按钮。

trans-unit.source: The IDBTransaction object to which this object store belongs.

trans-unit.source: The MediaMetadata interface lets a web site provide rich metadata to the platform UI for media that is playing. This metadata includes the title, artist (creator) name, album (collection), and artwork. The platform can show this metadata in media centers, notifications, device lockscreens, etc.
trans-unit.target: 该 MediaMetadata 的界面让一个网站，为正在播放的媒体平台UI提供丰富的元数据。此元数据包括标题，艺术家（创作者）名称，专辑（收藏集）和插图。该平台可以在媒体中心，通知，设备锁定屏幕等中显示此元数据。

trans-unit.source: The MediaSession interface lets users control playback of media through user-agent defined interface elements. Interaction with these elements even trigger handlers in the web page, playing the media. Since multiple pages may be simultaneously using this API, the user agent is responsible for calling the correct page's event handlers. The user agent provides default behaviors, when no page-defined behavior is available.
trans-unit.target: 所述 MediaSession 接口允许用户通过用户代理定义的接口元件控制媒体回放。与这些元素的交互甚至会触发网页中的处理程序，从而播放媒体。由于多个页面可能同时使用此API，因此用户代理负责调用正确页面的事件处理程序。当没有页面定义的行为可用时，用户代理将提供默认行为。

trans-unit.source: The MediaStream used when constructing this MediaStreamAudioSourceNode.
trans-unit.target: 该 MediaStream 构造此MediaStreamAudioSourceNode时使用。

trans-unit.source: The MediaStreamTrack the event is associated with.
trans-unit.target: 与事件关联的 MediaStreamTrack 。

trans-unit.target: 该 MediaStreamTrack 已添加到连接。

trans-unit.target: 所述 MediaStreamTrack 正在由所述处理 RTCRtpSender 。如果 track 为 null ，则 RTCRtpSender 不传输任何内容。

trans-unit.source: The MutationObserver interface provides the ability to watch for changes being made to the DOM tree. It is designed as a replacement for the older Mutation Events feature which was part of the DOM3 Events specification.
trans-unit.target: 该 MutationObserver 接口提供了监视更改正在对制造能力的DOM树。它旨在替代DOM3事件规范中较旧的Mutation Events功能。

trans-unit.target: 该 navigator.getBattery() 方法返回一个解决电池承诺 BatteryManager 接口，您可以使用与互动电池状态API。

trans-unit.target: 所述 Navigator.maxTouchPoints 属性用于确定在任何时间单点被支持的同时的触摸点的最大数目。

trans-unit.source: The PerformanceEntry interface encapsulates a single performance entry — that is, a single data point or metric in the performance timeline. This interface has the following four properties, and these properties are extended (with additional constraints) by other interfaces (such as PerformanceMark):
trans-unit.target: 该 PerformanceEntry 接口封装了一个性能入门 -也就是说，单个数据点或指标在性能时间表。此接口具有以下四个属性，并且其他接口（例如 PerformanceMark ）扩展了这些属性（带有附加约束）：

trans-unit.source: The PerformanceFrameTiming interface extends the following PerformanceEntry properties (for "frame" performance entry types) by qualifying and constrainting the properties as follows:
trans-unit.target: 所述 PerformanceFrameTiming 接口扩展了以下 PerformanceEntry 性质（“ frame ” performance entry types 通过限定和constrainting属性如下）：

trans-unit.source: The PerformanceResourceTiming interface has three properties that can be used to obtain size data about a resource. The transferSize property returns the size (in octets) of the fetched resource including the response header fields plus the response payload body.
trans-unit.target: 所述 PerformanceResourceTiming 接口具有可用于获得关于资源的大小的数据的三个属性。所述 transferSize 属性返回所获取的资源，包括响应报头字段加上响应的负载体的大小（以字节为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The PerformanceResourceTiming interface's toJSON() method returns a JSON serialization of a "resource" type performance entry.
trans-unit.target: 该 PerformanceResourceTiming 接口的 toJSON() 方法返回一个“的JSON序列化 resource ”类型 performance entry 。

trans-unit.source: The encodedBodySize property returns the size (in octets) received from the fetch (HTTP or cache), of the payload body, before removing any applied content-codings. decodedBodySize returns the size (in octets) received from the fetch (HTTP or cache) of the message body, after removing any applied content-codings.
trans-unit.target: 所述 encodedBodySize 从取（HTTP或高速缓存）接收属性返回的大小（以字节为单位），则的有效载荷体，前去除任何施加的内容编码。在删除任何应用的内容编码后， decodedBodySize 返回从消息正文的提取（HTTP或缓存）接收的大小（以八位字节为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The initiatorType property returns the type of resource that initiated the performance entry such as "css" for a CSS resource, "xmlhttprequest" for an XMLHttpRequest and "img" for an image (such as a JPEG).
trans-unit.target: 该 initiatorType 属性返回类型发起性能条目，如“资源的 css ”的CSS资源，“ xmlhttprequest ”为一个XMLHttpRequest和“ img ”的图像（如JPEG）。

trans-unit.source: The nextHopProtocol property returns the network protocol used to fetch the resource.
trans-unit.target: 该 nextHopProtocol 属性返回网络协议来获取资源。

trans-unit.source: The PointerEvent interface extends the MouseEvent interface and has the following properties (all of them are Read only ).
trans-unit.target: 该 PointerEvent 接口扩展 MouseEvent 接口，并具有下列特性（所有的人都只读）。

trans-unit.source: The PresentationReceiver allows a receiving browsing context to access the controlling browsing contexts and communicate with them.
trans-unit.target: 所述PresentationReceiver允许接收浏览上下文访问的控制浏览上下文和与他们交流。

trans-unit.source: The Touch.radiusX example includes an example of this property's usage.
trans-unit.target: 该Touch.radiusX例子包括该物业的使用的一个例子。

trans-unit.source: The Range object.
trans-unit.target: 该 Range 的对象。

trans-unit.source: The RTCDataChannel.readyState property is set to "closed".
trans-unit.target: 该 RTCDataChannel.readyState 属性设置为 "closed" 。

trans-unit.source: The Request the browser intends to make.
trans-unit.target: 浏览器打算发出的 Request 。

trans-unit.source: The response is a JavaScript ArrayBuffer containing binary data.
trans-unit.target: 所述 response 是一个JavaScript ArrayBuffer 包含的二进制数据。

trans-unit.source: The XMLHttpRequest.responseType is not set to either the empty string or "text". Since the responseText property is only valid for text content, any other value is an error condition.
trans-unit.target: 未将 XMLHttpRequest.responseType 设置为空字符串或 "text" 。由于 responseText 属性仅对文本内容有效，因此其他任何值都是错误条件。

trans-unit.source: The responseType isn't either "document" or an empty string (either of which indicates that the received data is XML or HTML).
trans-unit.target: 所述 responseType 是也不 "document" 或空字符串（其中的任一个表示接收到的数据是XML或HTML）。

trans-unit.source: The RTCDataChannel interface is a feature which lets you open a channel between two peers over which you may send and receive arbitrary data. The API is intentionally similar to the WebSocket API, so that the same programming model can be used for each.
trans-unit.target: 该 RTCDataChannel 接口是一个功能，它可以让你打开两个同伴在你可以发送和接收任意数据之间的通道。该API有意类似于WebSocket API，因此可以对每个API使用相同的编程模型。

trans-unit.source: The RTCIceTransport is currently gathering local candidates, or is waiting for the remote device to begin to transmit the remote candidates, or both. In this state, checking of candidates to look for those which might be acceptable has not yet begun.
trans-unit.target: 所述 RTCIceTransport 目前收集本地的候选，或正在等待远程设备开始传输远程候选，或两者。在这种状态下，尚未开始检查候选人以寻找可以接受的候选人。

trans-unit.source: The RTCIceTransport is newly created and has not yet started to gather ICE candidates.
trans-unit.target: 该 RTCIceTransport 是新建的，且尚未开始收集ICE候选人。

trans-unit.source: The RTCIceTransport object is serving as the controlling agent.
trans-unit.target: 所述 RTCIceTransport 对象被用作控制剂。

trans-unit.source: The RTCPeerConnection method getSenders() returns an array of RTCRtpSender objects, each of which represents the RTP sender responsible for transmitting one track's data.
trans-unit.target: 该 RTCPeerConnection 方法 getSenders() 返回的数组 RTCRtpSender 对象，其中每一个代表负责发送一个磁道的数据的RTP发送者。

trans-unit.source: The RTCPeerConnection method getStats() returns a promise which resolves with data providing statistics about either the overall connection or about the specified MediaStreamTrack.
trans-unit.target: 该 RTCPeerConnection 方法 getStats() 返回它解决一个承诺数据提供关于任一的整体连接或有关指定的统计 MediaStreamTrack 。

trans-unit.source: The RTCPeerConnection method addTrack() adds a new media track to the set of tracks which will be transmitted to the other peer.
trans-unit.target: 该 RTCPeerConnection 方法 addTrack() 增加了一个新的媒体轨道到将被发送到其它对等体的集合磁道。

trans-unit.source: The RTCPeerConnection property ontrack is an EventHandler which specifies a function to be called when the track event occurs, indicating that a track has been added to the RTCPeerConnection.
trans-unit.target: 所述 RTCPeerConnection 属性 ontrack 是一个 EventHandler ，当被调用指定的函数 track 事件发生时，指示轨道已被添加到该 RTCPeerConnection 。

trans-unit.source: The RTCRtpCodecParameters dictionary, part of the WebRTC API, is used to describe the configuration parameters for a single media codec. In addition to being the type of the RTCRtpParameters.codecs property, it's used when calling RTCRtpTransceiver.setCodecPreferences() to configure a transceiver's codecs before beginning the offer/answer process to establish a WebRTC peer connection.
trans-unit.target: 的 RTCRtpCodecParameters 字典，所述的WebRTC API的一部分，用于描述的配置参数的单个媒体编解码器。除了是 RTCRtpParameters.codecs 属性的类型之外，在开始要约/应答过程以建立WebRTC对等连接之前，调用 RTCRtpTransceiver.setCodecPreferences() 来配置收发器的编解码器时，还将使用它。

trans-unit.source: The RTCRtpReceiver object that handles receiving and decoding incoming media.
trans-unit.target: 所述 RTCRtpReceiver Object处理接收和进入的媒体进行解码。

trans-unit.source: The RTCRtpReceiver used by the track that's been added to the RTCPeerConnection.
trans-unit.target: 该 RTCRtpReceiver 使用一个已经加入到轨道 RTCPeerConnection 。
