trans-unit.source: The RTCRtpReceiver which is being used to receive the track's media.
trans-unit.target: 该 RTCRtpReceiver 正在使用接收轨道的媒体。

trans-unit.source: The RTCRtpSender object responsible for encoding and sending data to the remote peer.
trans-unit.target: 所述 RTCRtpSender 对象负责编码和将数据发送到远端对等体。

trans-unit.source: The RTCRtpStreamStats dictionary is returned by the RTCPeerConnection.getStats(), RTCRtpSender.getStats(), and RTCRtpReceiver.getStats() methods to provide detailed statistics about WebRTC connectivity. While the dictionary has a base set of properties that are present in each of these cases, there are also additional properties added depending on which interface the method is called on.
trans-unit.target: 该 RTCRtpStreamStats 字典由返回 RTCPeerConnection.getStats() ， RTCRtpSender.getStats() ，和 RTCRtpReceiver.getStats() 方法，以提供详细的有关的WebRTC连接的统计数据。虽然字典具有在每种情况下都存在的基本属性集，但根据调用该方法的接口，还添加了其他属性。

trans-unit.source: The RTCRtpTransceiver associated with the event.
trans-unit.target: 与事件关联的 RTCRtpTransceiver 。

trans-unit.source: The RTCRtpTransceiver being used by the new track.
trans-unit.target: 该 RTCRtpTransceiver 正在使用的新轨道。

trans-unit.source: The Touch.screenX example includes an example of this property's usage.
trans-unit.target: 该Touch.screenX例子包括该物业的使用的一个例子。

trans-unit.source: The SourceBuffer that created the track. Returns null if the track was not created by a SourceBuffer or the SourceBuffer has been removed from the MediaSource.sourceBuffers attribute of its parent media source.
trans-unit.target: 创建轨道的 SourceBuffer 。如果轨道不是由 SourceBuffer 创建的，或者 SourceBuffer 已从其父媒体源的 MediaSource.sourceBuffers 属性中移除，则返回null 。

trans-unit.source: The WebGLRenderingContext.stencilMask() method can set both, the front and back stencil writemasks to one value at the same time.
trans-unit.target: 所述 WebGLRenderingContext.stencilMask() 方法可以在同时设置，正面和背面模版写掩码到一个值。

trans-unit.source: The WebGLRenderingContext.stencilMaskSeparate() method can set front and back stencil writemasks to different values.
trans-unit.target: 所述 WebGLRenderingContext.stencilMaskSeparate() 方法可以设置前部和后部模版写掩码为不同的值。

trans-unit.source: The pan property takes a unitless value between -1 (full left pan) and 1 (full right pan). This interface was introduced as a much simpler way to apply a simple panning effect than having to use a full PannerNode.
trans-unit.target: 该 pan 物业需要之间的无量纲值 -1 （左满锅）和 1 （全右平移）。引入此接口是一种比必须使用完整 PannerNode 更为简单的方法来应用简单的平移效果。

trans-unit.source: The SVGElement, which established the current viewport. Often, the nearest ancestor <svg> element. null if the given element is the outermost <svg> element.
trans-unit.target: 该 SVGElement ，从而确立了当前视口。通常，最接近的祖先 <svg> 元素。如果给定元素是最外面的 <svg> 元素，则为 null 。

trans-unit.source: The TextDecoder interface describing the inverse operation.
trans-unit.target: 描述反向操作的 TextDecoder 接口。

trans-unit.source: The TextEncoder interface describing the inverse operation.
trans-unit.target: 描述反向操作的 TextEncoder 接口。

trans-unit.source: The TextTrack that this cue belongs to, or null if it doesn't belong to any.
trans-unit.target: 此提示所属的 TextTrack ；如果不属于任何提示，则返回 null 。

trans-unit.source: The Touch.radiusX, Touch.radiusY, and Touch.rotationAngle describe the area of contact between the user and the screen, the touch area. This can be helpful when dealing with imprecise pointing devices such as fingers. These values are set to describe an ellipse that as closely as possible matches the entire area of contact (such as the user's fingertip).
trans-unit.target: 的 Touch.radiusX ， Touch.radiusY 和 Touch.rotationAngle 描述所述用户和所述屏幕上，之间的接触面积的触摸区域。在处理不精确的指点设备（例如手指）时，这可能会有所帮助。设置这些值以描述一个椭圆，该椭圆尽可能与整个接触区域（例如用户的指尖）匹配。

trans-unit.source: The WebGL tutorial has more information, examples, and resources on how to get started with WebGL.
trans-unit.target: 该WebGL的教程对如何开始使用WebGL的启动更多信息，示例和资源。

trans-unit.source: The SourceBuffer.updating property is equal to true, or this SourceBuffer has been removed from the MediaSource.
trans-unit.target: 该 SourceBuffer.updating 属性为 true ，或该 SourceBuffer 已经从删除 MediaSource 的。

trans-unit.source: The URLSearchParams interface can be used to build and manipulate the URL query string.
trans-unit.target: 该 URLSearchParams 接口可用于构建和操纵URL查询字符串。

trans-unit.source: The UserProximityEvent event provides a rough approximation of the distance, expressed through a boolean. The UserProximityEvent.near property is true if the object is close or false if the object is far.
trans-unit.target: 该 UserProximityEvent 事件提供距离的粗略估计，通过布尔表示。该 UserProximityEvent.near 属性为 true ，如果物体接近或 false 如果对象是远。

trans-unit.source: The VideoTrack interface represents a single video track from a <video> element. The most common use for accessing a VideoTrack object is to toggle its selected property in order to make it the active video track for its <video> element.
trans-unit.target: 所述 VideoTrack 接口表示从一个单一的视频轨道 <video> 元素。访问 VideoTrack 对象的最常见用途是切换其 selected 属性，以使其成为其 <video> 元素的活动视频轨道。

trans-unit.source: The language is in standard (RFC 5646) format. For US English, this would be "en-US", for example.
trans-unit.target: 该 language 为标准（RFC 5646）格式。例如，对于美国英语，这将是 "en-US" 。

trans-unit.source: The VRDisplay associated with this event.
trans-unit.target: 与此事件关联的 VRDisplay 。

trans-unit.source: The VRPose of the VRDisplay at the current VRFrameData.timestamp.
trans-unit.target: 当前 VRPose 上的 VRDisplay 的 VRFrameData.timestamp 。

trans-unit.source: The WebGL tutorial has more information, examples, and resources on how to get started with WebGL.
trans-unit.target: 该WebGL的教程对如何开始使用WebGL的启动更多信息，示例和资源。

trans-unit.source: The WebGLRenderingContext.renderbufferStorage() method now accepts these formats.
trans-unit.target: 所述 WebGLRenderingContext.renderbufferStorage() 方法现在接受这些格式。

trans-unit.source: The WebRTC API'sRTCIceCandidateInit dictionary, which contains the information needed to fundamentally describe an RTCIceCandidate. RTCIceCandidateInit is used when using new RTCIceCandidate() to create a new ICE candidate object. It's also used as the return value from the RTCIceCandidate.toJSON() method, and can be passed directly into RTCPeerConnection.addIceCandidate() to add a candidate to the peer connection.
trans-unit.target: 的的WebRTC API的 RTCIceCandidateInit 字典，其中包含需要从根本上描述的信息 RTCIceCandidate 。 RTCIceCandidateInit 使用时所使用的 new RTCIceCandidate() 来创建新的ICE候选对象。它也用作 RTCIceCandidate.toJSON() 方法的返回值，并且可以直接传递到 RTCPeerConnection.addIceCandidate() 中,以将候选者添加到对等连接。

trans-unit.source: The WebRTC API'sRTCIceCandidateType enumerated type provides a set of DOMString values representing the types of ICE candidate that can arrive. These strings are taken directly from the candidate a-line in SDP.
trans-unit.target: 的的WebRTC API的 RTCIceCandidateType 枚举类型提供了一组 DOMString 代表类型ICE候选人能够到达的值。这些字符串直接取自SDP中的 candidate a行。

trans-unit.source: The WebRTC API'sRTCIceComponent enumerated type contains DOMString values that each identify a specific ICE component; these are "rtp" and "rtcp". These strings are mapped to corresponding numeric values as they appear in the candidate a-line in SDP.
trans-unit.target: 所述的WebRTC API的 RTCIceComponent 枚举类型包含 DOMString 值每个识别特定ICE分量; 它们是 "rtp" 和 "rtcp" 。这些字符串在SDP 中的 candidate a行中显示时，将映射到相应的数值。

trans-unit.source: The WebRTC API'sRTCIceProtocol enumerated type provides a set of DOMString values representing the names of the transport protocols ICE candidates can use. These strings are taken directly from the candidate a-line in SDP.
trans-unit.target: 的的WebRTC API的 RTCIceProtocol 枚举类型提供了一组 DOMString 代表运输协议ICE考生可以使用的名称值。这些字符串直接取自SDP中的 candidate a行。

trans-unit.source: The WebRTC API'sRTCIceTcpCandidateType enumerated type provides a set of DOMString values representing the types of TCP candidates.
trans-unit.target: 所述的WebRTC API的 RTCIceTcpCandidateType 枚举类型提供一组 DOMString 代表类型的TCP候选的值。

trans-unit.source: The WebRTC API'sRTCOfferAnswerOptions dictionary is used to specify options that configure and control the process of creating WebRTC offers or answers. It's used as the base type for the options parameter when calling createOffer() or createAnswer() on an RTCPeerConnection.
trans-unit.target: 的的WebRTC API的 RTCOfferAnswerOptions 字典用于指定选项，配置和控制建立的WebRTC要约或答案的过程。它用作基础类型的 options 时调用参数 createOffer() 或 createAnswer() 上的 RTCPeerConnection 。

trans-unit.source: The WebRTC API interface RTCTrackEvent represents the track event, which is sent when a new MediaStreamTrack is added to an RTCRtpReceiver which is part of the RTCPeerConnection. The target is the RTCPeerConnection object to which the track is being added.
trans-unit.target: 所述的WebRTC API接口 RTCTrackEvent 表示 track 情况下，当一个新的被发送 MediaStreamTrack 被添加到 RTCRtpReceiver 其是一部分 RTCPeerConnection 。目标是要添加轨道的 RTCPeerConnection 对象。

trans-unit.source: The Window interface is also augmented by this API to offer the new requestIdleCallback() and cancelIdleCallback() methods.
trans-unit.target: 该 Window 界面也由这个API扩展以提供新的 requestIdleCallback() 和 cancelIdleCallback() 方法。

trans-unit.source: The Window.history property returning the history of the current session.
trans-unit.target: 该 Window.history 属性返回当前会话的历史记录。

trans-unit.source: The window.performance property returns a Performance object. While this interface is defined by the High Resolution Time API, the Navigation Timing API adds two properties: timing and navigation, of the types below.
trans-unit.target: 该 window.performance 属性返回 Performance 对象。虽然此接口是由“高分辨率时间” API定义的，但是“导航计时” API添加了以下类型的两个属性：“ timing 和“ navigation 。

trans-unit.source: The Worker, ServiceWorker, and SharedWorker interfaces, which are all based upon AbstractWorker.
trans-unit.target: 该 Worker ， ServiceWorker 和 SharedWorker 接口，这些都是基于 AbstractWorker 。

trans-unit.source: The response is a JavaScript ArrayBuffer containing binary data.
trans-unit.target: 所述 response 是一个JavaScript ArrayBuffer 包含的二进制数据。

trans-unit.source: The "disconnected" state can also occur when the transport has finished checking all existing candidate pairs and has not found a pair that will work—or a valid pair was found but rejected due to consent to use the pair being denied. In this scenario, the transport is still continuing to gather candidates, and/or to wait for candidates to be sent by the remote peer.
trans-unit.target: 该 "disconnected" 当运输检查完所有现存的候选对，并没有发现一对将工作或有效的对已找到，但由于拒绝同意使用对被拒绝，也可能发生的状态。在这种情况下，传输仍在继续收集候选项，和/或等待远程对等方发送候选项。

trans-unit.source: The "only-if-cached" mode can only be used if the request's mode is "same-origin". Cached redirects will be followed if the request's redirect property is "follow" and the redirects do not violate the "same-origin" mode.
trans-unit.target: 在 "only-if-cached" 模式只能用于如果请求的 mode 是 "same-origin" 。如果请求的 redirect 属性为 "follow" ，并且重定向不违反 "same-origin" 模式，则将执行缓存的重定向。

trans-unit.source: The "paused" play state supersedes the "finished" play state; if the animation is both paused and finished, the "paused" state is the one that will be reported. You can force the animation into the "finished" state by setting its startTime to document.timeline.currentTime - (Animation.currentTime * Animation.playbackRate).
trans-unit.target: 在 "paused" 播放状态取代了 "finished" 播放状态; 如果动画既暂停又结束，则将报告 "paused" 状态。您可以通过将动画的 startTime 设置为 document.timeline.currentTime - (Animation.currentTime * Animation.playbackRate) 动画 .currentTime * 动画 .playbackRate）来强制动画进入 "finished" 状态。

trans-unit.source: The <basefont> element has been deprecated in HTML4 and removed in HTML5. This latest specification requires that this element implements HTMLUnknownElement rather than HTMLBaseFontElement.
trans-unit.target: 所述 <basefont> 元素已被弃用在HTML4和HTML5除去。最新规范要求该元素实现 HTMLUnknownElement 而不是 HTMLBaseFontElement 。

trans-unit.source: The <canvas> element
trans-unit.target: 所述 <canvas> 元素

trans-unit.source: The <canvas> element can be styled just like any normal image (margin, border, background…). These rules, however, don't affect the actual drawing on the canvas. We'll see how this is done in a dedicated chapter of this tutorial. When no styling rules are applied to the canvas it will initially be fully transparent.
trans-unit.target: 所述 <canvas> 元素可样式就像任何正常的图像（ margin ， border ， background ...）。但是，这些规则不会影响画布上的实际绘图。我们将在本教程的专用章节中了解如何完成此操作。当没有样式规则应用于画布时，它最初将是完全透明的。

trans-unit.source: The <canvas> element differs from an <img> tag in that, like for <video>, <audio>, or <picture> elements, it is easy to define some fallback content, to be displayed in older browsers not supporting it, like versions of Internet Explorer earlier than version 9 or textual browsers. You should always provide fallback content to be displayed by those browsers.
trans-unit.target: 所述 <canvas> 从一个元素的不同 <img> 标记中所，像 <video> ， <audio> 或 <picture> 元素，很容易定义一些回退的内容，将要显示在旧的浏览器不支持它，例如版本9之前的Internet Explorer版本或文字浏览器。您应该始终提供这些浏览器显示的后备内容。

trans-unit.source: The <canvas> element is also used by WebGL to draw hardware-accelerated 3D graphics on web pages.
trans-unit.target: 所述 <canvas> 元件也使用WebGL的绘制硬件加速3D图形上的网页。

trans-unit.source: The <font> tag is not supported in HTML5 since it is now obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 所述 <font> 标签没有在HTML5支持，因为它现在是过时的。

trans-unit.source: The <isindex> element has been deprecated in HTML4 and removed in HTML5. This latest specification requires that this element implements HTMLUnknownElement rather than HTMLIsIndexElement.
trans-unit.target: 所述 <isindex> 元素已被弃用在HTML4和HTML5除去。最新规范要求该元素实现 HTMLUnknownElement 而不是 HTMLIsIndexElement 。

trans-unit.source: The <select> element is set to allow multiple items to be selected, and it is 7 rows tall. Note also the <button>, whose role it is to trigger fetching the HTMLCollection of selected elements using the selected property.
trans-unit.target: 所述 <select> 元素被设置为允许选择多个项，它是7行高。还要注意 <button> ，其作用是触发使用 selected 属性来获取选定元素的 HTMLCollection 。

trans-unit.source: The <video> element with the id "received_video" will present video received from the connected user. We specify the autoplay attribute, ensuring once the video starts arriving, it immediately plays. This removes any need to explicitly handle playback in our code. The "local_video" <video> element presents a preview of the user's camera; specifiying the muted attribute, as we don't need to hear local audio in this preview panel.
trans-unit.target: id “ received_video ” 的 <video> 元素将呈现从连接的用户接收的视频。我们指定 autoplay 属性，以确保视频开始播放后立即播放。这消除了在我们的代码中显式处理回放的任何需要。 “ local_video ” <video> 元素显示用户摄像机的预览；指定 muted 属性，因为我们不需要在此预览面板中收听本地音频。

trans-unit.source: The 'paste' command return false not only if the feature is unavailable, but also if the script calling it has insufficient privileges to perform the action [1]
trans-unit.target: 在 'paste' 命令返回 false 不只有在该功能不可用，而且如果脚本调用它没有足够的权限来执行操作[1]

trans-unit.source: The 'paste' command return false not only if the feature is unavailable, but also if the script calling it has insufficient privileges to perform the action.
trans-unit.target: 在 'paste' 命令返回 false 不只有在该功能不可用，而且如果脚本调用它有足够的权限来执行的操作。

trans-unit.source: The --enable-automation or the --headless flag is used.
trans-unit.target: 使用 --enable-automation 或 --headless 标志。

trans-unit.source: The .then() promise function is used to chain a success case onto our promise structure. When the promise resolves successfully, the code inside it executes.
trans-unit.target: 的 .then() 承诺函数用于链成功的情况下到我们的承诺结构。当承诺成功解析后，其内部的代码就会执行。

trans-unit.source: The FileReaderresult property returns the file's contents. This property is only valid after the read operation is complete, and the format of the data depends on which of the methods was used to initiate the read operation.
trans-unit.target: 该 FileReader result 属性返回文件的内容。此属性仅在读取操作完成后才有效，并且数据的格式取决于用于启动读取操作的方法。

trans-unit.source: The FormData object lets you compile a set of key/value pairs to send using XMLHttpRequest. It is primarily intended for use in sending form data, but can be used independently from forms in order to transmit keyed data. The transmitted data is in the same format that the form's submit() method would use to send the data if the form's encoding type were set to multipart/form-data.
trans-unit.target: 该 FormData 对象允许您编译一组键/值对使用发送 XMLHttpRequest 。它主要用于发送表单数据，但可以独立于表单使用以传输密钥数据。如果将表单的编码类型设置为 multipart/form-data ，则传输的数据格式与表单的 submit() 方法将用于发送数据的格式相同。

trans-unit.source: The PerformanceEntry interface encapsulates a single performance entry i.e. a single performance metric. This interface has four properties and a JSON serializer (toJSON(). The following example shows the use of these properties.
trans-unit.target: 该 PerformanceEntry 接口封装了一个性能项即单一性能指标。该接口具有四个属性和一个JSON 序列化器（ toJSON() 。以下示例显示这些属性的用法。

trans-unit.source: The Response() constructor allows you to create a custom response. In this case, we are just returning a simple text string:
trans-unit.target: 该 Response() 构造函数允许您创建一个自定义的响应。在这种情况下，我们只是返回一个简单的文本字符串：

trans-unit.source: The Function.prototype.bind() method lets you specify the value that should be used as this for all calls to a given function. This lets you easily bypass problems where it's unclear what this will be, depending on the context from which your function was called. Note, however, that you'll need to keep a reference to the listener around so you can remove it later.
trans-unit.target: 该 Function.prototype.bind() 方法可以让你指定要用作值 this 对于一个给定函数的调用。这很容易让你绕过问题，它目前还不清楚是什么 this 将取决于从你的函数被调用的上下文。但是请注意，您需要保留对侦听器的引用，以便以后将其删除。

trans-unit.source: The addstream event and its type, MediaStreamEvent.
trans-unit.target: 该 addstream 事件及其类型， MediaStreamEvent 。

trans-unit.source: The addtrack event and its type, MediaStreamTrackEvent.
trans-unit.target: 该 addtrack 事件及其类型， MediaStreamTrackEvent 。

trans-unit.source: The addtrack event is called whenever a new track is added to the media element whose audio tracks are represented by the AudioTrackList object. This happens when tracks are added to the element when the media is first attached to the element; one addtrack event will occur for each audio track in the media resource.
trans-unit.target: 所述 addtrack 每当一个新的轨道被添加到媒体元素，其音轨由表示事件被称为 AudioTrackList 对象。当首次将媒体附着到元素时，在将轨道添加到元素时会发生这种情况。媒体资源中的每个音轨都会发生一个 addtrack 事件。

trans-unit.source: The addtrack event is called whenever a new track is added to the media element whose video tracks are represented by the VideoTrackList object. This happens when tracks are added to the element when the media is first attached to the element; one addtrack event will occur for each video track in the media resource.
trans-unit.target: 所述 addtrack 每当一个新的轨道被添加到媒体元素，其视频轨道由表示事件被称为 VideoTrackList 对象。当首次将媒体附着到元素时，在将轨道添加到元素时会发生这种情况。媒体资源中的每个视频轨道都会发生一个 addtrack 事件。

trans-unit.source: The animationcancel event this event handler is triggered by.
trans-unit.target: 触发此事件处理程序的 animationcancel 事件。

trans-unit.source: The animationend event this event handler is triggered by
trans-unit.target: 此事件处理程序触发的 animationend 事件

trans-unit.source: The animationiteration event this event handler is triggered by.
trans-unit.target: 触发此事件处理程序的 animationiteration 事件。

trans-unit.source: The animationstart event
trans-unit.target: 该 animationstart 事件

trans-unit.source: The animationstart event this event handler is triggered by.
trans-unit.target: 触发此事件处理程序的 animationstart 事件。

trans-unit.source: The cancel event
trans-unit.target: 在 cancel 事件

trans-unit.source: The close event and its type, Event.
trans-unit.target: 该 close 事件及其类型， Event 。

trans-unit.source: The close event is fired after all transactions have been aborted and the connection has been closed.
trans-unit.target: 在 close 所有交易中断后事件被触发，连接已经关闭。

trans-unit.source: The complete event (of type OfflineAudioCompletionEvent) is raised when the rendering is finished, containing the resulting AudioBuffer in its renderedBuffer property.
trans-unit.target: 的 complete 事件（类型的 OfflineAudioCompletionEvent 当绘制完成时，含有所得）上升 AudioBuffer 在其 renderedBuffer 属性。

trans-unit.source: The connectionstatechange event and its type, Event.
trans-unit.target: 该 connectionstatechange 事件及其类型， Event 。

trans-unit.source: The datachannel event and its type, RTCDataChannelEvent.
trans-unit.target: 该 datachannel 事件及其类型， RTCDataChannelEvent 。

trans-unit.source: The datachannel event includes, in its channel property, a reference to a RTCDataChannel representing the remote peer's end of the channel. This is saved, and we set up, on the channel, event listeners for the events we want to handle. Once this is done, our handleReceiveMessage() method will be called each time data is received by the remote peer, and the handleReceiveChannelStatusChange() method will be called any time the channel's connection state changes, so we can react when the channel is fully opened and when it's closed.
trans-unit.target: 所述 datachannel 事件包括在其信道特性，所涉及的参考 RTCDataChannel 代表信道的远端对等体的端部。这将被保存，并且我们在通道上设置了要处理的事件的事件侦听器。一旦做到这一点，我们的 handleReceiveMessage() 方法将被称为是由远程对等体接收到的每个时间数据，并且将 handleReceiveChannelStatusChange() 方法将被调用的任何时刻的信道的连接状态的变化，因此，我们可以反应当信道被完全打开以及何时关闭。

trans-unit.source: The devicechange event and its type, Event.
trans-unit.target: 该 devicechange 事件及其类型， Event 。

trans-unit.source: The drop event is fired when the user drops the file(s). In the following drop handler, if the browser supports DataTransferItemList interface, the getAsFile() method is used to access each file; otherwise the DataTransfer interface's files property is used to access each file.
trans-unit.target: 该 drop 的时候用户放下文件（一个或多个）事件。在以下放置处理程序中，如果浏览器支持 DataTransferItemList 接口，则 getAsFile() 方法用于访问每个文件；否则，将使用 DataTransfer 接口的 files 属性访问每个文件。

trans-unit.source: The ended event
trans-unit.target: 在 ended 事件

trans-unit.source: The ended event and its type, Event.
trans-unit.target: 在 ended 事件及其类型， Event 。

trans-unit.source: The ended event is only sent to a node configured to loop automatically when the node is stopped using its stop() method. This is the case, for example, when using an AudioBufferSourceNode with its loop property set to true.
trans-unit.target: 所述 ended 事件只发送到被配置为循环时自动节点使用其停止的节点 stop() 方法。例如，当使用 AudioBufferSourceNode 并将其 loop 属性设置为 true 时，就是这种情况。

trans-unit.source: The error event and its type, ErrorEvent.
trans-unit.target: 该 error 事件及其类型， ErrorEvent 。

trans-unit.source: The gatheringstatechange event and its type, Event.
trans-unit.target: 该 gatheringstatechange 事件及其类型， Event 。

trans-unit.source: The icecandidate event and its type, RTCPeerConnectionIceEvent.
trans-unit.target: 该 icecandidate 事件及其类型， RTCPeerConnectionIceEvent 。

trans-unit.source: The iceconnectionstatechange event and its type, Event.
trans-unit.target: 该 iceconnectionstatechange 事件及其类型， Event 。

trans-unit.source: The iceconnectionstatechange event is sent by the ICE layer to let you know about changes to the state of the ICE connection. This can help you know when the connection has failed, or been lost. We'll look at the code for this example in ICE connection state below.
trans-unit.target: 该 iceconnectionstatechange 事件是由冰层发送到让你了解更改ICE连接的状态。这可以帮助您了解连接失败或丢失的时间。我们将在下面的ICE连接状态下查看此示例的代码。

trans-unit.source: The icegatheringstatechange event and its type, Event.
trans-unit.target: 该 icegatheringstatechange 事件及其类型， Event 。

trans-unit.source: The identityresult event and its type, RTCIdentityEvent.
trans-unit.target: 该 identityresult 事件及其类型， RTCIdentityEvent 。

trans-unit.source: The idpassertionerror event and its type, RTCIdentityErrorEvent.
trans-unit.target: 该 idpassertionerror 事件及其类型， RTCIdentityErrorEvent 。

trans-unit.source: The idpvalidationerror event and its type, RTCIdentityErrorEvent.
trans-unit.target: 该 idpvalidationerror 事件及其类型， RTCIdentityErrorEvent 。

trans-unit.source: The languagechange event and its type, Event.
trans-unit.target: 该 languagechange 事件及其类型， Event 。

trans-unit.source: The message event and its type, MessageEvent.
trans-unit.target: 该 message 事件和它的类型， MessageEvent 事件。

trans-unit.source: The mute event and its type, Event.
trans-unit.target: 在 mute 事件及其类型， Event 。

trans-unit.source: The negotiationneeded event and its type, Event.
trans-unit.target: 该 negotiationneeded 事件及其类型， Event 。

trans-unit.source: The open event and its type, Event.
trans-unit.target: 在 open 活动及其类型， Event 。

trans-unit.source: The orientationchange event is triggered each time the device change the orientation of the screen and the orientation itself can be read with the Screen.orientation property.
trans-unit.target: 该 orientationchange 事件每次设备改变屏幕的方向触发和方位本身可以与读取 Screen.orientation 财产。

trans-unit.source: The overconstrained event and its type, MediaStreamErrorEvent.
trans-unit.target: 该 overconstrained 事件及其类型， MediaStreamErrorEvent 。

trans-unit.source: The paymentmethodchange event is triggered by a user-agent controlled interaction (i.e., the end-user switches from a debit to a credit card in the payment UI). To make sure you receive the event, you should add event listeners to PaymentRequest object after instantiation, but before you call show().
trans-unit.target: 所述 paymentmethodchange 事件是由用户代理控制的相互作用（即，最终用户从借记信用卡在支付UI交换机）触发。为了确保收到事件，应在实例化之后但调用 show() 之前，将事件侦听器添加到 PaymentRequest 对象。

trans-unit.source: The peeridentity event and its type, Event.
trans-unit.target: 对等 peeridentity 事件及其类型 Event 。

trans-unit.source: The pointerdown event
trans-unit.target: 该 pointerdown 事件

trans-unit.source: The pointerdown event is fired when a pointer (mouse, pen/stylus or touch point on a touchscreen) makes contact with the contact surface. In this application, the event's state must be cached in case this down event is part of a two-pointer pinch/zoom gesture.
trans-unit.target: 所述 pointerdown 当指示器（在触摸屏上鼠标，笔/触笔或触摸点）与接触事件被触发接触表面。在此应用程序中，必须将事件的状态缓存起来，以防此向下事件是两指针收缩/缩放手势的一部分。

trans-unit.source: The pointerdown event is fired when a pointer (mouse, pen/stylus or touch point on a touchscreen) makes contact with the contact surface. The event's state must be cached, in case this down event is part of a multi-touch interaction.
trans-unit.target: 所述 pointerdown 当指示器（在触摸屏上鼠标，笔/触笔或触摸点）与接触事件被触发接触表面。如果此向下事件是多点触摸交互的一部分，则必须缓存事件的状态。

trans-unit.source: The pointermove event handler detects if a user is invoking a two-pointer pinch/zoom gesture. If two pointers are down, and the distance between the pointers is increasing (signifying a pinch out or zoom in), the element's background color is changed to pink, and if the distance between the pointers is decreasing (a pinch in or zoom out), the background color is changed to lightblue. In a more sophisticated application, pinch in or pinch out determination could be used to apply application-specific semantics.
trans-unit.target: 该 pointermove 事件处理程序检测用户是否正在调用两个指针的捏合/缩放手势。如果两个指针向下，并且指针之间的距离增加（表示缩小或放大），则元素的背景色将变为 pink ，并且如果指针之间的距离减小（缩小或缩小） ，背景颜色更改为 lightblue 。在更复杂的应用程序中，可以使用捏或捏确定来应用特定于应用程序的语义。

trans-unit.source: The pointermove handler is called when the pointer moves. It may be called multiple times (for example, if the user moves the pointer) before a different event type is fired.
trans-unit.target: 该 pointermove 处理函数指针移动时。在激发不同的事件类型之前，它可能被多次调用（例如，如果用户移动了指针）。

trans-unit.source: The pointerup event is fired when a pointer is raised from the contact surface. When this occurs, the event is removed from the associated event cache.
trans-unit.target: 所述 pointerup 当指针从升起事件被触发接触表面。发生这种情况时，将从关联的事件缓存中删除该事件。

trans-unit.source: The pointerup event is fired when a pointer is raised from the contact surface. When this occurs, the event is removed from the event cache and the target element's background color and border are restored to their original values.
trans-unit.target: 所述 pointerup 当指针从升起事件被触发接触表面。发生这种情况时，将从事件缓存中删除事件，并将目标元素的背景色和边框恢复为其原始值。

trans-unit.source: The removetrack event and its type, MediaStreamTrackEvent.
trans-unit.target: 该 removetrack 事件及其类型， MediaStreamTrackEvent 。

trans-unit.source: The selectedcandidatepair event and its type, Event.
trans-unit.target: 该 selectedcandidatepair 事件及其类型， Event 。

trans-unit.source: The signalingstatechange event and its type, Event.
trans-unit.target: 该 signalingstatechange 事件及其类型， Event 。

trans-unit.source: The statechange event and its type, Event.
trans-unit.target: 该 statechange 事件及其类型， Event 。

trans-unit.source: The touchend handler restores the event target's background color back to its original color.
trans-unit.target: 该 touchend 处理器恢复活动对象的背景颜色恢复到原来的颜色。

trans-unit.source: The touchmove handler calls preventDefault() for the same reason mentioned above, and invokes the pinch/zoom handler.
trans-unit.target: 出于与上述相同的原因， touchmove 处理程序将调用 preventDefault() ，并调用收缩/缩放处理程序。

trans-unit.source: The touchstart event handler caches touch points to support 2-touch gestures. It also calls preventDefault() to keep the browser from applying further event handling (for example, mouse event emulation).
trans-unit.target: 该 touchstart 事件处理程序缓存的接触点，支持2点触摸手势。它还调用 preventDefault() 来防止浏览器应用进一步的事件处理（例如，鼠标事件仿真）。

trans-unit.source: The track event and its type, RTCTrackEvent.
trans-unit.target: 该 track 事件及其类型， RTCTrackEvent 。

trans-unit.source: The track event is sent to the RTCPeerConnection when a new track has been added to the connection. By the time the track event is delivered to the RTCPeerConnection's ontrack handler, the new media has completed its negotiation for a specific RTCRtpReceiver (which is specified by the receiver property).
trans-unit.target: 将新的轨道添加到连接后， RTCPeerConnection track 事件发送到RTCPeerConnection。在将 track 事件传递到 RTCPeerConnection 的 ontrack 处理程序时，新媒体已经完成了对特定 RTCRtpReceiver 的协商（由 receiver 属性指定）。

trans-unit.source: The transitioncancel event this event handler is triggered by
trans-unit.target: 此事件处理程序触发的 transitioncancel 事件

trans-unit.source: The transitionend event this event handler is triggered by
trans-unit.target: 此事件处理程序触发的 transitionend 事件

trans-unit.source: The transitionrun event, which occurs when the transition begins
trans-unit.target: 的 transitionrun 事件，过渡开始时发生

trans-unit.source: The unmute event and its type, Event.
trans-unit.target: 在 unmute 事件及其类型， Event 。

trans-unit.source: The src attribute is empty or null.
trans-unit.target: 在 src 属性为空或 null 。

trans-unit.source: The Performance interface has two methods. The now() method returns a DOMHighResTimeStamp whose value that depends on the navigation start and scope. If the scope is a window, the value is the time the browser context was created and if the scope is a worker, the value is the time the worker was created.
trans-unit.target: 该 Performance 接口有两个方法。在 now() 方法返回一个 DOMHighResTimeStamp 其依赖于值 navigation start 和范围。如果范围是窗口，则值是创建浏览器上下文的时间；如果范围是 worker ，则值是创建工作器的时间。

trans-unit.source: The Performance interface has two properties. The timing property returns a PerformanceTiming object containing latency-related performance information such as the start of navigation time, start and end times for redirects, start and end times for responses, etc.
trans-unit.target: 该 Performance 接口有两个属性。的 timing 属性返回一个 PerformanceTiming 含有延迟相关的性能信息的对象诸如导航时间的开始，开始和重定向结束时间，开始和响应等结束时间

trans-unit.source: The navigation property returns a PerformanceNavigation object representing the type of navigation that occurs in the given browsing context, such as the page was navigated to from history, the page was navigated to by following a link, etc.
trans-unit.target: 的 navigation 属性返回 PerformanceNavigation 表示发生在给定的浏览上下文导航的对象类型，如页从历史导航到，该页面由以下一个链接等导航到

trans-unit.source: The PerformanceResourceTiming interface also includes several network timing properties. The redirectStart and redirectEnd properties return timestamps for redirect start and end times, respectively. Likewise, the The domainLookupStart and domainLookupEnd properties return timestamps for DNS lookup start and end times, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 所述 PerformanceResourceTiming 接口还包括若干个网络定时特性。该 redirectStart 和 redirectEnd 属性返回 timestamps 分别为重定向开始和结束时间。同样， domainLookupStart 和 domainLookupEnd 属性分别返回DNS查找开始和结束时间的 timestamps 。

trans-unit.source: The dragover event will fire at the element the mouse is pointing at. Naturally, you may need to move the insertion marker around a dragover event as well. You can use the event's clientX and clientY properties as with other mouse events to determine the location of the mouse pointer.
trans-unit.target: 该 dragover 事件会触发在鼠标所指向的元素。自然，您可能还需要围绕 dragover 事件移动插入标记。您可以将事件的 clientX 和 clientY 属性与其他鼠标事件一起使用，以确定鼠标指针的位置。

trans-unit.source: The draggable attribute is set to true, so this element becomes draggable. If this attribute were omitted or set to false, the element would not be dragged, and instead, the text would be selected. The draggable attribute may be used on any element, including images and links. However, for these last two, the default value is true, so you would only use the draggable attribute with a value of false to disable dragging of these elements.
trans-unit.target: 该 draggable 属性设置为true，那么这个元素变为可拖动。如果忽略此属性或将其设置为false，则不会拖动该元素，而是选择文本。所述 draggable 属性可以由任何元件上使用，包括图像和链接。但是，对于最后两个，默认值为true，因此您将仅使用值为 false 的 draggable 属性来禁用对这些元素的拖动。

trans-unit.source: The getElementsByName() method of the document object returns a NodeList Collection of elements with a given name in the document.
trans-unit.target: 所述 getElementsByName() 的方法的 document 对象返回一个 NodeList 与给定元素的集合 name 在文档中。

trans-unit.source: The iv is as supplied to SubtleCrypto.encrypt(); the ctBuffer is the ciphertext returned from SubtleCrypto.encrypt().
trans-unit.target: 所述 iv 作为供给到 SubtleCrypto.encrypt() ; 所述 ctBuffer 是从返回的密文 SubtleCrypto.encrypt() 。

trans-unit.source: The ANGLE_instanced_arrays.drawArraysInstancedANGLE() method of the WebGL API renders primitives from array data like the gl.drawArrays() method. In addition, it can execute multiple instances of the range of elements.
trans-unit.target: 所述 ANGLE_instanced_arrays.drawArraysInstancedANGLE() 的方法的WebGL API渲染从像阵列数据原语 gl.drawArrays() 方法。此外，它可以执行元素范围的多个实例。

trans-unit.source: The ANGLE_instanced_arrays extension is part of the WebGL API and allows to draw the same object, or groups of similar objects multiple times, if they share the same vertex data, primitive count and type.
trans-unit.target: 所述 ANGLE_instanced_arrays 扩展是的一部分的WebGL API，并允许绘制相同的对象，或类似的对象组多次，如果它们共享相同的顶点数据，原始计数和类型。

trans-unit.source: The AbstractWorker.onerror property of the AbstractWorker interface represents an EventHandler, that is a function to be called when the error event occurs and bubbles through the Worker.
trans-unit.target: AbstractWorker 接口的 AbstractWorker .onerror 属性表示 EventHandler ，它是发生 error 事件并在 Worker 中冒泡时要调用的函数。

trans-unit.source: The Animation.startTime property of the Animation interface is a double-precision floating-point value which indicates the scheduled time when an animation's playback should begin.
trans-unit.target: Animation 接口的 Animation.startTime 属性是一个双精度浮点值，它指示应开始播放动画的预定时间。

trans-unit.source: The Animation.timeline property of the Animation interface returns or sets the timeline associated with this animation. A timeline is a source of time values for synchronization purposes, and is an AnimationTimeline-based object. By default, the animation's timeline and the Document's timeline are the same.
trans-unit.target: Animation 接口的 Animation.timeline 属性返回或设置与此动画关联的 timeline 。时间轴是用于同步目的的时间值的来源，并且是基于 AnimationTimeline 的对象。默认情况下，动画的时间轴和 Document 的时间轴相同。

trans-unit.source: The Animation.currentTime property of the Web Animations API returns and sets the current time value of the animation in milliseconds, whether running or paused.
trans-unit.target: Web动画API的 Animation .currentTime 属性返回并设置动画的当前时间值（以毫秒为单位），无论是运行还是暂停。

trans-unit.source: The Animation.effect property of the Web Animations API gets and sets the target effect of an animation. The target effect may be either an effect object of a type based on AnimationEffectReadOnly, such as KeyframeEffect, or null.
trans-unit.target: Web Animations API的 Animation .effect 属性获取并设置动画的目标效果。目标效果可以是基于 AnimationEffectReadOnly 的类型的效果对象，例如 KeyframeEffect 或 null 。

trans-unit.source: The Animation.finished read-only property of the Web Animations API returns a Promise which resolves once the animation has finished playing.
trans-unit.target: Web Animations API的 Animation .finished 只读属性返回一个 Promise ，一旦完成播放，该Promise便会解析。

trans-unit.source: The Animation.id property of the Web Animations API returns or sets a string used to identify the animation.
trans-unit.target: Web Animations API的 Animation .id 属性返回或设置用于标识动画的字符串。

trans-unit.source: The Animation.playState property of the Web Animations API returns and sets an enumerated value describing the playback state of an animation.
trans-unit.target: Web Animations API的 Animation .playState 属性返回并设置一个描述动画播放状态的枚举值。

trans-unit.source: The Animation.playbackRate property of the Web Animations API returns or sets the playback rate of the animation.
trans-unit.target: Web动画API的 Animation .playbackRate 属性返回或设置动画的播放速率。

trans-unit.source: The AnimationEvent() constructor returns a newly created AnimationEvent, representing an event in relation with an animation.
trans-unit.target: 所述 AnimationEvent() 构造函数返回一个新创建的 AnimationEvent ，代表相对于与动画的事件。

trans-unit.source: The AnimationEvent.animationName read-only property is a DOMString containing the value of the animation-name CSS property associated with the transition.
trans-unit.target: 所述 AnimationEvent.animationName 只读属性是一个 DOMString 包含的值 animation-name 与所述转变相关联的CSS属性。

trans-unit.source: The AnimationEvent.elapsedTime read-only property is a float giving the amount of time the animation has been running, in seconds, when this event fired, excluding any time the animation was paused. For an "animationstart" event, elapsedTime is 0.0 unless there was a negative value for animation-delay, in which case the event will be fired with elapsedTime containing (-1 * delay).
trans-unit.target: 该 AnimationEvent.elapsedTime 只读属性是一个 float 给动画已经运行，在几秒钟内，当这个事件发射，不包括动画暂停任何时候的时间量。对于 "animationstart" 事件，除非 animation-delay 的值为负，否则 elapsedTime 为 0.0 ，在这种情况下，将使用 elapsedTime 包含 (-1 * delay ) 的事件来触发该事件。

trans-unit.source: The AnimationEvent.initAnimationEvent() method Initializes an animation event created using the deprecated Document.createEvent("AnimationEvent") method.
trans-unit.target: 所述 AnimationEvent.initAnimationEvent() 方法初始化使用过时的创建的动画事件 Document.createEvent("AnimationEvent") 方法。

trans-unit.source: The AnimationEvent.pseudoElement read-only property is a DOMString, starting with '::', containing the name of the pseudo-element the animation runs on. If the animation doesn't run on a pseudo-element but on the element, an empty string: ''.
trans-unit.target: 该 AnimationEvent.pseudoElement 只读属性是一个 DOMString ，从 '::' ，包含的名字伪元素的动画运行。如果动画不是在伪元素上而是在元素上运行，则为空字符串： '' .

trans-unit.source: The Attr.localName read-only property returns the local part of the qualified name of an element.
trans-unit.target: 该 Attr.localName 只读属性返回元素的限定名称的本地部分。

trans-unit.source: The Attr.namespaceURI read-only property returns the namespace URI of the attribute, or null if the element is not in a namespace.
trans-unit.target: 该 Attr.namespaceURI 只读属性返回属性的名称空间URI，或者 null 如果元素是不是在一个命名空间。

trans-unit.source: The Attr.prefix read-only property returns the namespace prefix of the specified attribute, or null if no prefix is specified.
trans-unit.target: 该 Attr.prefix 只读属性返回指定属性的命名空间前缀，或 null ，如果未指定任何前缀。

trans-unit.source: The AudioContextLatencyCategory type is an enumerated set of strings which are used to select one of a number of default values for acceptable maximum latency of an audio context. By using these strings rather than a numeric value when specifying a latency to a AudioContext, you can allow the user agent to select an appropriate latency for your use case that makes sense on the device on which your content is being used.
trans-unit.target: 所述 AudioContextLatencyCategory 类型是一系列枚举其用于选择多个用于音频上下文的可接受的最大等待时间的默认值中的一个串。通过在指定 AudioContext 的延迟时使用这些字符串而不是数字值，可以允许用户代理为您的用例选择适当的延迟，该延迟在使用您的内容的设备上有意义。

trans-unit.source: The AudioContextOptions dictionary is used to provide options when instantiating a new AudioContext.
trans-unit.target: 该 AudioContextOptions 字典使用实例化一个新时提供的选项 AudioContext 。

trans-unit.source: The AudioContextOptions dictionary is used to specify configuration options when constructing a new AudioContext object to represent a graph of web audio nodes. It is only used when calling the AudioContext() constructor.
trans-unit.target: 当构造新的 AudioContext 对象以表示Web音频节点图时， AudioContextOptions 词典用于指定配置选项。仅在调用 AudioContext() 构造函数时使用。

trans-unit.source: The Blob() constructor returns a new Blob object. The content of the blob consists of the concatenation of the values given in the parameter array.
trans-unit.target: 将 Blob() 构造函数返回一个新 Blob 对象。Blob的内容由参数数组中给定的值的串联组成。

trans-unit.source: The BlobEvent() constructor returns a newly created BlobEvent object with an associated Blob.
trans-unit.target: 所述 BlobEvent() 构造函数返回一个新创建的 BlobEvent 具有相关联的对象 Blob 。

trans-unit.source: The BlobEvent.data read-only property represents a Blob associated with the event.
trans-unit.target: 该 BlobEvent.data 只读属性表示 Blob 与事件相关联。

trans-unit.source: The BroadcastChannel() constructor creates a new BroadcastChannel and connects it to the underlying channel.
trans-unit.target: 该 BroadcastChannel() 构造函数创建一个新的 BroadcastChannel 并将其连接到底层信道。

trans-unit.source: The BroadcastChannel.onmessage event handler is a property that specifies the function to execute when a message event, of type MessageEvent, is received by this BroadcastChannel. Such an event is sent by the browser with a message broadcasted to the channel.
trans-unit.target: 所述 BroadcastChannel.onmessage 事件处理程序是，当一个指定的函数来执行的属性 message 的事件，类型的 MessageEvent 事件，是由该接收到的 BroadcastChannel 。浏览器将此类事件与广播到该频道的消息一起发送。

trans-unit.source: The BroadcastChannel interface represents a named channel that any browsing context of a given origin can subscribe to. It allows communication between different documents (in different windows, tabs, frames or iframes) of the same origin. Messages are broadcasted via a message event fired at all BroadcastChannel objects listening to the channel.
trans-unit.target: 该 BroadcastChannel 接口表示命名通道，任何浏览器上下文给定的起源可以订阅。它允许同一来源的不同文档（在不同的窗口，选项卡，框架或iframe中）之间进行通信。通过在侦听该频道的所有 BroadcastChannel 对象上触发的 message 事件来广播消息。

trans-unit.source: The CDATASection interface represents a CDATA section that can be used within XML to include extended portions of unescaped text. The symbols < and & don’t need escaping as they normally do when inside a CDATA section.
trans-unit.target: 所述 CDATASection 接口表示可以XML中使用，以包括未转义文本的延伸部分CDATA节。符号 < 和 & 不需要像在CDATA节中一样通常进行转义。

trans-unit.source: The CSS.escape() static method returns a DOMString containing the escaped string passed as parameter, mostly for use as part of a CSS selector.
trans-unit.target: 所述 CSS.escape() 静态方法返回一个 DOMString 含有作为参数传递，大多用作CSS选择的一部分的转义字符串。

trans-unit.source: The CSS.supports() static methods returns a Boolean value indicating if the browser supports a given CSS feature, or not.
trans-unit.target: 所述 CSS.supports() 静态方法返回一个 Boolean 值，它指示浏览器是否支持一个给定的CSS功能，或没有。

trans-unit.source: The CSS interface holds useful CSS-related methods. No object with this interface are implemented: it contains only static methods and therefore is a utilitarian interface.
trans-unit.target: 该 CSS 界面保存有用的CSS相关的方法。没有实现此接口的对象：它只包含静态方法，因此是一个实用的接口。

trans-unit.source: The CSSPrimitiveValue interface derives from the CSSValue interface and represents the current computed value of a CSS property.
trans-unit.target: 所述 CSSPrimitiveValue 从接口导出 CSSValue 接口和表示CSS属性的当前计算值。

trans-unit.source: The CSSRule.selectorText property gets the textual representation of the selector for the rule set. This is readonly in some browsers; to set stylesheet rules dynamically cross-browser, see Using dynamic styling information.
trans-unit.target: 该 CSSRule.selectorText 属性获取选择规则集的文字表述。在某些浏览器中这是只读的。要动态地跨浏览器设置样式表规则，请参阅使用动态样式信息。

trans-unit.source: The CSSStyleSheet.deleteRule() method removes a style rule from the current style sheet object.
trans-unit.target: 所述 CSSStyleSheet.deleteRule() 方法去除从当前样式表对象的样式规则。

trans-unit.source: The CSSValue interface represents the current computed value of a CSS property.
trans-unit.target: 所述 CSSValue 接口表示CSS属性的当前计算值。

trans-unit.source: The CSSValueList interface derives from the CSSValue interface and provides the abstraction of an ordered collection of CSS values.
trans-unit.target: 该 CSSValueList 从接口派生 CSSValue 接口，并提供了CSS值的有序集合的抽象。

trans-unit.source: The CanvasGradient interface represents an opaque object describing a gradient. It is returned by the methods CanvasRenderingContext2D.createLinearGradient() or CanvasRenderingContext2D.createRadialGradient().
trans-unit.target: 所述 CanvasGradient 接口表示不透明的对象描述的梯度。它由 CanvasRenderingContext2D.createLinearGradient() 或 CanvasRenderingContext2D.createRadialGradient() 方法返回。

trans-unit.source: The CanvasGradient.addColorStop() method adds a new color stop, defined by an offset and a color, to a given canvas gradient.
trans-unit.target: 所述 CanvasGradient .addColorStop() 方法增加了一个新的色标，由定义的 offset 和 color ，以给定的画布梯度。

trans-unit.source: The CanvasPattern interface represents an opaque object describing a pattern, based on an image, a canvas, or a video, created by the CanvasRenderingContext2D.createPattern() method.
trans-unit.target: 所述 CanvasPattern 接口表示不透明的对象描述一种模式，基于图像，帆布，或视频上，通过所创建的 CanvasRenderingContext2D.createPattern() 方法。

trans-unit.source: The CanvasPattern.setTransform() method uses an SVGMatrix object as the pattern's transformation matrix and invokes it on the pattern.
trans-unit.target: 所述 CanvasPattern .setTransform() 方法使用 SVGMatrix 对象作为图形的变换矩阵，并调用它上的图案。

trans-unit.source: The CanvasRenderingContext2D.canvas property is a read-only reference to the HTMLCanvasElement object that is associated with a given context. It might be null if there is no associated <canvas> element.
trans-unit.target: 所述 CanvasRenderingContext2D.canvas 属性是只读参照 HTMLCanvasElement ，其与给定的上下文相关联的对象。如果没有关联的 <canvas> 元素，则可能为 null 。

trans-unit.source: The CanvasRenderingContext2D.createImageData() method of the Canvas 2D API creates a new, blank ImageData object with the specified dimensions. All of the pixels in the new object are transparent black.
trans-unit.target: Canvas 2D API 的 CanvasRenderingContext2D.createImageData() 方法创建具有指定尺寸的新的空白 ImageData 对象。新对象中的所有像素均为透明黑色。

trans-unit.source: The CanvasRenderingContext2D.drawImage() method of the Canvas 2D API provides different ways to draw an image onto the canvas.
trans-unit.target: Canvas 2D API 的 CanvasRenderingContext2D.drawImage() 方法提供了将图像绘制到画布上的不同方法。

trans-unit.source: The CanvasRenderingContext2D.imageSmoothingQuality property of the Canvas 2D API allows you to set the quality of image smoothing.
trans-unit.target: Canvas 2D API 的 CanvasRenderingContext2D.imageSmoothingQuality 属性允许您设置图像平滑的质量。

trans-unit.source: The CanvasRenderingContext2D.miterLimit property of the Canvas 2D API sets the miter limit ratio in coordinate space units.
trans-unit.target: Canvas 2D API 的 CanvasRenderingContext2D.miterLimit 属性以坐标空间单位设置斜接限制比率。

trans-unit.source: The CanvasRenderingContext2D.strokeStyle property of the Canvas 2D API specifies the color, gradient, or pattern to use for the strokes (border lines) around shapes. The default is #000 (black).
trans-unit.target: Canvas 2D API 的 CanvasRenderingContext2D.strokeStyle 属性指定形状周围的笔触（边界线）使用的颜色，渐变或图案。默认值为 #000 （黑色）。

trans-unit.source: The CanvasRenderingContext2D.addHitRegion() method of the Canvas 2D API adds a hit region to the bitmap. This allows you to make hit detection easier, lets you route events to DOM elements, and makes it possible for users to explore the canvas without seeing it.
trans-unit.target: Canvas 2D API 的 CanvasRenderingContext2D .addHitRegion() 方法将一个点击区域添加到位图。这使您可以更轻松地进行命中检测，将事件路由到DOM元素，并使用户可以在不查看画布的情况下浏览画布。

trans-unit.source: The CanvasRenderingContext2D.arc() method of the Canvas 2D API adds a circular arc to the current sub-path.
trans-unit.target: Canvas 2D API 的 CanvasRenderingContext2D .arc() 方法将圆弧添加到当前子路径。

trans-unit.source: The CanvasRenderingContext2D.arcTo() method of the Canvas 2D API adds a circular arc to the current sub-path, using the given control points and radius. The arc is automatically connected to the path's latest point with a straight line, if necessary for the specified parameters.
trans-unit.target: Canvas 2D API 的 CanvasRenderingContext2D .arcTo() 方法使用给定的控制点和半径将圆弧添加到当前子路径。如果指定的参数必要，则圆弧将自动通过直线自动连接到路径的最新点。

trans-unit.source: The CanvasRenderingContext2D.beginPath() method of the Canvas 2D API starts a new path by emptying the list of sub-paths. Call this method when you want to create a new path.
trans-unit.target: Canvas 2D API 的 CanvasRenderingContext2D .beginPath() 方法通过清空子路径列表来启动新路径。要创建新路径时，请调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: The CanvasRenderingContext2D.bezierCurveTo() method of the Canvas 2D API adds a cubic Bézier curve to the current sub-path. It requires three points: the first two are control points and the third one is the end point. The starting point is the latest point in the current path, which can be changed using moveTo() before creating the Bézier curve.
trans-unit.target: Canvas 2D API 的 CanvasRenderingContext2D .bezierCurveTo() 方法将三次贝塞尔曲线添加到当前子路径。它需要三个点：前两个是控制点，第三个是端点。起点是当前路径中的最新点，可以在创建贝塞尔曲线之前使用 moveTo() 对其进行更改。

trans-unit.source: The CanvasRenderingContext2D.clearHitRegions() method of the Canvas 2D API removes all hit regions from the canvas.
trans-unit.target: Canvas 2D API 的 CanvasRenderingContext2D .clearHitRegions() 方法从画布中删除所有命中区域。

trans-unit.source: The CanvasRenderingContext2D.clearRect() method of the Canvas 2D API erases the pixels in a rectangular area by setting them to transparent black.
trans-unit.target: Canvas 2D API 的 CanvasRenderingContext2D .clearRect() 方法通过将像素设置为透明黑色来擦除矩形区域中的像素。

trans-unit.source: The CanvasRenderingContext2D.clip() method of the Canvas 2D API turns the current or given path into the current clipping region. It replaces any previous clipping region.
trans-unit.target: Canvas 2D API 的 CanvasRenderingContext2D .clip() 方法将当前路径或给定路径转换为当前剪切区域。它替换了以前的任何剪切区域。

trans-unit.source: The CanvasRenderingContext2D.closePath() method of the Canvas 2D API attempts to add a straight line from the current point to the start of the current sub-path. If the shape has already been closed or has only one point, this function does nothing.
trans-unit.target: Canvas 2D API 的 CanvasRenderingContext2D .closePath() 方法尝试从当前点到当前子路径的起点添加一条直线。如果形状已经闭合或只有一个点，则此功能不执行任何操作。

trans-unit.source: The CanvasRenderingContext2D.createLinearGradient() method of the Canvas 2D API creates a gradient along the line connecting two given coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Canvas 2D API 的 CanvasRenderingContext2D .createLinearGradient() 方法沿着连接两个给定坐标的直线创建一个渐变。

trans-unit.source: The CanvasRenderingContext2D.createPattern() method of the Canvas 2D API creates a pattern using the specified image and repetition. This method returns a CanvasPattern.
trans-unit.target: Canvas 2D API 的 CanvasRenderingContext2D .createPattern() 方法使用指定的图像和重复来创建模式。此方法返回 CanvasPattern 。

trans-unit.source: The CanvasRenderingContext2D.createRadialGradient() method of the Canvas 2D API creates a radial gradient using the size and coordinates of two circles.
trans-unit.target: Canvas 2D API 的 CanvasRenderingContext2D .createRadialGradient() 方法使用两个圆的大小和坐标来创建径向渐变。

trans-unit.source: The CanvasRenderingContext2D.currentTransform property of the Canvas 2D API returns or sets a DOMMatrix (current specification) or SVGMatrix (old specification) object for the current transformation matrix.
trans-unit.target: Canvas 2D API 的 CanvasRenderingContext2D .currentTransform 属性 为当前转换矩阵返回或设置 DOMMatrix （当前规范）或 SVGMatrix （旧规范）对象。

trans-unit.source: The CanvasRenderingContext2D.direction property of the Canvas 2D API specifies the current text direction used when drawing text.
trans-unit.target: Canvas 2D API 的 CanvasRenderingContext2D .direction 属性指定在绘制文本时使用的当前文本方向。

trans-unit.source: The CanvasRenderingContext2D.drawFocusIfNeeded() method of the Canvas 2D API draws a focus ring around the current or given path, if the specified element is focused.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定元素被聚焦，则Canvas 2D API 的 CanvasRenderingContext2D .drawFocusIfNeeded() 方法将在当前路径或给定路径周围绘制聚焦环。

trans-unit.source: The CanvasRenderingContext2D.ellipse() method of the Canvas 2D API adds an elliptical arc to the current sub-path.
trans-unit.target: Canvas 2D API 的 CanvasRenderingContext2D .ellipse() 方法将椭圆弧添加到当前子路径。

trans-unit.source: The CanvasRenderingContext2D.fill() method of the Canvas 2D API fills the current or given path with the current fillStyle.
trans-unit.target: Canvas 2D API 的 CanvasRenderingContext2D .fill() 方法使用当前 fillStyle 填充当前路径或给定路径。

trans-unit.source: The CanvasRenderingContext2D.fillRect() method of the Canvas 2D API draws a rectangle that is filled according to the current fillStyle.
trans-unit.target: Canvas 2D API 的 CanvasRenderingContext2D .fillRect() 方法绘制根据当前 fillStyle 填充的矩形。

trans-unit.source: The CanvasRenderingContext2D.fillStyle property of the Canvas 2D API specifies the color, gradient, or pattern to use inside shapes. The default is #000 (black).
trans-unit.target: Canvas 2D API 的 CanvasRenderingContext2D .fillStyle 属性指定在内部形状中使用的颜色，渐变或图案。默认值为 #000 （黑色）。

trans-unit.source: The CanvasRenderingContext2D.filter property of the Canvas 2D API provides filter effects such as blurring and grayscaling. It is similar to the CSS filter property and accepts the same functions.
trans-unit.target: Canvas 2D API 的 CanvasRenderingContext2D .filter 属性提供滤镜效果，例如模糊和灰度。它类似于CSS filter 属性，并接受相同的功能。

trans-unit.source: The CanvasRenderingContext2D.font property of the Canvas 2D API specifies the current text style being used when drawing text. This string uses the same syntax as the CSS font specifier. The default font is 10px sans-serif.
trans-unit.target: Canvas 2D API 的 CanvasRenderingContext2D .font 属性指定在绘制文本时使用的当前文本样式。此字符串使用与CSS字体说明符相同的语法。默认字体是10px sans-serif。

trans-unit.source: The CanvasRenderingContext2D.globalAlpha property of the Canvas 2D API specifies the alpha (transparency) value that is applied to shapes and images before they are drawn onto the canvas.
trans-unit.target: Canvas 2D API 的 CanvasRenderingContext2D .globalAlpha 属性指定在绘制到画布上之前应用于形状和图像的alpha（透明度）值。

trans-unit.source: The CanvasRenderingContext2D.globalCompositeOperation property of the Canvas 2D API sets the type of compositing operation to apply when drawing new shapes, where type is a string identifying which of the compositing or blending mode operations to use.
trans-unit.target: Canvas 2D API 的 CanvasRenderingContext2D .globalCompositeOperation 属性设置绘制新形状时要应用的合成操作的类型，其中type是一个字符串，用于标识要使用哪种合成或混合模式操作。

trans-unit.source: The CanvasRenderingContext2D.imageSmoothingEnabled property of the Canvas 2D API determines whether scaled images are smoothed (true, default) or not (false). On getting the imageSmoothingEnabled property, the last value it was set to is returned.
trans-unit.target: Canvas 2D API 的 CanvasRenderingContext2D .imageSmoothingEnabled 属性确定缩放的图像是否平滑（ true ，默认）或不平滑（ false ）。获取 imageSmoothingEnabled Enabled属性后，将返回其设置为的最后一个值。

trans-unit.source: The CanvasRenderingContext2D.isPointInPath() method of the Canvas 2D API reports whether or not the specified point is contained in the current path.
trans-unit.target: Canvas 2D API 的 CanvasRenderingContext2D .isPointInPath() 方法报告当前路径中是否包含指定的点。

trans-unit.source: The CanvasRenderingContext2D.isPointInStroke() method of the Canvas 2D API reports whether or not the specified point is inside the area contained by the stroking of a path.
trans-unit.target: Canvas 2D API 的 CanvasRenderingContext2D .isPointInStroke() 方法报告指定点是否在笔触所包含的区域内。

trans-unit.source: The CanvasRenderingContext2D.lineCap property of the Canvas 2D API determines the shape used to draw the end points of lines.
trans-unit.target: Canvas 2D API 的 CanvasRenderingContext2D .lineCap 属性确定用于绘制线端点的形状。

trans-unit.source: The CanvasRenderingContext2D.lineDashOffset property of the Canvas 2D API sets the line dash pattern offset or "phase" to achieve a "marching ants" effect, for example.
trans-unit.target: 例如，Canvas 2D API 的 CanvasRenderingContext2D .lineDashOffset 属性设置线破折号图案偏移量或“相位”以实现“ 行进蚂蚁 ”效果。

trans-unit.source: The CanvasRenderingContext2D.lineDashOffset property of the Canvas 2D API sets the line dash pattern offset or "phase" to achieve a "marching ants" effect, for example.
The CanvasRenderingContext2D.lineJoin property of the Canvas 2D API determines the shape used to join two line segments where they meet.
trans-unit.target: Canvas 2D API 的 CanvasRenderingContext2D .lineJoin 属性确定用于连接两个相交的线段的形状。

trans-unit.source: The CanvasRenderingContext2D.lineWidth property of the Canvas 2D API sets the thickness of lines in coordinate space units.
trans-unit.target: Canvas 2D API 的 CanvasRenderingContext2D .lineWidth 属性以坐标空间单位设置线的粗细。

trans-unit.source: The CanvasRenderingContext2D.measureText() method returns a TextMetrics object that contains information about the measured text (such as its width, for example).
trans-unit.target: 所述 CanvasRenderingContext2D .measureText() 方法返回一个 TextMetrics 对象，它包含关于所测量的文本信息（例如它的宽度，例如）。

trans-unit.source: The CanvasRenderingContext2D.moveTo() method of the Canvas 2D API begins a new sub-path at the point specified by the given (x, y) coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Canvas 2D API 的 CanvasRenderingContext2D .moveTo() 方法在由给定 (x, y) 坐标指定的点处开始一个新的子路径。

trans-unit.source: The CanvasRenderingContext2D.putImageData() method of the Canvas 2D API paints data from the given ImageData object onto the canvas. If a dirty rectangle is provided, only the pixels from that rectangle are painted. This method is not affected by the canvas transformation matrix.
trans-unit.target: Canvas 2D API 的 CanvasRenderingContext2D .putImageData() 方法将给定 ImageData 对象中的数据绘制到画布上。如果提供了一个脏矩形，则仅绘制该矩形中的像素。此方法不受画布转换矩阵的影响。

trans-unit.source: The CanvasRenderingContext2D.quadraticCurveTo() method of the Canvas 2D API adds a quadratic Bézier curve to the current sub-path. It requires two points: the first one is a control point and the second one is the end point. The starting point is the latest point in the current path, which can be changed using moveTo() before creating the quadratic Bézier curve.
trans-unit.target: Canvas 2D API 的 CanvasRenderingContext2D .quadraticCurveTo() 方法将二次贝塞尔曲线添加到当前子路径。它需要两点：第一个是控制点，第二个是终点。起点是当前路径中的最新点，可以在创建二次贝塞尔曲线之前使用 moveTo() 对其进行更改。

trans-unit.source: The CanvasRenderingContext2D.rect() method of the Canvas 2D API adds a rectangle to the current path.
trans-unit.target: Canvas 2D API 的 CanvasRenderingContext2D .rect() 方法将一个矩形添加到当前路径。

trans-unit.source: The CanvasRenderingContext2D.removeHitRegion() method of the Canvas 2D API removes a given hit region from the canvas.
trans-unit.target: Canvas 2D API 的 CanvasRenderingContext2D .removeHitRegion() 方法从画布中删除给定的点击区域。

trans-unit.source: The CanvasRenderingContext2D.resetTransform() method of the Canvas 2D API resets the current transform to the identity matrix.
trans-unit.target: Canvas 2D API 的 CanvasRenderingContext2D .resetTransform() 方法将当前转换重置为身份矩阵。

trans-unit.source: The CanvasRenderingContext2D.restore() method of the Canvas 2D API restores the most recently saved canvas state by popping the top entry in the drawing state stack. If there is no saved state, this method does nothing.
trans-unit.target: Canvas 2D API 的 CanvasRenderingContext2D .restore() 方法通过弹出绘图状态堆栈中的顶部条目来恢复最近保存的画布状态。如果没有保存状态，则此方法不执行任何操作。

trans-unit.source: The CanvasRenderingContext2D.rotate() method of the Canvas 2D API adds a rotation to the transformation matrix.
trans-unit.target: Canvas 2D API 的 CanvasRenderingContext2D .rotate() 方法将旋转添加到变换矩阵。

trans-unit.source: The CanvasRenderingContext2D.save() method of the Canvas 2D API saves the entire state of the canvas by pushing the current state onto a stack.
trans-unit.target: Canvas 2D API 的 CanvasRenderingContext2D .save() 方法通过将当前状态压入堆栈来保存画布的整个状态。

trans-unit.source: The CanvasRenderingContext2D.scale() method of the Canvas 2D API adds a scaling transformation to the canvas units by x horizontally and by y vertically.
trans-unit.target: Canvas 2D API 的 CanvasRenderingContext2D .scale() 方法通过水平x和垂直y将缩放转换添加到画布单元。

trans-unit.source: The CanvasRenderingContext2D.scrollPathIntoView() method of the Canvas 2D API scrolls the current or given path into the view. It is similar to Element.scrollIntoView().
trans-unit.target: Canvas 2D API 的 CanvasRenderingContext2D .scrollPathIntoView() 方法将当前路径或给定路径滚动到视图中。它类似于 Element.scrollIntoView() 。

trans-unit.source: The CanvasRenderingContext2D.setTransform() method of the Canvas 2D API resets (overrides) the current transformation to the identity matrix and then invokes a transformation described by the arguments of this method.
trans-unit.target: Canvas 2D API 的 CanvasRenderingContext2D .setTransform() 方法将当前转换重置（覆盖）到标识矩阵，然后调用此方法的参数描述的转换。

trans-unit.source: The CanvasRenderingContext2D.shadowBlur property of the Canvas 2D API specifies the amount of blur applied to shadows. The default is 0 (no blur).
trans-unit.target: Canvas 2D API 的 CanvasRenderingContext2D .shadowBlur 属性指定应用于阴影的模糊量。默认值为 0 （无模糊）。

trans-unit.source: The CanvasRenderingContext2D.shadowColor property of the Canvas 2D API specifies the color of shadows.
trans-unit.target: Canvas 2D API 的 CanvasRenderingContext2D .shadowColor 属性指定阴影的颜色。

trans-unit.source: The CanvasRenderingContext2D.shadowOffsetX property of the Canvas 2D API specifies the distance that shadows will be offset horizontally.
trans-unit.target: Canvas 2D API 的 CanvasRenderingContext2D .shadowOffsetX 属性指定阴影将水平偏移的距离。

trans-unit.source: The CanvasRenderingContext2D.shadowOffsetY property of the Canvas 2D API specifies the distance that shadows will be offset vertically.
trans-unit.target: Canvas 2D API 的 CanvasRenderingContext2D .shadowOffsetY 属性指定阴影将垂直偏移的距离。

trans-unit.source: The CanvasRenderingContext2D.stroke() method of the Canvas 2D API strokes (outlines) the current or given path with the current stroke style using the non-zero winding rule.
trans-unit.target: Canvas 2D API 的 CanvasRenderingContext2D .stroke() 方法使用非零缠绕规则以当前笔触样式笔触（概述）当前路径或给定路径。

trans-unit.source: The CanvasRenderingContext2D.stroke() method of the Canvas 2D API strokes (outlines) the current or given path with the current stroke style using the non-zero winding rule.
The CanvasRenderingContext2D.strokeRect() method of the Canvas 2D API draws a rectangle that is stroked (outlined) according to the current strokeStyle and other context settings.
trans-unit.target: Canvas 2D API 的 CanvasRenderingContext2D .strokeRect() 方法绘制一个矩形，该矩形根据当前 strokeStyle 和其他上下文设置进行了描边（轮廓）。

trans-unit.source: The CanvasRenderingContext2D.textAlign property of the Canvas 2D API specifies the current text alignment used when drawing text.
trans-unit.target: Canvas 2D API 的 CanvasRenderingContext2D .textAlign 属性指定在绘制文本时使用的当前文本对齐方式。

trans-unit.source: The CanvasRenderingContext2D.textBaseline property of the Canvas 2D API specifies the current text baseline used when drawing text.
trans-unit.target: Canvas 2D API 的 CanvasRenderingContext2D .textBaseline 属性指定在绘制文本时使用的当前文本基线。

trans-unit.source: The CanvasRenderingContext2D.transform() method of the Canvas 2D API multiplies the current transformation with the matrix described by the arguments of this method. You are able to scale, rotate, move and skew the context.
trans-unit.target: Canvas 2D API 的 CanvasRenderingContext2D .transform() 方法将当前转换与该方法的参数所描述的矩阵相乘。您可以缩放，旋转，移动和倾斜上下文。

trans-unit.source: The CanvasRenderingContext2D.translate() method of the Canvas 2D API adds a translation transformation by moving the canvas and its origin x horizontally and y vertically on the grid.
trans-unit.target: Canvas 2D API 的 CanvasRenderingContext2D .translate() 方法通过在画布上水平移动画布及其原点x和垂直y来添加平移转换。

trans-unit.source: The ChannelMergerNode() constructor creates a new ChannelMergerNode object instance.
trans-unit.target: 该 ChannelMergerNode() 构造函数创建一个新的 ChannelMergerNode 对象实例。

trans-unit.source: The ChannelMergerNode interface reunites different mono inputs into a single output. Each input will be used to fill a channel of the output.
trans-unit.target: 所述 ChannelMergerNode 接口团聚不同单声道输入到一个单一的输出。每个输入将用于填充输出的一个通道。

trans-unit.source: The ChannelSplitterNode() constructor of the Web Audio API creates a new ChannelSplitterNode object instance, representing a node that splits the input into a separate output for each of the source node's audio channels.
trans-unit.target: Web Audio API的 ChannelSplitterNode() 构造函数创建一个新的 ChannelSplitterNode 对象实例，该实例实例表示一个节点，该节点将输入拆分为每个源节点的音频通道的单独输出。

trans-unit.source: The ChannelSplitterNode interface separates the different channels of an audio source out into a set of mono outputs.
trans-unit.target: 所述 ChannelSplitterNode 接口的音频源出了不同的信道分成一组的单声道输出。

trans-unit.source: The ChildNode.before method inserts a set of Node or DOMString objects in the children list of this ChildNode's parent, just before this ChildNode. DOMString objects are inserted as equivalent Text nodes.
trans-unit.target: 该 ChildNode.before 方法插入一组 Node 或 DOMString 对象在此的孩子名单 ChildNode 的父母，只是在此之前 ChildNode 。 DOMString 对象作为等效的 Text 节点插入。

trans-unit.source: The ChildNode.remove() method removes the object from the tree it belongs to.
trans-unit.target: 所述 ChildNode.remove() 方法去除它属于树的对象。

trans-unit.source: The ChildNode interface contains methods that are particular to Node objects that can have a parent.
trans-unit.target: 该 ChildNode 接口包含特定于方法 Node ，可以有一个父对象。

trans-unit.source: The ChildNode.after() method inserts a set of Node or DOMString objects in the children list of this ChildNode's parent, just after this ChildNode. DOMString objects are inserted as equivalent Text nodes.
trans-unit.target: 该 ChildNode .after() 方法插入一组 Node 或 DOMString 对象在此的孩子名单 ChildNode 的母公司，只是这之后 ChildNode 。 DOMString 对象作为等效的 Text 节点插入。

trans-unit.source: The ChildNode.replaceWith() method replaces this ChildNode in the children list of its parent with a set of Node or DOMString objects. DOMString objects are inserted as equivalent Text nodes.
trans-unit.target: 该 ChildNode .replaceWith() 方法替换该 ChildNode 在其父的孩子名单与一组 Node 或 DOMString 对象。 DOMString 对象作为等效的 Text 节点插入。

trans-unit.source: The ClipboardEvent() constructor returns a newly created ClipboardEvent, representing an event providing information related to modification of the clipboard, that is cut, copy, and paste events.
trans-unit.target: 该 ClipboardEvent() 构造函数返回一个新创建的 ClipboardEvent ，表示与剪贴板进行修改的情况下提供信息，即 cut ， copy 和 paste 的事件。

trans-unit.source: The ClipboardEvent.clipboardData property holds a DataTransfer object, which can be used:
trans-unit.target: 所述 ClipboardEvent.clipboardData 属性保存一个 DataTransfer 对象，其可用于：

trans-unit.source: The Comment() constructor returns a newly created Comment object with the optional DOMString given in parameter as its textual content.
trans-unit.target: 该 Comment() 构造函数返回一个新创建的 Comment 与可选的对象 DOMString 参数给出它的文本内容。

trans-unit.source: The Comment interface represents textual notations within markup; although it is generally not visually shown, such comments are available to be read in the source view. Comments are represented in HTML and XML as content between '<!--' and '-->'. In XML, the character sequence '--' cannot be used within a comment.
trans-unit.target: 的 Comment 接口表示标记内的文字符号; 尽管通常不会在视觉上显示它，但可以在源视图中阅读此类注释。注释以HTML和XML表示为' <!-- '和' --> ' 之间的内容。在XML中，字符序列' -- '不能在注释中使用。

trans-unit.source: The ConstantSourceNode() constructor creates a new ConstantSourceNode object instance, representing an audio source which constantly outputs samples whose values are always the same.
trans-unit.target: 所述 ConstantSourceNode() 构造函数创建一个新 ConstantSourceNode 对象实例，代表其始终输出样本，其值总是相同的音频源。

trans-unit.source: The ConvolverNodeinterface is an AudioNode that performs a Linear Convolution on a given AudioBuffer, and is often used to achieve a reverb effect.
trans-unit.target: 所述 Convolver Node 接口是 AudioNode 执行线性卷积上的给定 AudioBuffer ，并且通常被用来实现一个混响效果。

trans-unit.source: The Coordinates.accuracy read-only property is a strictly positive double representing the accuracy, with a 95% confidence level, of the Coordinates.latitude and Coordinates.longitude properties expressed in meters.
trans-unit.target: 该 Coordinates.accuracy 只读属性是严格的正 double 代表的准确性，在95％的置信水平下，该的 Coordinates.latitude 和 Coordinates.longitude 以米为单位的性质。

trans-unit.source: The Coordinates.altitude read-only property is a double representing the altitude of the position in meters, relative to sea level. This value is null if the implementation cannot provide this data.
trans-unit.target: “ Coordinates.altitude ”只读属性是一个 double 表示相对于海平面的位置高度（以米为单位）。如果实现无法提供此数据，则此值为 null 。

trans-unit.source: The Coordinates.altitudeAccuracy read-only property is a strictly positive double representing the accuracy, with a 95% confidence level, of the altitude expressed in meters. This value is null if the implementation doesn't support measuring altitude.
trans-unit.target: 该 Coordinates.altitudeAccuracy 只读属性是严格的正 double 代表的准确性，在95％的置信水平下，该的 altitude 以米为单位。如果实现不支持测量高度，则此值为 null 。

trans-unit.source: The Coordinates.heading read-only property is a double representing the direction in which the device is traveling. This value, specified in degrees, indicates how far off from heading due north the device is. Zero degrees represents true true north, and the direction is determined clockwise (which means that east is 90 degrees and west is 270 degrees). If Coordinates.speed is 0, heading is NaN. If the device is not able to provide heading information, this value is null.
trans-unit.target: 所述 Coordinates.heading 只读属性是一个 double 表示其中所述装置移动的方向。以度为单位指定的该值指示距设备向北的航向距离有多远。零度表示真正的正北，并且方向是顺时针确定的（这意味着东是 90 度，西是 270 度）。如果 Coordinates.speed 为 0 ，则 heading 为 NaN 。如果设备无法提供标题信息，则此值为 null 。

trans-unit.source: The Coordinates.latitude read-only property is a double representing the latitude of the position in decimal degrees.
trans-unit.target: 所述 Coordinates.latitude 只读属性是一个 double 代表十进制度的位置的纬度。

trans-unit.source: The Coordinates.speed read-only property is a double representing the velocity of the device in meters per second. This value is null if the implementation is not able to measure it.
trans-unit.target: 所述 Coordinates.speed 只读属性是一个 double 代表设备的单位是米每秒的速度。如果实现无法测量，则此值为 null 。

trans-unit.source: The Crypto.getRandomValues() method lets you get cryptographically strong random values. The array given as the parameter is filled with random numbers (random in its cryptographic meaning).
trans-unit.target: 该 Crypto.getRandomValues() 方法可以让你得到强加密随机值。作为参数给出的数组填充有随机数（其密码学含义是随机的）。

trans-unit.source: The Crypto interface represents basic cryptography features available in the current context. It allows access to a cryptographically strong random number generator and to cryptographic primitives.
trans-unit.target: 该 Crypto 接口表示可在目前情况下基本的加密功能。它允许访问加密强度高的随机数生成器和加密基元。

trans-unit.source: The CryptoKey.algorithm read-only property is an opaque value containing all the information about the algorithm related to the key.
trans-unit.target: 该 CryptoKey.algorithm 只读属性是一个包含所有关于相关密钥的算法对信息的不透明值。

trans-unit.source: The CryptoKey.extractable read-only property that indicates if the raw material key can be extracted, for example for archiving it.
trans-unit.target: 所述 CryptoKey.extractable 只读属性，表明如果原料键可以被提取，例如用于封存。

trans-unit.source: The CryptoKey.type read-only property that indicates the type of the key: if it is the key for a symmetric algorithm ("secret") or for an asymmetric algorithm ("public" or "private", depending of its purpose).
trans-unit.target: 指示密钥类型的 CryptoKey.type 只读属性：如果它是对称算法（ "secret" ）或非对称算法（ "public" 或 "private" ，取决于其用途）的密钥。

trans-unit.source: The CryptoKey.usages read-only property is an array of enumerated that indicates the purposes of the key.
trans-unit.target: 所述 CryptoKey.usages 只读属性是所列举的数组，指示密钥的目的。

trans-unit.source: The CustomEvent() constructor creates a new CustomEvent.
trans-unit.target: 在 CustomEvent() 构造函数创建一个新的 CustomEvent 。

trans-unit.source: The DOMException interface represents an abnormal event (called an exception) which occurs as a result of calling a method or accessing a property of a web API. This is basically how error conditions are described in web APIs.
trans-unit.target: 在 DOMException 接口表示异常事件（称为异常发生作为调用一个方法或访问网络API的特性的结果）。基本上，这就是在Web API中描述错误条件的方式。

trans-unit.source: The DOMHighResTimeStamp type is a double and is used to store a time value. The value could be a discrete point in time or the difference in time between two discrete points in time.
trans-unit.target: 所述 DOMHighResTimeStamp 类型是 double 和用于存储的时间值。该值可以是离散时间点，也可以是两个离散时间点之间的时间差。

trans-unit.source: The DOMImplementation interface represent an object providing methods which are not dependent on any particular document. Such an object is returned by the Document.implementation property.
trans-unit.target: 所述 DOMImplementation 接口表示对象提供一种不依赖于任何特定的文档的方法。这样的对象由 Document.implementation 属性返回。

trans-unit.source: The DOMMatrix interface represents 4x4 matrices, suitable for 2D and 3D operations.
trans-unit.target: 所述 DOMMatrix 接口代表4X4矩阵，适于2D和3D的操作。

trans-unit.source: The DOMMatrixReadOnly interface represents 4x4 matrices, suitable for 2D and 3D operations. If this interface defines only read-only matrices, the DOMMatrix interface which inherits from it, add all the properties and the methods to allow to have modifiable matrices.
trans-unit.target: 所述 DOMMatrixReadOnly 接口代表4X4矩阵，适于2D和3D的操作。如果此接口仅定义只读矩阵， DOMMatrix 接口继承的DOMMatrix接口将添加所有属性和方法以允许具有可修改的矩阵。

trans-unit.source: The DOMPoint interface's w property holds the point's perspective value, w, for a point in space.
trans-unit.target: 该 DOMPoint 接口的 w 属性保存点的角度值，W，在空间中的点。

trans-unit.source: The DOMPoint interface's x property holds the horizontal coordinate, x, for a point in space. In general, positive values x mean to the right, and negative values of x means to the left, barring any transforms that may have altered the orientation of the axes.
trans-unit.target: 该 DOMPoint 接口的 x 属性保存的是水平坐标x，在空间中的点。通常， x 的正值表示右边， x 的负值表示左边，除非可能会更改轴方向的任何变换。

trans-unit.source: The DOMPoint interface's y property holds the vertical coordinate, y, for a point in space. Unless transforms have been applied to alter the orientation, the value of y increases downward and decreases upward.
trans-unit.target: 该 DOMPoint 接口的 y 属性保存纵坐标，ÿ，在空间中的点。除非应用了变换来改变方向，否则 y 的值向下增加而向上减小。

trans-unit.source: The DOMPoint interface's z property specifies the depth coordinate of a point in space. Unless transforms have changed the orientation, a z of 0 is the plane of the screen, with positive values extending outward toward the user from the screen, and negative values receding into the distance behind the screen.
trans-unit.target: 该 DOMPoint 接口的 z 属性指定空间中的点的深度坐标。除非变换改变了方向，否则 z 的值为0就是屏幕的平面，正值从屏幕朝用户方向向外延伸，负值退回到屏幕后面的距离。

trans-unit.source: The DOMPointInit dictionary is used to provide the values of the coordinates and perspective when creating and JSONifying a DOMPoint or DOMPointReadOnly object.
trans-unit.target: 所述 DOMPointInit 字典用于创建和JSONifying一个时提供的坐标和角度的值 DOMPoint 或 DOMPointReadOnly 对象。

trans-unit.source: The DOMPointReadOnly() constructor returns a new DOMPointReadOnly object representing a point in 2D or 3D space, optionally with perspective, whose values cannot be altered by script code.
trans-unit.target: 所述 DOMPointReadOnly() 构造返回一个新 DOMPointReadOnly 表示在二维或三维空间中的点的对象，任选地具有的角度来看，其值不能被脚本代码被改变。

trans-unit.source: The DOMPointReadOnly interface's w property holds the point's perspective value, w, for a read-only point in space. If your script needs to be able to change the value of this property, you should instead use the DOMPoint object.
trans-unit.target: 该 DOMPointReadOnly 接口的 w 属性保存点的角度值，W，在太空只读点。如果脚本需要能够更改此属性的值，则应改用 DOMPoint 对象。

trans-unit.source: The DOMPointReadOnly interface's x property holds the horizontal coordinate, x, for a read-only point in space. This property cannot be changed by JavaScript code in this read-only version of the DOMPoint object.
trans-unit.target: 该 DOMPointReadOnly 接口的 x 属性保存的是水平坐标x，在空间只读点。此只读版本的 DOMPoint 对象中的JavaScript代码无法更改此属性。

trans-unit.source: The DOMPointReadOnly interface's y property holds the vertical coordinate, y, for a read-only point in space. If your script needs to be able to change the value of this property, you should instead use the DOMPoint object.
trans-unit.target: 该 DOMPointReadOnly 接口的 y 属性保存的是垂直坐标，Y，在太空只读点。如果脚本需要能够更改此属性的值，则应改用 DOMPoint 对象。

trans-unit.source: The DOMPointReadOnly interface's z property holds the depth coordinate, z, for a read-only point in space. If your script needs to be able to change the value of this property, you should instead use the DOMPoint object.
trans-unit.target: 该 DOMPointReadOnly 接口的 z 属性保存的深度坐标，Z，在太空只读点。如果脚本需要能够更改此属性的值，则应改用 DOMPoint 对象。

trans-unit.source: The DOMTokenList.entries() method returns an iterator allowing you to go through all key/value pairs contained in this object. The values are DOMString objects, each representing a single token.
trans-unit.target: 该 DOMTokenList.entries() 方法返回一个 iterator ，允许你去通过包含在此对象中的所有键/值对。这些值是 DOMString 对象，每个对象代表一个令牌。

trans-unit.source: The DOMTokenList interface represents a set of space-separated tokens. Such a set is returned by Element.classList, HTMLLinkElement.relList, HTMLAnchorElement.relList, HTMLAreaElement.relList, HTMLIframeElement.sandbox, or HTMLOutputElement.htmlFor. It is indexed beginning with 0 as with JavaScript Array objects. DOMTokenList is always case-sensitive.
trans-unit.target: 所述 DOMTokenList 接口表示一组空间分隔的标记。这样的集合由 Element.classList ， HTMLLinkElement.relList ， HTMLAnchorElement.relList ， HTMLAreaElement.relList ， HTMLIframeElement.sandbox 或 HTMLOutputElement.htmlFor 返回。与JavaScript Array 对象一样，它从 0 开始索引。 DOMTokenList 始终区分大小写。

trans-unit.source: The DataTransfer object is used to hold the data that is being dragged during a drag and drop operation. It may hold one or more data items, each of one or more data types. For more information about drag and drop, see HTML Drag and Drop API.
trans-unit.target: 所述 DataTransfer 对象用于认为是拖放操作期间被拖动的数据。它可以保存一个或多个数据项，每种一种或多种数据类型。有关拖放的更多信息，请参见HTML拖放API。

trans-unit.source: The DataTransferItem object represents one drag data item. During a drag operation, each drag event has a dataTransfer property which contains a list of drag data items. Each item in the list is a DataTransferItem object.
trans-unit.target: 所述 DataTransferItem 对象表示一个拖动数据项。在拖动操作期间，每个 drag event 都有一个 dataTransfer 属性，该属性包含拖动数据项的 list 。列表中的每个项目都是一个 DataTransferItem 对象。

trans-unit.source: The DataTransferItemList object is a list of DataTransferItem objects representing items being dragged. During a drag operation, each DragEvent has a dataTransfer property and that property is a DataTransferItemList.
trans-unit.target: 该 DataTransferItemList 对象的列表 DataTransferItem 对象被拖动代表项目。在拖动操作期间，每个 DragEvent 都有一个 dataTransfer 属性，而该属性是一个 DataTransferItemList 。

trans-unit.source: The Document.characterSet read-only property returns the character encoding of the document that it's currently rendered with. (A character encoding is a set of characters and how to interpret bytes into those characters.)
trans-unit.target: 该 Document.characterSet 只读属性返回编码的字符，它的当前与渲染的文件。（字符编码是一组字符，以及如何将字节解释为这些字符。）

trans-unit.source: The Document.createAttribute() method creates a new attribute node, and returns it. The object created a node implementing the Attr interface. The DOM does not enforce what sort of attributes can be added to a particular element in this manner.
trans-unit.target: 所述 Document.createAttribute() 方法创建新的属性节点，并将其返回。该对象创建了一个实现 Attr 接口的节点。DOM没有强制以这种方式将哪种类型的属性添加到特定元素。

trans-unit.source: The Document.dir property is a DOMString representing the directionality of the text of the document, whether left to right (default) or right to left. Possible values are 'rtl', right to left, and 'ltr', left to right.
trans-unit.target: 该 Document.dir 属性是 DOMString 表示文档的文本的方向性，无论是左到右（默认）或从右到左。可能的值是从右到左的 'rtl' 和从左到右的 'ltr' 。

trans-unit.source: The Document.fullscreenElement read-only property returns the Element that is currently being presented in full-screen mode in this document, or null if full-screen mode is not currently in use.
trans-unit.target: 该 Document.fullscreenElement 只读属性返回 Element 当前正在以全屏模式呈现在本文档中，或 null 如果全屏模式是当前未使用。
