trans-unit.source: The Document.hasFocus() method returns a Boolean value indicating whether the document or any element inside the document has focus. This method can be used to determine whether the active element in a document has focus.
trans-unit.target: 所述 Document.hasFocus() 方法返回一个 Boolean 值，它指示文件内的文件或任何元素是否具有焦点。此方法可用于确定文档中的活动元素是否具有焦点。

trans-unit.source: The Document.hidden read-only property returns a Boolean value indicating if the page is considered hidden or not.
trans-unit.target: 该 Document.hidden 只读属性返回一个布尔值，表示如果页面被认为是隐藏与否。

trans-unit.source: The Document.onfullscreenerror property is an event handler for the fullscreenerror event that is sent to the document when it fails to transition into full-screen mode after a prior call to Element.requestFullscreen().
trans-unit.target: 所述 Document.onfullscreenerror 属性是一个事件处理程序 fullscreenerror 事件时它未能现有呼叫之后转变成全屏模式被发送到文档 Element.requestFullscreen() 。

trans-unit.source: The Document.onselectionchange property represents the event handler that is called when a selectionchange event reaches this object.
trans-unit.target: 该 Document.onselectionchange 属性表示事件处理程序被调用时， selectionchange 事件达到此目的。

trans-unit.source: The Document.onvisibilitychange property represents the event handler that is called when a visibilitychange event reaches this object.
trans-unit.target: 该 Document.onvisibilitychange 属性表示事件处理程序被调用时， visibilitychange 事件达到此目的。

trans-unit.source: The Document.queryCommandEnabled() method reports whether or not the specified editor command is enabled by the browser.
trans-unit.target: 所述 Document.queryCommandEnabled() 方法的报告指定的编辑器的命令是否是由浏览器启用。

trans-unit.source: The Document.queryCommandSupported() method reports whether or not the specified editor command is supported by the browser.
trans-unit.target: 所述 Document.queryCommandSupported() 方法的报告指定的编辑器的命令是否是由浏览器支持。

trans-unit.source: The Document.visibilityState read-only property returns the visibility of the document, that is in which context this element is now visible. It is useful to know if the document is in the background or an invisible tab, or only loaded for pre-rendering. Possible values are:
trans-unit.target: 该 Document.visibilityState 只读属性返回的可见性 document ，是在什么背景下该元素是现在可见。了解文档是在后台还是不可见的选项卡中，还是仅加载用于预渲染，这很有用。可能的值为：

trans-unit.source: The Document.onfullscreenchangeproperty is an event handler for the fullscreenchange event that is fired when a document goes in or out of the fullscreen mode.
trans-unit.target: 该 Document .onfullscreenchange 属性是事件处理程序 fullscreenchange 当文档或退出全屏模式的进入被开除事件。

trans-unit.source: The DocumentFragment() constructor returns an empty newly created DocumentFragment object .
trans-unit.target: 该 DocumentFragment() 构造函数返回一个空的新创建 DocumentFragment 对象。

trans-unit.source: The DragEvent.dataTransfer property holds the drag operation's data (as a DataTransfer object).
trans-unit.target: 所述 DragEvent.dataTransfer 属性保存的拖动操作的数据（作为 DataTransfer 对象）。

trans-unit.source: The EXT_blend_minmax extension is part of the WebGL API and extends blending capabilities by adding two new blend equations: the minimum or maximum color components of the source and destination colors.
trans-unit.target: 所述 EXT_blend_minmax 扩展是的一部分的WebGL API，并通过添加两个新的共混物方程延伸混合功能：最小或源和目的地颜色的最大颜色分量。

trans-unit.source: The EXT_color_buffer_float extension is part of WebGL and adds the ability to render a variety of floating point formats.
trans-unit.target: 该 EXT_color_buffer_float 扩展的一部分的WebGL，并增加了使各种浮点格式的能力。

trans-unit.source: The EXT_color_buffer_half_float extension is part of the WebGL API and adds the ability to render to 16-bit floating-point color buffers.
trans-unit.target: 该 EXT_color_buffer_half_float 扩展的一部分WebGL的API，并增加了渲染到16位浮点颜色缓冲的能力。

trans-unit.source: The EXT_frag_depth extension is part of the WebGL API and enables to set a depth value of a fragment from within the fragment shader.
trans-unit.target: 所述 EXT_frag_depth 扩展是的一部分的WebGL API，并且使得从所述片段着色器中设置的片段的深度值。

trans-unit.source: The EXT_sRGB extension is part of the WebGL API and adds sRGB support to textures and framebuffer objects.
trans-unit.target: 该 EXT_sRGB 扩展的一部分WebGL的API，并增加了sRGB的支持纹理和帧缓冲区对象。

trans-unit.source: The EXT_shader_texture_lod extension is part of the WebGL API and adds additional texture functions to the OpenGL ES Shading Language which provide the shader writer with explicit control of LOD (Level of detail).
trans-unit.target: 所述 EXT_shader_texture_lod 扩展是的一部分的WebGL API，并增加了额外的纹理起到将OpenGL ES的着色语言，其提供所述着色器作家LOD（显式控制详细程度）。

trans-unit.source: The EXT_texture_filter_anisotropic extension is part of the WebGL API and exposes two constants for anisotropic filtering (AF).
trans-unit.target: 所述 EXT_texture_filter_anisotropic 扩展是的一部分的WebGL API和公开两个常数各向异性过滤（AF） 。

trans-unit.source: The Element.classList is a read-only property that returns a live DOMTokenList collection of the class attributes of the element.
trans-unit.target: 该 Element.classList 是一个只读属性，返回现场 DOMTokenList 元素的类属性的集合。

trans-unit.source: The Element.clientHeight read-only property is zero for elements with no CSS or inline layout boxes; otherwise, it's the inner height of an element in pixels. It includes padding but excludes borders, margins, and horizontal scrollbars (if present).
trans-unit.target: 没有CSS或内联布局框的元素的 Element.clientHeight 只读属性为零；否则，它是元素的内部高度（以像素为单位）。它包括填充，但不包括边框，边距和水平滚动条（如果存在）。

trans-unit.source: The Element.clientWidth property is zero for elements with no CSS or inline layout boxes; otherwise it's the inner width of an element in pixels. It includes padding but excludes borders, margins, and vertical scrollbars (if present).
trans-unit.target: 没有CSS或内联布局框的元素的 Element.clientWidth 属性为零；否则，它是元素的内部宽度（以像素为单位）。它包括填充，但不包括边框，边距和垂直滚动条（如果存在）。

trans-unit.source: The Element.closest() method returns the closest ancestor of the current element (or the current element itself) which matches the selectors given in parameter. If there isn't such an ancestor, it returns null.
trans-unit.target: 所述 Element.closest() 方法返回的当前元素（或当前元素本身），其在参数给出的选择相匹配的最近的祖先。如果没有这样的祖先，则返回 null 。

trans-unit.source: The Element.getBoundingClientRect() method returns the size of an element and its position relative to the viewport.
trans-unit.target: 所述 Element.getBoundingClientRect() 方法返回的元素的相对于视其位置和大小。

trans-unit.source: The Element.getClientRects() method returns a collection of DOMRect objects that indicate the bounding rectangles for each CSS border box in a client.
trans-unit.target: 该 Element.getClientRects() 方法返回的集合 DOMRect 指示以边界矩形对象CSS边界盒中的客户端。

trans-unit.source: The Element.getElementsByTagName() method returns a live HTMLCollection of elements with the given tag name. All descendants of the specified element are searched, but not the element itself. The returned list is live, which means it updates itself with the DOM tree automatically. Therefore, there is no need to call Element.getElementsByTagName() with the same element and arguments repeatedly if the DOM changes in between calls.
trans-unit.target: 该 Element.getElementsByTagName() 方法返回一个活 HTMLCollection 与给定元素的标签名。搜索指定元素的所有后代，但不搜索元素本身。返回的列表是live，这意味着它将自动使用DOM树进行更新。因此，如果DOM在两次调用之间发生变化，则无需使用相同的元素和参数重复调用 Element.getElementsByTagName() 。

trans-unit.source: The Element.localName read-only property returns the local part of the qualified name of an element.
trans-unit.target: 该 Element.localName 只读属性返回元素的限定名称的本地部分。

trans-unit.source: The Element.namespaceURI read-only property returns the namespace URI of the element, or null if the element is not in a namespace.
trans-unit.target: 该 Element.namespaceURI 只读属性返回元素的命名空间URI，或者 null 如果元素是不是在一个命名空间。

trans-unit.source: The Element.prefix read-only property returns the namespace prefix of the specified element, or null if no prefix is specified.
trans-unit.target: 该 Element.prefix 只读属性返回指定元素的命名空间前缀，或 null ，如果未指定任何前缀。

trans-unit.source: The Element.requestFullscreen() method issues an asynchronous request to make the element be displayed in full-screen mode.
trans-unit.target: 所述 Element.requestFullscreen() 方法的问题的异步请求，以使该元件被显示在全屏幕模式。

trans-unit.source: The Element.scrollIntoView() method scrolls the element on which it's called into the visible area of the browser window.
trans-unit.target: 该 Element.scrollIntoView() 方法上滚动，它被称为到浏览器窗口的可视区域内的元素。

trans-unit.source: The Element.scrollTop property gets or sets the number of pixels that an element's content is scrolled vertically.
trans-unit.target: 该 Element.scrollTop 属性获取或设置元素的内容垂直滚动的像素数。

trans-unit.source: The Element.hasAttributes() method returns Boolean value, indicating if the current element has any attributes or not.
trans-unit.target: 的 Element .hasAttributes() 方法返回的布尔值，表示如果当前元素具有任何属性或没有。

trans-unit.source: The Event() constructor creates a new Event.
trans-unit.target: 该 Event() 构造函数创建一个新的 Event 。

trans-unit.source: The Event.cancelBubble property is a historical alias to Event.stopPropagation(). Setting its value to true before returning from an event handler prevents propagation of the event. In later implementations, setting this to false does nothing. See Browser compatibility for details.
trans-unit.target: 该 Event.cancelBubble 属性是一个历史的别名 Event.stopPropagation() 。在从事件处理程序返回之前将其值设置为 true 可以防止事件传播。在以后的实现中，将此设置为false不会执行任何操作。有关详细信息，请参见浏览器兼容性。

trans-unit.source: The Event.type read-only property returns a string containing the event's type. It is set when the event is constructed and is the name commonly used to refer to the specific event, such as click, load, or error
trans-unit.target: 该 Event.type 只读属性返回事件的类型的字符串。它是在构造事件时设置的，并且是通常用来引用特定事件的名称，例如 click ， load 或 error

trans-unit.source: The Event interface represents any event which takes place in the DOM; some are user-generated (such as mouse or keyboard events), while others are generated by APIs (such as events that indicate an animation has finished running, a video has been paused, and so forth). While events are usually triggered by such "external" sources, they can also be triggered programmatically, such as by calling the HTMLElement.click() method of an element, or by defining the event, then sending it to a specified target using EventTarget.dispatchEvent(). There are many types of events, some of which use other interfaces based on the main Event interface. Event itself contains the properties and methods which are common to all events.
trans-unit.target: 该 Event 接口表示发生在DOM无论如何; 有些是用户生成的（例如鼠标或键盘事件），而另一些则是由API生成的（例如表示动画已完成运行，视频已暂停等的事件）。尽管事件通常是由此类“外部”源触发的，但也可以通过编程方式触发事件，例如，通过调用元素的 HTMLElement.click() 方法或定义事件，然后使用 EventTarget.dispatchEvent() 将其发送到指定的目标。 dispatchEvent（）。事件类型很多，其中一些基于主 Event 接口使用其他接口。 Event 本身包含所有事件共有的属性和方法。

trans-unit.source: The EventSource() constructor returns a newly-created EventSource, which represents a remote resource.
trans-unit.target: 所述 EventSource () 构造函数返回一个新创建 EventSource ，表示远程资源。

trans-unit.source: The EventTarget() constructor creates a new EventTarget object instance.
trans-unit.target: 该 EventTarget() 构造函数创建一个新的 EventTarget 对象实例。

trans-unit.source: The ExtendableMessageEvent() constructor creates a new ExtendableMessageEvent object instance.
trans-unit.target: 在 Extendable MessageEvent() 构造函数创建一个新的 ExtendableMessageEvent 对象实例。

trans-unit.source: The ExtendableEvent() constructor creates a new ExtendableEvent object.
trans-unit.target: 该 ExtendableEvent() 构造函数创建一个新的 ExtendableEvent 对象。

trans-unit.source: The FetchEvent() constructor creates a new FetchEvent object.
trans-unit.target: 该 FetchEvent() 构造函数创建一个新的 FetchEvent 对象。

trans-unit.source: The FetchEvent.client read-only property returns the Client that the current service worker is controlling.
trans-unit.target: 该 FetchEvent.client 只读属性返回 Client ，目前的服务工人控制。

trans-unit.source: The File() constructor creates a new File object instance.
trans-unit.target: 该 File() 构造函数创建一个新的 File 对象实例。

trans-unit.source: The File.lastModified read-only property provides the last modified date of the file as the number of milliseconds since the Unix epoch (January 1, 1970 at midnight). Files without a known last modified date return the current date.
trans-unit.target: 该 File.lastModified 只读属性提供的文件作为自Unix毫秒为单位的号码的最后修改日期（1970年1月1日午夜）。没有已知最后修改日期的文件将返回当前日期。

trans-unit.source: The FocusEvent() constructor returns a newly created FocusEvent object with an optional EventTarget. When a change a focus has a source and a destination, the relatedTarget value must be set to the other target.
trans-unit.target: 该 FocusEvent() 构造函数返回一个新创建的 FocusEvent 具有可选的对象 EventTarget 。当更改焦点具有源和目的地时，必须将relatedTarget值设置为另一个目标。

trans-unit.source: The FocusEvent.relatedTarget read-only property represents a secondary target for this event, which will depend on the event itself. In some cases (like when tabbing in or out of a page), this property may be set to null for security reasons.
trans-unit.target: 所述 FocusEvent.relatedTarget 只读属性表示用于这种情况下，这将取决于事件本身的辅助目标。在某些情况下（例如，在页面中跳入或跳出页面时），出于安全原因，可以将此属性设置为 null 。

trans-unit.source: The FontFace() constructor creates a new FontFace object.
trans-unit.target: 该 FontFace() 构造函数创建一个新的 FontFace 对象。

trans-unit.source: The FontFace.family property allows the author to get or set the font family of a FontFace object. This is equivalent to the font-family descriptor of @font-face.
trans-unit.target: 该 FontFace.family 属性允许创作者获取或设置的字体系列 FontFace 对象。这等效于 @font-face 的 font-family 描述符。

trans-unit.source: The FontFace interface represents a single usable font face. It allows control of the source of the font face, being a URL to an external resource, or a buffer; it also allows control of when the font face is loaded and its current status.
trans-unit.target: 所述 FontFace 接口表示一个可用字体。它允许控制字体的来源，可以是外部资源的URL，也可以是缓冲区。它还允许控制何时加载字体及其当前状态。

trans-unit.source: The FormData() constructor creates a new FormData object.
trans-unit.target: 该 FormData() 构造函数创建一个新的 FormData 对象。

trans-unit.source: The FormData.entries() method returns an iterator allowing to go through all key/value pairs contained in this object. The key of each pair is a USVString object; the value either a USVString, or a Blob.
trans-unit.target: 所述 FormData.entries() 方法返回的 iterator 允许经过包含在该对象中的所有键/值对。每对的密钥是一个 USVString 对象。该值可以是 USVString 或 Blob 。

trans-unit.source: The FormData.keys() method returns an iterator allowing to go through all keys contained in this object. The keys are USVString objects.
trans-unit.target: 该 FormData.keys() 方法返回一个 iterator ，允许通过所有按键包含在此对象。键是 USVString 对象。

trans-unit.source: The FormData.values() method returns an iterator allowing to go through all values contained in this object. The values are USVString or Blob objects.
trans-unit.target: 所述 FormData.values() 方法返回的 iterator 允许经过所有的值包含在该对象。值是 USVString 或 Blob 对象。

trans-unit.source: The Geolocation interface represents an object able to programmatically obtain the position of the device. It gives Web content access to the location of the device. This allows a Web site or app to offer customized results based on the user's location.
trans-unit.target: 的 Geolocation 接口表示能够以编程方式获取该装置的位置的对象。它使Web内容可以访问设备的位置。这允许网站或应用程序根据用户的位置提供自定义结果。

trans-unit.source: The GeometryUtils interface provides different utility function to retrieve geometry information about DOM nodes.
trans-unit.target: 该 GeometryUtils 接口提供不同的效用函数来检索有关几何信息DOM节点。

trans-unit.source: The GlobalEventHandlers.onplayproperty sets and returns the event handler for the play event that is fired when playback has begun.
trans-unit.target: 该 GlobalEventHandlers.onplay 属性设置或返回的事件处理程序的 play 时开始播放所触发的事件。

trans-unit.source: The GlobalEventHandlers.onreset property contains an EventHandler triggered when a reset event is received.
trans-unit.target: 该 GlobalEventHandlers.onreset 属性包含的 EventHandler 时触发 reset 时接收到的事件。

trans-unit.source: The GlobalEventHandlers.onresize property contains an EventHandler triggered when a resize event is received.
trans-unit.target: 该 GlobalEventHandlers.onresize 属性包含的 EventHandler 时触发 resize 时接收到的事件。

trans-unit.source: The GlobalEventHandlers.onselectionchange property represents the event handler that is called when a selectstart event is fired, i.e when the text selected on a web page changes.
trans-unit.target: 该 GlobalEventHandlers.onselectionchange 属性表示事件处理程序时，一个被称为 selectstart 触发事件，即当在网页上选择的文本改变。

trans-unit.source: The GlobalEventHandlers.onselectstart property represents the event handler that is called when a selectstart event reaches this object, i.e. when the user starts to make a new text selection on a web page.
trans-unit.target: 该 GlobalEventHandlers.onselectstart 属性表示事件处理程序被调用时， selectstart ，当用户开始制作网页上一个新的文本选择事件达到这个目的，即。

trans-unit.source: The HTMLAnchorElement.download property Is a DOMString indicating that the linked resource is intended to be downloaded rather than displayed in the browser. The value represent the proposed name of the file. If the name is not a valid filename of the underlying OS, browser will adapt it.
trans-unit.target: 该 HTMLAnchorElement.download 属性是一个 DOMString 表示该链接的资源是为了下载而不是在浏览器中显示。该值表示文件的建议名称。如果名称不是基础操作系统的有效文件名，浏览器将对其进行调整。

trans-unit.source: The HTMLAnchorElement.rel property reflects the rel attribute. It is a DOMString containing a space-separated list of link types indicating the relationship between the resource represented by the <a> element and the current document.
trans-unit.target: 该 HTMLAnchorElement.rel 属性反映 rel 属性。它是一个 DOMString ,其中包含链接类型的空格分隔列表，这些链接类型指示 <a> 元素表示的资源与当前文档之间的关系。

trans-unit.source: The HTMLAnchorElement.relList read-only property reflects the rel attribute. It is a live DOMTokenList containing the set of link types indicating the relationship between the resource represented by the <a> element and the current document.
trans-unit.target: 该 HTMLAnchorElement.relList 只读属性反映了 rel 属性。它是一个实时 DOMTokenList ,其中包含一组链接类型，这些链接类型指示 <a> 元素表示的资源与当前文档之间的关系。

trans-unit.source: The HTMLAnchorElement.referrerPolicy property reflect the HTML referrerpolicy attribute of the <a> element defining which referrer is sent when fetching the resource.
trans-unit.target: 所述 HTMLAnchorElement .referrerPolicy 属性反映HTML referrerpolicy 所述的属性 <a> 定义哪些引荐获取资源时发送元件。

trans-unit.source: The HTMLAreaElement.rel property reflects the rel attribute. It is a DOMString containing a space-separated list of link types indicating the relationship between the resource represented by the <a> element and the current document.
trans-unit.target: 该 HTMLAreaElement.rel 属性反映 rel 属性。它是一个 DOMString ,其中包含链接类型的空格分隔列表，这些链接类型指示 <a> 元素表示的资源与当前文档之间的关系。

trans-unit.source: The HTMLAreaElement.relList read-only property reflects the rel attribute. It is a live DOMTokenList containing the set of link types indicating the relationship between the resource represented by the <area> element and the current document.
trans-unit.target: 该 HTMLAreaElement.relList 只读属性反映了 rel 属性。它是一个实时 DOMTokenList ,其中包含一组链接类型，这些链接类型指示 <area> 元素表示的资源与当前文档之间的关系。

trans-unit.source: The HTMLAreaElement.referrerPolicy property reflect the HTML referrerpolicy attribute of the <area> element defining which referrer is sent when fetching the resource.
trans-unit.target: 所述 HTMLAreaElement .referrerPolicy 属性反映HTML referrerpolicy 所述的属性 <area> 定义哪些引荐获取资源时发送元件。

trans-unit.source: The HTMLButtonElement.labels read-only property returns a NodeList of the <label> elements associated with the <button> element.
trans-unit.target: 所述 HTMLButtonElement.labels 只读属性返回一个 NodeList 的的 <label> 与所述相关联的元素 <button> 元素。

trans-unit.source: The HTMLCanvasElement.transferControlToOffscreen() method transfers control to an OffscreenCanvas object, either on the main thread or on a worker.
trans-unit.target: 所述 HTMLCanvasElement .transferControlToOffscreen() 方法将控制转移到一个 OffscreenCanvas 物体，无论是在主线程或上的工作者。

trans-unit.source: The HTMLElement.blur() method removes keyboard focus from the current element.
trans-unit.target: 所述 HTMLElement.blur() 方法去除键盘焦点从当前元素。

trans-unit.source: The HTMLElement.click() method simulates a mouse click on an element.
trans-unit.target: 所述 HTMLElement.click() 方法模拟了一个元件上的鼠标点击。

trans-unit.source: The HTMLElement.dir property gets or sets the text writing directionality of the content of the current element.
trans-unit.target: 该 HTMLElement.dir 属性获取或设置当前元素内容的文本书写方向性。

trans-unit.source: The HTMLElement.lang property gets or sets the base language of an element's attribute values and text content.
trans-unit.target: 该 HTMLElement.lang 属性获取或设置元素的属性值和文本内容的基本语言。

trans-unit.source: The HTMLElement.offsetWidth read-only property returns the layout width of an element as an integer.
trans-unit.target: 所述 HTMLElement.offsetWidth 只读属性返回一个元件作为一个整数的布局宽度。

trans-unit.source: The HTMLElement.style property is used to get as well as set the inline style of an element. While getting, it returns a CSSStyleDeclaration object that contains a list of all styles properties for that element with values assigned for the attributes that are defined in the element's inlinestyle attribute. See the CSS Properties Reference for a list of the CSS properties accessible via style. The style property has the same (and highest) priority in the CSS cascade as an inline style declaration set via the style attribute.
trans-unit.target: 该 HTMLElement.style 属性用于获取和设置内联元素的风格。获取时，它将返回 CSSStyleDeclaration 对象，该对象包含该元素的所有样式属性的列表，并为该元素的内联 style 属性中定义的属性分配了值。有关可通过 style 访问的CSS属性的列表，请参见《CSS属性参考》。该 style 属性在CSS级联经由内嵌样式声明一套相同的（和最高）优先 style 属性。

trans-unit.source: The HTMLFormControlsCollection.namedItem() method returns the RadioNodeList or the Element in the collection whose name or id match the specified name, or null if no node matches.
trans-unit.target: 该 HTMLFormControlsCollection.namedItem() 方法返回 RadioNodeList 或 Element ，其在集合中 name 或 id 匹配指定的名称，或 null ，如果没有节点匹配。

trans-unit.source: The HTMLFormElement.acceptCharset property represents a list of the supported character encodings for the given FORM element. This list can be comma- or space-separated.
trans-unit.target: 该 HTMLFormElement.acceptCharset 属性表示支持列表字符编码为给定的表单元素。此列表可以用逗号或空格分隔。

trans-unit.source: The HTMLFormElement.enctype property is the MIME type of content that is used to submit the form to the server. Possible values are:
trans-unit.target: 该 HTMLFormElement.enctype 属性是MIME类型的内容，用于表单提交给服务器。可能的值为：

trans-unit.source: The HTMLFormElement.enctype property is the MIME type of content that is used to submit the form to the server. Possible values are:
The HTMLFormElement.length read-only property returns the number of controls in the <form> element. You can access the list of the form's controls using the elements property.
trans-unit.target: 所述 HTMLFormElement.length 只读属性返回的控制在数 <form> 元素。您可以使用 elements 属性访问表单控件的列表。

trans-unit.source: The HTMLFormElement.method represents the HTTP method used to submit the form.
trans-unit.target: 所述 HTMLFormElement.method 表示用于提交表单的HTTP方法。

trans-unit.source: The HTMLHyperlinkElementUtils.protocol property is a USVString representing the protocol scheme of the URL, including the final ':'.
trans-unit.target: 所述 HTMLHyperlinkElementUtils .protocol 属性是一个 USVString 表示URL的协议方案，包括最后 ':' 。

trans-unit.source: The HTMLIFrameElement.referrerPolicy property reflects the HTML referrerpolicy attribute of the <iframe> element defining which referrer is sent when fetching the resource.
trans-unit.target: 所述 HTMLIFrameElement .referrerPolicy 属性反映HTML referrerpolicy 所述的属性 <iframe> 定义哪些引荐获取资源时发送元件。

trans-unit.source: The HTMLImageElement.referrerPolicy property reflects the HTML referrerpolicy attribute of the <img> element defining which referrer is sent when fetching the resource.
trans-unit.target: 所述 HTMLImageElement .referrerPolicy 属性反映HTML referrerpolicy 所述的属性 <img> ，其限定引荐获取资源时发送元件。

trans-unit.source: The HTMLInputElement.labels read-only property returns a NodeList of the <label> elements associated with the <input> element.
trans-unit.target: 所述 HTMLInputElement.labels 只读属性返回一个 NodeList 的的 <label> 与所述相关联的元素 <input> 元素。

trans-unit.source: The HTMLLinkElement.rel property reflects the rel attribute. It is a DOMString containing a space-separated list of link types indicating the relationship between the resource represented by the <link> element and the current document.
trans-unit.target: 该 HTMLLinkElement.rel 属性反映 rel 属性。它是一个 DOMString ,其中包含以空格分隔的链接类型列表，这些链接类型指示 <link> 元素表示的资源与当前文档之间的关系。

trans-unit.source: The HTMLLinkElement.relList read-only property reflects the rel attribute. It is a live DOMTokenList containing the set of link types indicating the relationship between the resource represented by the <link> element and the current document.
trans-unit.target: 该 HTMLLinkElement.relList 只读属性反映了 rel 属性。它是一个实时 DOMTokenList ,其中包含一组链接类型，这些链接类型指示 <link> 元素表示的资源与当前文档之间的关系。

trans-unit.source: The HTMLLinkElement.referrerPolicy property reflect the HTML referrerpolicy attribute of the <link> element defining which referrer is sent when fetching the resource.
trans-unit.target: 所述 HTMLLinkElement .referrerPolicy 属性反映HTML referrerpolicy 所述的属性 <link> 定义哪些引荐获取资源时发送元件。

trans-unit.source: The HTMLMeterElement.labels read-only property returns a NodeList of the <label> elements associated with the <meter> element.
trans-unit.target: 所述 HTMLMeterElement.labels 只读属性返回一个 NodeList 的的 <label> 与所述相关联的元素 <meter> 元素。

trans-unit.source: The HTMLObjectElement.typeMustMatch property is a Boolean that reflects the typemustmatch attribute of the <object> element and indicates if the resouce linked by it must match the MIME type given by HTMLObjectElement.type in order for this resource to be used.
trans-unit.target: 所述 HTMLObjectElement.typeMustMatch 属性是一个 Boolean 反映 typemustmatch 所述的属性 <object> 元素，并且指示如果由它链接的种源必须由下式给出的MIME类型相匹配 HTMLObjectElement.type 该资源被使用在顺序。

trans-unit.source: The HTMLOutputElement.labels read-only property returns a NodeList of the <label> elements associated with the <output> element.
trans-unit.target: 所述 HTMLOutputElement.labels 只读属性返回一个 NodeList 的的 <label> 与所述相关联的元素 <output> 元素。

trans-unit.source: The HTMLPictureElement interface represents a <picture> HTML element. It doesn't implement specific properties or methods.
trans-unit.target: 所述 HTMLPictureElement 接口表示 <picture> HTML元素。它没有实现特定的属性或方法。

trans-unit.source: The HTMLProgressElement.labels read-only property returns a NodeList of the <label> elements associated with the <progress> element.
trans-unit.target: 所述 HTMLProgressElement.labels 只读属性返回一个 NodeList 的的 <label> 与所述相关联的元素 <progress> 元素。

trans-unit.source: The HTMLSelectElement.add() method adds an element to the collection of option elements for this select element.
trans-unit.target: 所述 HTMLSelectElement.add() 方法将元素添加到集合 option 此元素 select 的元素。

trans-unit.source: The HTMLSelectElement.autofocus property is a Boolean that reflects the autofocus HTML attribute, which indicates whether the associated <select> element will get input focus when the page loads, unless the user overrides it.
trans-unit.target: 所述 HTMLSelectElement.autofocus 属性是一个 Boolean 反映 autofocus HTML属性，它指示是否相关的 <select> 元素会得到输入焦点页面加载时，除非用户覆盖它。

trans-unit.source: The HTMLSelectElement.checkValidity() method checks whether the element has any constraints and whether it satisfies them. If the element fails its constraints, the browser fires a cancelable invalid event at the element, and then returns false.
trans-unit.target: 所述 HTMLSelectElement.checkValidity() 方法检查元素是否具有任何的限制，以及它是否满足它们。如果该元素未能通过其约束，则浏览器将在该元素上引发可取消的 invalid 事件，然后返回 false 。

trans-unit.source: The HTMLSelectElement.disabled Is a Boolean that reflects the disabled HTML attribute, which indicates whether the control is disabled. If it is disabled, it does not accept clicks. A disabled element is unusable and un-clickable.
trans-unit.target: 该 HTMLSelectElement.disabled 是一个 Boolean ，反映了 disabled HTML属性，这表明控制是否被禁用。如果禁用，则不接受点击。禁用的元素不可使用且不可单击。

trans-unit.source: The HTMLSelectElement.form read-only property returns a HTMLFormElement representing the form that this element is associated with. If the element is not associated with of a <form> element, then it returns null.
trans-unit.target: 所述 HTMLSelectElement.form 只读属性返回一个 HTMLFormElement 表示该元素相关联的形式。如果该元素与 <form> 元素不相关，则返回 null 。

trans-unit.source: The HTMLSelectElement.item() method returns the Element corresponding to the HTMLOptionElement whose position in the options list corresponds to the index given in parameter, or null if there are none.
trans-unit.target: 所述 HTMLSelectElement.item() 方法返回 Element 对应于 HTMLOptionElement 其位置选项列表中的对应于索引中的参数给出，或者 null ，如果有没有。

trans-unit.source: The HTMLSelectElement.labels read-only property returns a NodeList of the <label> elements associated with the <select> element.
trans-unit.target: 所述 HTMLSelectElement.labels 只读属性返回一个 NodeList 的的 <label> 与所述相关联的元素 <select> 元素。

trans-unit.source: The HTMLSelectElement.namedItem() method returns the HTMLOptionElement corresponding to the HTMLOptionElement whose name or id match the specified name, or null if no option matches.
trans-unit.target: 该 HTMLSelectElement.namedItem() 方法返回 HTMLOptionElement 对应 HTMLOptionElement 其 name 或 id 匹配指定的名称，或 null ，如果没有选择匹配。

trans-unit.source: The HTMLSelectElement.remove() method removes the element at the specified index from the options collection for this select element.
trans-unit.target: 所述 HTMLSelectElement.remove() 方法去除的选项集合中的指定索引此选择元件处的元素。

trans-unit.source: The HTMLSelectElement.selectedIndex is a long that reflects the index of the first selected <option> element. The value -1 indicates that no element is selected.
trans-unit.target: 所述 HTMLSelectElement.selectedIndex 是一个 long ，反映了第一选定的索引 <option> 元素。值 -1 表示未选择任何元素。

trans-unit.source: The HTMLSelectElement.setCustomValidity() method sets the custom validity message for the selection element to the specified message. Use the empty string to indicate that the element does not have a custom validity error.
trans-unit.target: 所述 HTMLSelectElement.setCustomValidity() 方法设置选择元件到指定的消息中的自定义有效性消息。使用空字符串来表明该元素并不能有一个自定义的有效性的错误。

trans-unit.source: The HTMLSelectElement.type read-only property returns the form control's type. The possible values are:
trans-unit.target: 该 HTMLSelectElement.type 只读属性返回表单控件的类型。可能的值为：

trans-unit.source: The HTMLSelectElement interface represents a <select> HTML Element. These elements also share all of the properties and methods of other HTML elements via the HTMLElement interface.
trans-unit.target: 所述 HTMLSelectElement 接口表示 <select> HTML元素。这些元素还通过 HTMLElement 接口共享其他HTML元素的所有属性和方法。

trans-unit.source: The HTMLTableElement.cellPadding property represents the padding around the individual cells of the table.
trans-unit.target: 该 HTMLTableElement.cellPadding 属性表示该表的各个单元周围的填充。

trans-unit.source: The HTMLTableElement.createCaption() method returns the caption for the table. If no caption element exists on the table, this method creates it, then returns it.
trans-unit.target: 所述 HTMLTableElement.createCaption() 方法返回表的标题。如果表上不存在标题元素，则此方法创建它，然后返回它。

trans-unit.source: The HTMLTableElement.createTFoot() method returns the <tfoot> element associated with the table, of type HTMLTableSectionElement. If there is no footer for this table, this methods creates it, then returns it.
trans-unit.target: 所述 HTMLTableElement.createTFoot() 方法返回 <tfoot> 与所述表型相关联，元件 HTMLTableSectionElement 。如果该表没有页脚，则此方法创建它，然后返回它。

trans-unit.source: The HTMLTableElement.createTHead()method returns the <thead> element association with the table, of type HTMLTableSectionElement. If there is no such element associated to the table, this method creates it, then returns it.
trans-unit.target: 所述 HTMLTableElement.createTHead() 方法返回的 <thead> 用表元素关联类型， HTMLTableSectionElement 。如果没有与表关联的元素，则此方法创建它，然后返回它。

trans-unit.source: The HTMLTableElement.deleteRow() method removes a row from the table. If the number of rows to delete, specified by the parameter, is greater or equal to the number of available rows, or if it is negative and not equal to the special index -1, representing the last row of the table, the exception INDEX_SIZE_ERR is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 所述 HTMLTableElement.deleteRow() 方法从表中删除一行。如果参数指定的要删除的行数大于或等于可用行数，或者为负数且不等于表示表的最后一行的特殊索引 -1 （表示表的最后一行），则异常 INDEX_SIZE_ERR 被抛出。

trans-unit.source: The HTMLTableElement.deleteTFoot() method removes a <tfoot> element from the table.
trans-unit.target: 所述 HTMLTableElement.deleteTFoot() 方法删除 <tfoot> 从表中的元素。

trans-unit.source: The HTMLTableElement.deleteTHead() removes a <thead> element from the table.
trans-unit.target: 所述 HTMLTableElement.deleteTHead() 移除一个 <thead> 从表中的元素。

trans-unit.source: The HTMLTableElement.summary property represents the table description.
trans-unit.target: 该 HTMLTableElement.summary 属性表示该表的说明。

trans-unit.source: The HTMLTableElement.tBodies read-only property returns a live HTMLCollection of the table bodies.
trans-unit.target: 该 HTMLTableElement.tBodies 只读属性返回现场 HTMLCollection 表体。

trans-unit.source: The HTMLTableElement.tHead represents the table's <thead> element. Its value can be null if there is no such element.
trans-unit.target: 所述 HTMLTableElement.tHead 表示表的 <thead> 元素。如果没有这样的元素，其值可以为 null 。

trans-unit.source: The HTMLTableElement.width property represents the desired width of the table.
trans-unit.target: 所述 HTMLTableElement.width 属性表示表中的所需的宽度。

trans-unit.source: The HTMLTemplateElement interface enables access to the contents of an HTML <template> element.
trans-unit.target: 所述 HTMLTemplateElement 接口允许访问的HTML内容 <template> 元素。

trans-unit.source: The HTMLTextAreaElement.labels read-only property returns a NodeList of the <label> elements associated with the <textarea> element.
trans-unit.target: 所述 HTMLTextAreaElement.labels 只读属性返回一个 NodeList 的的 <label> 与所述相关联的元素 <textarea> 的元素。

trans-unit.source: The HTMLTimeElement.dateTime property is a DOMString that reflects the datetime HTML attribute, containing a machine-readable form of the element's date and time value.
trans-unit.target: 所述 HTMLTimeElement .dateTime 属性是一个 DOMString 反映 datetime HTML属性，含有该元素的日期和时间值的机器可读的形式。

trans-unit.source: The Headers() constructor creates a new Headers object.
trans-unit.target: 该 Headers() 构造函数创建一个新的 Headers 的对象。

trans-unit.source: The Headers.entries() method returns an iterator allowing to go through all key/value pairs contained in this object. The both the key and value of each pairs are ByteString objects.
trans-unit.target: 所述 Headers.entries() 方法返回的 iterator 允许通过所有的键/值对包含在此的对象。每对的键和值都是 ByteString 对象。

trans-unit.source: The Headers.keys() method returns an iterator allowing to go through all keys contained in this object. The keys are ByteString objects.
trans-unit.target: 该 Headers.keys() 方法返回一个 iterator ，允许通过所有按键包含在此对象。键是 ByteString 对象。

trans-unit.source: The Headers.values() method returns an iterator allowing to go through all values contained in this object. The values are ByteString objects.
trans-unit.target: 所述 Headers.values() 方法返回的 iterator 允许经过所有的值包含在该对象。值是 ByteString 对象。

trans-unit.source: The History.length read-only property returns an Integer representing the number of elements in the session history, including the currently loaded page. For example, for a page loaded in a new tab this property returns 1.
trans-unit.target: 该 History.length 只读属性返回一个 Integer 表示会话历史元素，包括当前加载页面的数量。例如，对于在新选项卡中加载的页面，此属性返回 1 。

trans-unit.source: The ImageBitmap interface represents a bitmap image which can be drawn to a <canvas> without undue latency. It can be created from a variety of source objects using the createImageBitmap() factory method. ImageBitmap provides an asynchronous and resource efficient pathway to prepare textures for rendering in WebGL.
trans-unit.target: 所述 ImageBitmap 接口表示可以被吸引到一个位图图像 <canvas> 而没有不适当的延迟。可以使用 createImageBitmap() 工厂方法从各种源对象创建它。 ImageBitmap 提供了一种异步且资源高效的途径来准备用于在WebGL中渲染的纹理。

trans-unit.source: The ImageBitmap.close() method disposes of all graphical resources associated with an ImageBitmap.
trans-unit.target: 所述 ImageBitmap .close() 所有的图形资源的方法处置与相关联的 ImageBitmap 。

trans-unit.source: The ImageData() constructor returns a newly instantiated ImageData object built from the typed array given and having the specified width and height.
trans-unit.target: 所述 ImageData() 构造函数返回一个新实例化 ImageData 从类型数组给出并且具有特定的宽度和高度内置对象。

trans-unit.source: The ImageData interface represents the underlying pixel data of an area of a <canvas> element. It is created using the ImageData() constructor or creator methods on the CanvasRenderingContext2D object associated with a canvas: createImageData() and getImageData(). It can also be used to set a part of the canvas by using putImageData().
trans-unit.target: 所述 ImageData 接口表示的区域的下面的像素数据 <canvas> 元素。它是使用 ImageData() 构造函数或与画布关联的 CanvasRenderingContext2D 对象上的creator方法创建的： createImageData() 和 getImageData() 。也可以通过使用 putImageData() 来设置画布的一部分。

trans-unit.source: The InputEvent.isComposing read-only property returns a Boolean value indicating if the event is fired after compositionstart and before compositionend.
trans-unit.target: 该 InputEvent.isComposing 只读属性返回一个 Boolean 值，表示如果该事件被解雇后 compositionstart 之前 compositionend 。

trans-unit.source: The InstallEvent() constructor creates a new InstallEvent object.
trans-unit.target: 该 InstallEvent() 构造函数创建一个新的 InstallEvent 对象。

trans-unit.source: The IntersectionObserver interface of the Intersection Observer API provides a way to asynchronously observe changes in the intersection of a target element with an ancestor element or with a top-level document's viewport. The ancestor element or viewport is referred to as the root.
trans-unit.target: Intersection Observer API的 IntersectionObserver 接口提供了一种异步观察目标元素与祖先元素或顶级文档的视口相交的变化的方法。祖先元素或视口称为根。

trans-unit.source: The IntersectionObserverEntry interface of the Intersection Observer API describes the intersection between the target element and its root container at a specific moment of transition. Instances of IntersectionObserverEntry are delivered to an IntersectionObserver callback in its entries parameter; otherwise, these objects can only be obtained by calling IntersectionObserver.takeRecords().
trans-unit.target: Intersection Observer API的 IntersectionObserverEntry 接口描述了特定过渡时刻目标元素与其根容器之间的交集。 IntersectionObserverEntry 的实例在其 entries 参数中传递到 IntersectionObserver 回调。否则，只能通过调用 IntersectionObserver.takeRecords() 获得这些对象。

trans-unit.source: The KeyboardEvent.getModifierState() method returns the current state of the specified modifier key: true if the modifier is active (that is the modifier key is pressed or locked), otherwise, false.
trans-unit.target: 所述 KeyboardEvent.getModifierState() 方法返回指定修饰键的当前状态： true 如果该改性剂是有效的（即修改键被按下或锁定），否则， false 。

trans-unit.source: The KeyboardEvent.isComposing read-only property returns a Boolean value indicating if the event is fired after compositionstart and before compositionend.
trans-unit.target: 该 KeyboardEvent.isComposing 只读属性返回一个 Boolean 值，表示如果该事件被解雇后 compositionstart 之前 compositionend 。

trans-unit.source: The KeyboardEvent.key read-only property returns the value of the key pressed by the user while taking into considerations the state of modifier keys such as the shiftKey as well as the keyboard locale/layout. Its value is determined as follows:
trans-unit.target: 所述 KeyboardEvent.key 只读属性返回键的按压值由所述用户考虑到的考虑修饰键的状态，同时，如 shiftKey 以及键盘的区域设置/布局。其值确定如下：

trans-unit.source: The KeyboardEvent.location read-only property returns an unsigned long representing the location of the key on the keyboard or other input device
trans-unit.target: 所述 KeyboardEvent.location 只读属性返回一个 unsigned long 表示键的键盘或其他输入装置上的位置

trans-unit.source: The KeyboardEvent.repeat read-only property returns a Boolean that is true if the key is being held down such that it is automatically repeating.
trans-unit.target: 该 KeyboardEvent.repeat 只读属性返回一个 Boolean 是 true ，如果键被按下，使其自动重复。

trans-unit.source: The LinkStyle interface allows to access the associated CSS style sheet of a node.
trans-unit.target: 所述 LinkStyle 接口允许访问该相关联的CSS样式表的节点的。

trans-unit.source: The Location.assign() method causes the window to load and display the document at the URL specified.
trans-unit.target: 所述 Location.assign() 方法导致窗口加载和显示在所指定的URL的文件。

trans-unit.source: The Location.reload() method reloads the current resource, like the Refresh button.
trans-unit.target: 所述 Location.reload() 方法重新加载当前资源，像刷新按钮。

trans-unit.source: The Location.replace() method replaces the current resource with the one at the provided URL. The difference from the assign() method is that after using replace() the current page will not be saved in session History, meaning the user won't be able to use the back button to navigate to it.
trans-unit.target: 该 Location .replace() 方法替换为一个所提供网址当前资源。与 assign() 方法的区别在于，使用 replace() 之后，当前页面将不会保存在会话 History ，这意味着用户将无法使用后退按钮导航到该页面。

trans-unit.source: The MediaCapabilities interface of the Media Capabilities API provides information about the decoding abilities of the device, system and browser. The API can be used to query the browser about the decoding abilities of the device based on codecs, profile, resolution, and bitrates. The information can be used to serve optimal media streams to the user and determine if playback should be smooth and power efficient.
trans-unit.target: Media Capabilities API的 MediaCapabilities 接口提供有关设备，系统和浏览器的解码能力的信息。该API可用于根据编解码器，配置文件，分辨率和比特率向浏览器查询设备的解码能力。该信息可用于向用户提供最佳的媒体流，并确定播放是否应该流畅且节能。

trans-unit.source: The MediaCapabilitiesInfo interface of the Media Capabilities API is made available when the promise returned by the MediaCapabilities.encodingInfo() or MediaCapabilities.decodingInfo() methods of the MediaCapabilities interface fulfills, providing information as to whether the media type is supported, and whether encoding or decoding such media would be smooth and power efficient.
trans-unit.target: 当 MediaCapabilitiesInfo 接口的 MediaCapabilities.encodingInfo() 或 MediaCapabilities.decodingInfo() 方法返回的承诺实现时，会提供Media Capabilities API的 MediaCapabilities Info接口，以提供有关是否支持媒体类型以及是否编码或编码的信息。对这样的媒体进行解码将是平滑且高效的。

trans-unit.source: The MediaElementAudioSourceNode interface represents an audio source consisting of an HTML5 <audio> or <video> element. It is an AudioNode that acts as an audio source.
trans-unit.target: 所述 MediaElementAudio SourceNode 接口表示选自由HTML5的音频源 <audio> 或 <video> 元素。它是一个 AudioNode ，充当音频源。

trans-unit.source: The MediaElementAudioSourceNode() constructor creates a new MediaElementAudioSourceNode object instance.
trans-unit.target: 该 MediaElementAudioSourceNode() 构造函数创建一个新的 MediaElementAudioSourceNode 对象实例。

trans-unit.source: The MediaError interface represents an error which occurred while handling media in an HTML media element based on HTMLMediaElement, such as <audio> or <video>.
trans-unit.target: 所述 MediaError 接口表示而基于处理在一个HTML媒体元素介质发生错误 HTMLMediaElement ，如 <audio> 或 <video> 。

trans-unit.source: The MediaKeySession.expiration read-only property returns the time after which the keys in the current session can no longer be used to decrypt media data, or NaN if no such time exists. This value is determined by the CDM and measured in milliseconds since January 1, 1970, UTC. This value may change during a session lifetime, such as when an action triggers the start of a window.
trans-unit.target: 所述 MediaKeySession.expiration 只读属性返回之后，在当前会话密钥不再能够用于解密媒体数据的时间，或者如果不存在这样的时间为NaN。此值由CDM确定，自1970年1月1日（UTC）以来以毫秒为单位测量。此值可能会在会话生存期内更改，例如当操作触发窗口开始时。

trans-unit.source: The MediaKeySession.keyStatuses read-only property returns a reference to a read-only MediaKeyStatusMap of the current session's keys and their statuses.
trans-unit.target: 该 MediaKeySession.keyStatuses 只读属性返回一个只读参考 MediaKeyStatusMap 当前会话的密钥及其状态的。

trans-unit.source: The MediaKeySession.sessionId read-only property contains a unique string generated by the CDM for the current media object and its associated keys or licenses.
trans-unit.target: 该 MediaKeySession.sessionId 只读属性包含CDM当前媒体对象及其相关联的密钥或许可生成一个唯一的字符串。

trans-unit.source: The MediaKeySession interface of the EncryptedMediaExtensions API represents a context for message exchange with a content decryption module (CDM).
trans-unit.target: EncryptedMediaExtensions API的 MediaKeySession 接口表示用于与内容解密模块（CDM）进行消息交换的上下文。

trans-unit.source: The MediaKeyStatusMap interface of the EncryptedMediaExtensions API is a read-only map of media key statuses by key IDs.
trans-unit.target: EncryptedMediaExtensions API的 MediaKeyStatusMap 接口是按密钥ID记录的媒体密钥状态的只读映射。

trans-unit.source: The MediaKeySystemAccess interface of the EncryptedMediaExtensions API provides access to a Key System for decryption and/or a content protection provider. You can request an instance of this object using the Navigator.requestMediaKeySystemAccess method.
trans-unit.target: EncryptedMediaExtensions API的 MediaKeySystemAccess 接口提供对用于解密的密钥系统和/或内容保护提供程序的访问。您可以使用 Navigator.requestMediaKeySystemAccess 方法请求此对象的实例。

trans-unit.source: The MediaKeySystemConfiguration interface Encrypted Media Extensions API provides configuration information about the media key system.
trans-unit.target: 该 MediaKeySystemConfiguration 接口加密媒体扩展API提供了有关媒体的关键系统配置信息。

trans-unit.source: The MediaKeys.setServerCertificate() method a Promise to a server certificate to be used to encrypt messages to the license server.
trans-unit.target: 所述 MediaKeys.setServerCertificate() 方法的 Promise 到服务器证书被用于加密消息给许可证服务器。

trans-unit.source: The MediaRecorderErrorEvent() constructor creates a new MediaRecorderErrorEvent object that represents an error that occurred during the recording of media by the MediaStream Recording API.
trans-unit.target: 所述 MediaRecorderErrorEvent () 构造函数创建一个新 MediaRecorderErrorEvent 表示的媒体由所述记录期间发生了错误对象MediaStream记录API。

trans-unit.source: The MediaSource() constructor of the MediaSource interface constructs and returns a new MediaSource object with no associated source buffers.
trans-unit.target: MediaSource 接口的 MediaSource() 构造函数构造并返回没有关联源缓冲区的新 MediaSource 对象。

trans-unit.source: The MediaStream.id() read-only property is a DOMString containing 36 characters denoting a unique identifier (GUID) for the object.
trans-unit.target: 所述 MediaStream.id() 只读属性是一个 DOMString 含36个字符表示该对象的唯一标识符（GUID）。

trans-unit.source: The MediaStreamAudioDestinationNode interface represents an audio destination consisting of a WebRTCMediaStream with a single AudioMediaStreamTrack, which can be used in a similar way to a MediaStream obtained from getUserMedia(). It is an AudioNode that acts as an audio destination.
trans-unit.target: 所述 MediaStreamAudio DestinationNode 接口表示音频目的地由的的WebRTC MediaStream 与单个 AudioMediaStreamTrack ，其可以以类似的方式被用于在 MediaStream 从获得的 getUserMedia() 。它是一个 AudioNode ，充当音频目标。

trans-unit.source: The MediaStreamAudioSourceNode interface represents an audio source consisting of a WebRTCMediaStream (such as a webcam, microphone, or a stream being sent from a remote computer). It is an AudioNode that acts as an audio source.
trans-unit.target: 所述 MediaStreamAudio SourceNode 接口表示由一个音频源的WebRTC MediaStream （诸如网络摄像头，麦克风，或流从远程计算机被发送）。它是一个 AudioNode ，充当音频源。

trans-unit.source: The MediaStreamAudioDestinationNode() constructor of the Web Audio API creates a new MediaStreamAudioDestinationNode object instance.
trans-unit.target: Web Audio API的 MediaStreamAudioDestinationNode() 构造函数创建一个新的 MediaStreamAudioDestinationNode 对象实例。

trans-unit.source: The MediaStreamAudioSourceNode() constructor of the Web Audio API creates a new MediaStreamAudioSourceNode object instance.
trans-unit.target: Web Audio API的 MediaStreamAudioSourceNode() 构造函数创建一个新的 MediaStreamAudioSourceNode 对象实例。

trans-unit.source: The MediaStreamEvent() constructor creates a new MediaStreamEvent.
trans-unit.target: 该 MediaStreamEvent() 构造函数创建一个新的 MediaStreamEvent 。

trans-unit.source: The MediaStreamTrack.onended event handler is used to specify a function which serves as an EventHandler to be called when the ended event occurs on the track. This event occurs when the track will no longer provide data to the stream for any reason, including the end of the media input being reached, the user revoking needed permissions, the source device being removed, or the remote peer ending a connection.
trans-unit.target: 所述 MediaStreamTrack.onended 事件处理程序是用来指定其用作一个函数 EventHandler 时，被称为 ended 事件的轨道上发生。当轨道出于任何原因不再向流提供数据时，包括到达媒体输入的末尾，用户撤销所需的权限，删除源设备或远程对等端终止连接时，都会发生此事件。

trans-unit.source: The MediaStreamTrack.onoverconstrained event handler is a property called when the overconstrained event is received. Such an event is sent when the track is again able to send data.
trans-unit.target: 该 MediaStreamTrack.onoverconstrained 事件处理程序是当所谓的财产 overconstrained 被接收到的事件。当轨道再次能够发送数据时，将发送此类事件。

trans-unit.source: The MediaStreamTrack.remote read-only property allows Javascript to know whether a WebRTC MediaStreamTrack is from a remote source or a local one. It returns a Boolean with a value of true if the track is sourced remotely (that is, sourced by an RTCPeerConnection), or false if it is sourced locally.
trans-unit.target: 该 MediaStreamTrack.remote 只读属性允许JavaScript知道的WebRTC MediaStreamTrack是否是从远程源或本地的。如果轨道是远程来源的（即，由RTCPeerConnection来源），则返回 Boolean ，其值为 true ;如果轨道是本地来源，则返回 false 。

trans-unit.source: The MediaStreamTrackEvent() constructor returns a newly created MediaStreamTrackEvent object, which represents an event announcing that a MediaStreamTrack has been added to or removed from a MediaStream.
trans-unit.target: 所述 MediaStreamTrackEvent() 构造函数返回一个新创建的 MediaStreamTrackEvent 对象，它表示事件宣布一个 MediaStreamTrack 已被添加到或从去除 MediaStream 。

trans-unit.source: The MessageEvent interface represents a message received by a target object.
trans-unit.target: 所述 MessageEvent 接口表示由目标对象接收到的消息。

trans-unit.source: The MouseEvent interface represents events that occur due to the user interacting with a pointing device (such as a mouse). Common events using this interface include click, dblclick, mouseup, mousedown.
trans-unit.target: 所述 MouseEvent 接口表示用户利用指示设备（如鼠标）的交互的发生是由于事件。使用此界面的常见事件包括 click ， dblclick ， mouseup ， mousedown 。

trans-unit.source: The NamedNodeMap.getNamedItem() method returns the Attr corresponding to the given name, or null if there is no corresponding attribute.
trans-unit.target: 所述 NamedNodeMap.getNamedItem() 方法返回 Attr 对应于给定的名字，或空，如果没有对应的属性。

trans-unit.source: The NamedNodeMap interface represents a collection of Attr objects. Objects inside a NamedNodeMap are not in any particular order, unlike NodeList, although they may be accessed by an index as in an array.
trans-unit.target: 该 NamedNodeMap 接口表示集合 Attr 对象。与 NodeList 不同， NamedNodeMap 内部的对象没有特定的顺序，尽管它们可以像数组一样由索引访问。

trans-unit.source: The Navigator.connection read-only property returns a NetworkInformation object containing information about the system's connection, such as the current bandwidth of the user's device or whether the connection is metered. This could be used to select high definition content or low definition content based on the user's connection.
trans-unit.target: 所述 Navigator.connection 只读属性返回一个 NetworkInformation 包含关于系统的连接，信息对象，如用户的设备的当前带宽或是否连接被计量。这可用于根据用户的连接选择高清晰度内容或低清晰度内容。

trans-unit.source: The Navigator.mediaCapabilities read-only property returns a MediaCapabilities object that can expose information about the decoding and encoding capabilities for a given format and output capabilities as defined by the Media Capabilities API.
trans-unit.target: 所述 Navigator.mediaCapabilities 只读属性返回一个 MediaCapabilities 对象可以暴露有关由定义的给定格式和输出能力的解码和编码能力的信息的媒体功能API。

trans-unit.source: The Navigator.permissions read-only property returns a Permissions object that can be used to query and update permission status of APIs covered by the Permissions API.
trans-unit.target: 该 Navigator.permissions 只读属性返回一个 Permissions 可用于通过覆盖的API的查询和更新许可状态对象权限的API。

trans-unit.source: The Navigator.productSub read-only property returns the build number of the current browser.
trans-unit.target: 该 Navigator.productSub 只读属性返回当前浏览器的版本号。

trans-unit.source: The Navigator.serviceWorker read-only property returns the ServiceWorkerContainer object for the associated document, which provides access to registration, removal, upgrade, and communication with the ServiceWorker.
trans-unit.target: 所述 Navigator.serviceWorker 只读属性返回 ServiceWorkerContainer 对象的相关联的文件，它提供了访问注册，去除，升级和通信与 ServiceWorker 。

trans-unit.source: The Navigator interface represents the state and the identity of the user agent. It allows scripts to query it and to register themselves to carry on some activities.
trans-unit.target: 所述 Navigator 接口表示的状态和用户代理的身份。它允许脚本查询并注册自己以进行一些活动。

trans-unit.source: The NavigatorID.userAgent read-only property returns the user agent string for the current browser.
trans-unit.target: 该 NavigatorID.userAgent 只读属性返回用户代理字符串当前浏览器。

trans-unit.source: The NavigatorID interface contains methods and properties related to the identity of the browser.
trans-unit.target: 该 NavigatorID 接口包含有关浏览器的标识方法和属性。

trans-unit.source: The NavigatorLanguage.languages read-only property returns an array of DOMStrings representing the user's preferred languages. The language is described using BCP 47 language tags. In the returned array they are ordered by preference with the most preferred language first.
trans-unit.target: 所述 NavigatorLanguage.languages 只读属性返回的数组 DOMString 代表中国用户的首选语言。使用BCP 47语言标记来描述该语言。在返回的数组中，它们按优先级排序，最优先使用的语言优先。

trans-unit.source: The NavigatorLanguage.languages read-only property returns an array of DOMStrings representing the user's preferred languages. The language is described using BCP 47 language tags. In the returned array they are ordered by preference with the most preferred language first.
The NavigatorOnLine interface contains methods and properties related to the connectivity status of the browser.
trans-unit.target: 该 NavigatorOnLine 接口包含与浏览器的连接状态的方法和属性。

trans-unit.source: The NavigatorPluginsmixin adds to the Navigator interface methods and properties for discovering and interacting with plugins installed into the browser.
trans-unit.target: 该 NavigatorPlugins 混入增加了 Navigator 界面的方法和属性用于发现和安装到浏览器插件交互。

trans-unit.source: The NavigatorStorage.storage read-only property returns the singleton StorageManager object used to access the overall storage capabilities of the browser for the current site or app. The returned object lets you examine and configure persistence of data stores and learn approximately how much more space your browser has available for local storage use.
trans-unit.target: 该 NavigatorStorage.storage 只读属性返回单一 StorageManager 用于访问浏览器的整体存储能力为当前网站或应用程序对象。返回的对象使您可以检查和配置数据存储的持久性，并大致了解浏览器还有多少空间可用于本地存储。

trans-unit.source: The NetworkInformation.rtt read-only property returns the estimated effective round-trip time of the current connection, rounded to the nearest multiple of 25 milliseconds. This value is based on recently observed application-layer RTT measurements across recently active connections. It excludes connections made to a private address space. If no recent measurement data is available, the value is based on the properties of the underlying connection technology.
trans-unit.target: 该 NetworkInformation.rtt 只读属性返回当前连接的估计有效的往返时间，四舍五入到25毫秒的最接近倍数。该值基于最近观察到的跨最近活动连接的应用层RTT测量。它不包括与专用地址空间的连接。如果没有最新的测量数据，则该值基于基础连接技术的属性。

trans-unit.source: The NetworkInformation.type read-only property returns the type of connection a device is using to communicate with the network.
trans-unit.target: 所述 NetworkInformation.type 只读属性返回一个设备使用与所述网络进行通信的连接的类型。

trans-unit.source: The NetworkInformation interface provides information about the connection a device is using to communicate with the network and provides a means for scripts to be notified if the connection type changes. The NetworkInformation interfaces cannot be instantiated. It is instead accessed through the connection property of the Navigator interface.
trans-unit.target: 所述 NetworkInformation 接口提供有关设备使用与所述网络进行通信的连接信息，并提供一个装置，用于如果连接类型改变要通知的脚本。该 NetworkInformation 接口不能被实例化。而是通过 Navigator 界面的 connection 属性访问它。

trans-unit.source: The Node.appendChild() method adds a node to the end of the list of children of a specified parent node. If the given child is a reference to an existing node in the document, appendChild() moves it from its current position to the new position (there is no requirement to remove the node from its parent node before appending it to some other node).
trans-unit.target: 所述 Node.appendChild() 方法增加了一个节点到指定的父节点的孩子的列表的末尾。如果给定的子对象是对文档中现有节点的引用，则 appendChild() 会将其从其当前位置移动到新位置（不需要将其从其父节点中移除，然后再将其附加到其他节点）。

trans-unit.source: The Node.baseURI read-only property returns the absolute base URL of a node.
trans-unit.target: 该 Node.baseURI 只读属性返回一个节点的绝对基准URL。

trans-unit.source: The Node.childNodes read-only property returns a live NodeList of child nodes of the given element where the first child node is assigned index 0.
trans-unit.target: 该 Node.childNodes 只读属性返回现场 NodeList 子的 nodes 给定元素，其中第一子节点分配指标0。

trans-unit.source: The Node.compareDocumentPosition() method compares the position of the current node against another node in any other document.
trans-unit.target: 所述 Node.compareDocumentPosition() 方法比较针对任何其他文件中的另一节点的当前节点的位置。

trans-unit.source: The Node.firstChild read-only property returns the node's first child in the tree, or null if the node has no children. If the node is a Document, it returns the first node in the list of its direct children.
trans-unit.target: 该 Node.firstChild 只读树属性返回该节点的第一个孩子，或者 null ，如果该节点没有孩子。如果该节点是 Document ，则返回其直接子级列表中的第一个节点。

trans-unit.source: The Node.hasChildNodes() method returns a Boolean value indicating whether the current Node has child nodes or not.
trans-unit.target: 所述 Node.hasChildNodes() 方法返回一个布尔值，它指示是否当前 Node 有子节点或没有。

trans-unit.source: The Node.insertBefore() method inserts a node before the reference node as a child of a specified parent node. If the given child is a reference to an existing node in the document, insertBefore() moves it from its current position to the new position (there is no requirement to remove the node from its parent node before appending it to some other node).
trans-unit.target: 所述 Node.insertBefore() 方法作为插入指定的父节点的子节点的参考节点之前的节点。如果给定的子对象是对文档中现有节点的引用，则 insertBefore() 将其从其当前位置移动到新位置（在将其附加到其他节点之前，无需从其父节点中删除该节点）。

trans-unit.source: The Node.isEqualNode() method tests whether two nodes are equal. Two nodes are equal when they have the same type, defining characteristics (for elements, this would be their ID, number of children, and so forth), its attributes match, and so on. The specific set of data points that must match varies depending on the types of the nodes.
trans-unit.target: 所述 Node.isEqualNode() 方法测试是否两个节点是相等的。当两个节点具有相同的类型，定义特征（对于元素来说，这是它们的ID，子代数等），其属性匹配等时，两个节点是相等的。必须匹配的特定数据点集因节点类型而异。

trans-unit.source: The Node.isSameNode() method tests whether two nodes are the same, that is if they reference the same object.
trans-unit.target: 所述 Node.isSameNode() 方法测试是否两个节点是相同的，也就是如果它们引用同一个对象。

trans-unit.source: The Node.isSupported()returns a Boolean flag containing the result of a test whether the DOM implementation implements a specific feature and this feature is supported by the specific node.
trans-unit.target: 所述 Node.isSupported() 返回一个 Boolean 包含测试是否DOM实现实现特定特征的结果标志，此功能是由特定节点支持。

trans-unit.source: The Node.lastChild read-only property returns the last child of the node. If its parent is an element, then the child is generally an element node, a text node, or a comment node. It returns null if there are no child elements.
trans-unit.target: 该 Node.lastChild 只读属性返回节点的最后一个孩子。如果其父元素是元素，则子元素通常是元素节点，文本节点或注释节点。如果没有子元素，则返回 null 。

trans-unit.source: The Node.localName read-only property returns the local part of the qualified name of this node.
trans-unit.target: 该 Node.localName 只读属性返回此节点限定名称的本地部分。

trans-unit.source: The Node.lookupNamespaceURI() method accepts a prefix and returns the namespace URI associated with it on the given node if found (and null if not). Supplying null for the prefix will return the default namespace.
trans-unit.target: 所述 Node.lookupNamespaceURI() 方法接受的前缀，并返回如果找到（和与它在给定节点上的URI相关联的命名空间 null 如果不）。为前缀提供 null 将返回默认名称空间。

trans-unit.source: The Node.lookupPrefix() method returns a DOMString containing the prefix for a given namespace URI, if present, and null if not. When multiple prefixes are possible, the result is implementation-dependent.
trans-unit.target: 所述 Node.lookupPrefix() 方法返回一个 DOMString 包含给定的命名空间URI的前缀，如果存在，和 null 如果不是。当可能有多个前缀时，结果取决于实现。

trans-unit.source: The Node.namespaceURI read-only property returns the namespace URI of the node, or null if the node is not in a namespace. When the node is a document, it returns the XML namespace for the current document.
trans-unit.target: 该 Node.namespaceURI 只读属性返回节点的名称空间URI，或者 null 如果该节点不在命名空间。当节点是文档时，它返回当前文档的XML名称空间。

trans-unit.source: The Node.nextSibling read-only property returns the node immediately following the specified one in their parent's childNodes, or returns null if the specified node is the last child in the parent element.
trans-unit.target: 该 Node.nextSibling 只读属性返回的节点立即按照他们的父母的指定一个 childNodes ，或者返回 null ，如果指定的节点是在父元素的最后一个孩子。

trans-unit.source: The Node.nodeName read-only property returns the name of the current node as a string.
trans-unit.target: 该 Node.nodeName 只读属性返回当前节点作为字符串的名称。

trans-unit.source: The Node.nodeValue property returns or sets the value of the current node.
trans-unit.target: 所述 Node.nodeValue 属性返回或设置当前节点的值。

trans-unit.source: The Node.normalize() method puts the specified node and all of its sub-tree into a "normalized" form. In a normalized sub-tree, no text nodes in the sub-tree are empty and there are no adjacent text nodes.
trans-unit.target: 所述 Node.normalize() 方法将指定的节点和所有它的子树的成“归一化”的形式。在规范化的子树中，子树中没有文本节点为空，并且没有相邻的文本节点。

trans-unit.source: The Node.ownerDocument read-only property returns the top-level document object for this node.
trans-unit.target: 该 Node.ownerDocument 只读属性返回此节点的顶层文档对象。

trans-unit.source: The Node.parentElement read-only property returns the DOM node's parent Element, or null if the node either has no parent, or its parent isn't a DOM Element.
trans-unit.target: 该 Node.parentElement 只读属性返回DOM节点的父 Element ，或者 null ，如果节点要么没有父，或其父是不是一个DOM Element 。

trans-unit.source: The Node.parentNode read-only property returns the parent of the specified node in the DOM tree.
trans-unit.target: 该 Node.parentNode 只读属性返回DOM树指定节点的父。

trans-unit.source: The Node.prefix read-only property returns the namespace prefix of the specified node, or null if no prefix is specified.
trans-unit.target: 该 Node.prefix 只读属性返回指定节点的命名空间前缀，或 null ，如果未指定任何前缀。

trans-unit.source: The Node.previousSibling read-only property returns the node immediately preceding the specified one in its parent's childNodes list, or null if the specified node is the first in that list.
trans-unit.target: 该 Node.previousSibling 只读属性返回的节点立即指定一个在其父的前面 childNodes 列表，或 null 如果指定的节点是在该列表中的第一个。

trans-unit.source: The Node.removeChild() method removes a child node from the DOM. Returns removed node.
trans-unit.target: 所述 Node.removeChild() 方法去除从DOM的子节点。返回删除的节点。

trans-unit.source: The Node.rootNode read-only property returns a Node object representing the topmost node in the tree, or the current node if it's the topmost node in the tree. This is found by walking backward along Node.parentNode until the top is reached.
trans-unit.target: 该 Node.rootNode 只读属性返回一个 Node 代表在树中最顶层的节点对象，或者当前的节点，如果它在树中的最顶层节点。这是通过沿 Node.parentNode 向后走直到到达顶部来发现的。

trans-unit.source: The Node.textContent property represents the text content of a node and its descendants. However, it is very different from the confusable innerText property.
trans-unit.target: 该 Node.textContent 属性表示一个节点及其后代的文本内容。但是，它与可混淆的 innerText 属性有很大不同。

trans-unit.source: The NodeIterator.nextNode() method returns the next node in the set represented by the NodeIterator and advances the position of the iterator within the set. The first call to nextNode() returns the first node in the set.
trans-unit.target: 所述 NodeIterator.nextNode() 方法返回在由表示该组中的下一个节点 NodeIterator 并且使集合内的迭代器的位置。首次调用 nextNode() 会返回集合中的第一个节点。

trans-unit.source: The NodeIterator.previousNode() method returns the previous node in the set represented by the NodeIterator and moves the position of the iterator backwards within the set.
trans-unit.target: 所述 NodeIterator.previousNode() 方法返回集合中的先前节点表示由 NodeIterator 并移动集合内的迭代器向后的位置。

trans-unit.source: The NodeIterator.root read-only property represents the Node that is the root of what the NodeIterator traverses.
trans-unit.target: 该 NodeIterator.root 只读属性表示 Node 是什么的根本 NodeIterator 横梁。

trans-unit.source: The NodeList.entries() method returns an iterator allowing to go through all key/value pairs contained in this object. The values are Node objects.
trans-unit.target: 所述 NodeList.entries() 方法返回的 iterator 允许经过包含在该对象中的所有键/值对。值是 Node 对象。

trans-unit.source: The NodeList.keys() method returns an iterator allowing to go through all keys contained in this object. The keys are unsigned integer.
trans-unit.target: 该 NodeList.keys() 方法返回一个 iterator ，允许通过所有按键包含在此对象。键是 unsigned integer 。

trans-unit.source: The NodeList.values() method returns an iterator allowing to go through all values contained in this object. The values are Node objects.
trans-unit.target: 所述 NodeList.values() 方法返回的 iterator 允许经过所有的值包含在该对象。值是 Node 对象。

trans-unit.source: The NonDocumentTypeChildNode.nextElementSibling read-only property returns the element immediately following the specified one in its parent's children list, or null if the specified element is the last one in the list.
trans-unit.target: 该 NonDocumentTypeChildNode.nextElementSibling 只读属性返回元素紧跟在其父的孩子名单，或指定一个 null 如果指定的元素是最后一个在列表中。

trans-unit.source: The NonDocumentTypeChildNode.previousElementSibling read-only property returns the Element immediately prior to the specified one in its parent's children list, or null if the specified element is the first one in the list.
trans-unit.target: 该 NonDocumentTypeChildNode.previousElementSibling 只读属性返回 Element 之前立即指定一个在其父的孩子名单，或 null 如果指定的元素是列表中的第一个。

trans-unit.source: The NonDocumentTypeChildNode interface contains methods that are particular to Node objects that can have a parent, but not suitable for DocumentType.
trans-unit.target: 所述 NonDocumentTypeChildNode 接口包含特定于方法 Node ，可以有一个父，但不适合于对象 DocumentType 。

trans-unit.source: The Notification() constructor creates a new Notification object instance, which represents a user notification.
trans-unit.target: 的 Notification() 构造函数创建一个新的 Notification 对象实例，其表示用户通知。

trans-unit.source: The OES_element_index_uint extension is part of the WebGL API and adds support for gl.UNSIGNED_INT types to WebGLRenderingContext.drawElements().
trans-unit.target: 所述 OES_element_index_uint 扩展是的一部分的WebGL API并增加了对支持 gl.UNSIGNED_INT 类型 WebGLRenderingContext.drawElements() 。

trans-unit.source: The OES_standard_derivatives extension is part of the WebGL API and adds the GLSL derivative functions dFdx, dFdy, and fwidth.
trans-unit.target: 所述 OES_standard_derivatives 扩展是的一部分的WebGL API，并增加了GLSL衍生物功能 dFdx ， dFdy ，和 fwidth 。

trans-unit.source: The OES_texture_float_linear extension is part of the WebGL API and allows linear filtering with floating-point pixel types for textures.
trans-unit.target: 所述 OES_texture_float_linear 扩展是的一部分的WebGL API，并允许线性与浮点像素类型的纹理滤波。

trans-unit.source: The OES_texture_half_float extension is part of the WebGL API and adds texture formats with 16- (aka half float) and 32-bit floating-point components.
trans-unit.target: 所述 OES_texture_half_float 扩展是的一部分的WebGL API，并增加了纹理格式与16-（又名半浮点）和32位浮点部件。

trans-unit.source: The OES_texture_half_float_linear extension is part of the WebGL API and allows linear filtering with half floating-point pixel types for textures.
trans-unit.target: 所述 OES_texture_half_float_linear 扩展是的一部分的WebGL API，并允许线性与半浮点像素类型的纹理滤波。

trans-unit.source: The OfflineAudioCompletionEvent() constructor of the Web Audio API creates a new OfflineAudioCompletionEvent object instance.
trans-unit.target: Web Audio API的 OfflineAudioCompletionEvent() 构造函数创建一个新的 OfflineAudioCompletionEvent 对象实例。

trans-unit.source: The OfflineAudioContext() constructor—part of the Web Audio API—creates and returns a new OfflineAudioContext object instance, which can then be used to render audio to an AudioBuffer rather than to an audio output device.
trans-unit.target: 所述 OfflineAudioContext() 的构造的部分网络音频API -创建并返回一个新的 OfflineAudioContext 对象实例，其然后可以被用于呈现音频到 AudioBuffer 而不是一个音频输出装置。

trans-unit.source: The OffscreenCanvas() constructor returns a newly instantiated OffscreenCanvas object.
trans-unit.target: 该 OffscreenCanvas() 构造函数返回一个新实例 OffscreenCanvas 对象。

trans-unit.source: The PannerNode() constructor of the Web Audio API creates a new PannerNode object instance.
trans-unit.target: Web Audio API的 PannerNode() 构造函数创建一个新的 PannerNode 对象实例。

trans-unit.source: The PannerNode interface represents the position and behavior of an audio source signal in 3D space, allowing you to create complex panning effects.
trans-unit.target: 该 PannerNode 接口表示在3D空间中的音频信号源，使您可以创建复杂的声像效果的位置和行为。

trans-unit.source: The ParentNode.childElementCount read-only property returns an unsigned long representing the number of child elements of the given element.
trans-unit.target: 该 ParentNode.childElementCount 只读属性返回一个 unsigned long 表示给定元素的子元素的数量。

trans-unit.source: The ParentNode.lastElementChild read-only property returns the object's last child Element or null if there are no child elements.
trans-unit.target: 该 ParentNode.lastElementChild 只读属性返回对象的最后一个子 Element 或 null ，如果没有子元素。

trans-unit.source: The ParentNode mixin contains methods and properties that are common to all types of Node objects that can have children. It's implemented by Element, Document, and DocumentFragment objects.
trans-unit.target: 该 ParentNode 混入包含适用于所有类型的方法和属性 Node ，可以有子对象。它由 Element ， Document 和 DocumentFragment 对象实现。

trans-unit.source: The Path2D() constructor returns a newly instantiated Path2D object, optionally with another path as an argument (creates a copy), or optionally with a string consisting of SVG path data.
trans-unit.target: 所述 Path2D() 构造函数返回一个新实例化的 Path2D 对象，任选地与另一条路径作为参数（创建一个副本），或任选地用由一串SVG路径数据。

trans-unit.source: The Path2D.addPath() method of the Canvas 2D API adds to the path the path given by the argument.
trans-unit.target: Canvas 2D API 的 Path2D .addPath() 方法将参数指定的路径添加到路径中。

trans-unit.source: The PaymentDetailsBase dictionary is a mixin used by the PaymentDetailsInit and PaymentDetailsUpdate dictionaries. It is never directly used by developers and is included here only to be used as the basis for those documents.
trans-unit.target: 所述 PaymentDetailsBase 词典是由所使用的一个混合 PaymentDetailsInit 和 PaymentDetailsUpdate 字典。开发人员永远不会直接使用它，此处仅将其用作这些文档的基础。

trans-unit.source: The PaymentDetailsUpdate dictionary is used to provide updated information to the payment user interface after it has been instantiated. This can be done either by calling the PaymentRequestUpdateEvent.updateWith() method or by using the PaymentRequest.show() method's detailsPromise parameter to provide a Promise that returns a PaymentDetailsUpdate that updates the payment information before the user interface is even enabled for the first time.
trans-unit.target: 该 PaymentDetailsUpdate 字典用于提供更新的信息到支付的用户界面已被实例化后。可以通过调用 PaymentRequestUpdateEvent.updateWith() 方法或使用 PaymentRequest.show() 方法的 detailsPromise 参数来提供一个 Promise ，该Promise返回一个 PaymentDetailsUpdate ，该更新甚至在首次启用用户界面之前更新付款信息。 。

trans-unit.source: The PaymentValidationErrors dictionary represents objects providing information about any and all errors that occurred while processing a payment request. When validation of the PaymentResponse returned by the PaymentRequest.show() or PaymentResponse.retry() methods fails, your code creates a PaymentValidationErrors object to pass into retry() so that the user agent knows what needs to be fixed and what if any error messages to display to the user.
trans-unit.target: 该 PaymentValidationErrors 字典代表提供有关任何信息的对象，并在处理支付请求出现的所有错误。当验证 PaymentResponse 返回由 PaymentRequest.show() 或 PaymentResponse.retry() 方法失败，您的代码创建一个 PaymentValidationErrors 对象传递到 retry() 从而使用户代理知道需要修正什么，什么，如果任何错误消息显示给用户。

trans-unit.source: The PeriodicWave() constructor of the Web Audio API creates a new PeriodicWave object instance.
trans-unit.target: Web Audio API的 PeriodicWave() 构造函数创建一个新的 PeriodicWave 对象实例。

trans-unit.source: The Position.coords read-only property, a Coordinates object, represents a geographic attitude: it contains the location, that is longitude and latitude on the Earth, the altitude, and the speed of the object concerned, regrouped inside the returned value. It also contains accuracy information about these values.
trans-unit.target: 该 Position.coords 只读属性，一个 Coordinates 对象，代表一个地域的态度：它包含的位置，即经度和纬度地球，海拔高度，以及有关物体的速度，返回值内重组上。它还包含有关这些值的准确性信息。

trans-unit.source: The Position.timestamp read-only property, a DOMTimeStamp object, represents the date and the time of the creation of the Position object it belongs to. The precision is to the millisecond.
trans-unit.target: 该 Position.timestamp 只读属性，一个 DOMTimeStamp 对象，代表日期和创建的时间 Position 是属于对象。精度为毫秒。

trans-unit.source: The PositionError.code read-only property is an unsigned short representing the error code. The following values are possible:
trans-unit.target: 所述 PositionError.code 只读属性是一个 unsigned short 表示错误代码。可能有以下值：

trans-unit.source: The PositionError.message read-only property returns a human-readable DOMString describing the details of the error.
trans-unit.target: 该 PositionError.message 只读属性返回一个人类可读的 DOMString 描述错误的详细信息。

trans-unit.source: The PositionOptions.enableHighAccuracy property is a Boolean that indicates the application would like to receive the best possible results. If true and if the device is able to provide a more accurate position, it will do so. Note that this can result in slower response times or increased power consumption (with a GPS chip on a mobile device for example). On the other hand, if false (the default value), the device can take the liberty to save resources by responding more quickly and/or using less power.
trans-unit.target: 该 PositionOptions.enableHighAccuracy 属性是一个 Boolean ，指示应用程序想获得最好的结果。如果为 true ,并且设备能够提供更准确的位置，则它将这样做。请注意，这可能导致响应时间变慢或功耗增加（例如，在移动设备上使用GPS芯片）。另一方面，如果为 false （默认值），则设备可以通过更快地响应和/或使用更少的功率来自由地节省资源。

trans-unit.source: The PositionOptions.maximumAge property is a positive long value indicating the maximum age in milliseconds of a possible cached position that is acceptable to return. If set to 0, it means that the device cannot use a cached position and must attempt to retrieve the real current position. If set to Infinity the device must return a cached position regardless of its age.
trans-unit.target: 所述 PositionOptions.maximumAge 属性是正 long 值，指示在能够接受的返回的可能的缓存位置的毫秒的最长期限。如果设置为 0 ，则意味着设备无法使用缓存的位置，必须尝试检索实际的当前位置。如果设置为 Infinity ,则设备必须返回缓存的位置，而不管其寿命如何。

trans-unit.source: The PositionOptions.timeout property is a positive long value representing the maximum length of time (in milliseconds) the device is allowed to take in order to return a position. The default value is Infinity, meaning that getCurrentPosition() won't return until the position is available.
trans-unit.target: 所述 PositionOptions.timeout 属性是正 long 表示的时间的最大长度（以毫秒为单位）的设备被允许采取以返回一个位置值。默认值为 Infinity ，这意味着 getCurrentPosition() 在该位置可用之前不会返回。

trans-unit.source: The ProgressEvent() constructor returns a newly created ProgressEvent, representing the current completion of a long process.
trans-unit.target: 所述 ProgressEvent() 构造函数返回一个新创建的 ProgressEvent ，代表一个漫长的过程的当前完成。

trans-unit.source: The ProgressEvent.lengthComputable read-only property is a Boolean flag indicating if the resource concerned by the ProgressEvent has a length that can be calculated. If not, the ProgressEvent.total property has no significant value.
trans-unit.target: 该 ProgressEvent.lengthComputable 只读属性是一个 Boolean ，指示是否由有关资源标志 ProgressEvent 有一个可以计算的长度。如果不是，那么 ProgressEvent.total 属性没有重大价值。

trans-unit.source: The ProgressEvent.loaded read-only property is an integer representing the amount of work already performed by the underlying process. The ratio of work done can be calculated with the property and ProgressEvent.total. When downloading a resource using HTTP, this only represent the part of the content itself, not headers and other overhead.
trans-unit.target: 所述 ProgressEvent.loaded 只读属性是表示已经通过基础过程所执行的工作的量的整数。可以使用property和 ProgressEvent.total 计算完成的工作比例。使用HTTP下载资源时，这仅代表内容本身的一部分，而不代表标头和其他开销。

trans-unit.source: The ProgressEvent.total read-only property is an integer representing the total amount of work that the underlying process is in the progress of performing. When downloading a resource using HTTP, this only represent the content itself, not headers and other overhead.
trans-unit.target: 所述 ProgressEvent.total 只读属性是表示工作的总量，该基本过程是在执行的进程的整数。使用HTTP下载资源时，这仅代表内容本身，而不代表标头和其他开销。

trans-unit.source: The PromiseRejectionEvent() constructor returns a newly created PromiseRejectionEvent, which represents events fired when a JavaScript Promise is rejected. With promise rejection events, it becomes possible to detect and report promises which fail and whose failures go unnoticed. It also becomes easier to write a global handler for errors.
trans-unit.target: 该 PromiseRejectionEvent() 构造函数返回一个新创建的 PromiseRejectionEvent ，这代表当一个JavaScript事件解雇 Promise 被拒绝。通过承诺拒绝事件，可以检测和报告失败且未引起注意的承诺。为错误编写全局处理程序也变得更加容易。

trans-unit.source: The PublicKeyCredential interface provides information about a public key / private key pair. It inherits from Credential, and was created by the Web Authentication API extension to the Credential Management API. Other interfaces that inherit from Credential are PasswordCredential and FederatedCredential.
trans-unit.target: 该 PublicKeyCredential 接口提供了关于公钥/私钥对信息。它继承自 Credential ，由Web身份验证API扩展到凭据管理API创建。从 Credential 继承的其他接口是 PasswordCredential 和 FederatedCredential 。

trans-unit.source: The PushEvent() constructor creates a new PushEvent object. Note that the this constructor is exposed only to a service worker context.
trans-unit.target: 该 PushEvent() 构造函数创建一个新的 PushEvent 对象。请注意，此构造方法仅公开给服务工作者上下文。

trans-unit.source: The PushMessageData interface of the Push API provides methods which let you retrieve the push data sent by a server in various formats.
trans-unit.target: Push API的 PushMessageData 接口提供了一些方法，使您可以检索服务器以各种格式发送的推送数据。

trans-unit.source: The RTCAnswerOptions dictionary is used to provide optional settings when creating an SDP answer using RTCPeerConnection.createOffer() after receiving an offer from a remote peer. The createOffer() method's options parameter is of this type.
trans-unit.target: 在从远程对等方收到要约后，使用 RTCPeerConnection.createOffer() 创建SDP答复时，可使用 RTCAnswerOptions 词典提供可选设置。该 createOffer() 方法的 options 参数就是这种类型的。

trans-unit.source: The RTCDTMFToneChangeEvent() constructor creates a new RTCDTMFToneChangeEvent.
trans-unit.target: 该 RTCDTMFToneChangeEvent() 构造函数创建一个新的 RTCDTMFToneChangeEvent 。

trans-unit.source: The RTCDataChannel.close() method closes the RTCDataChannel. Either peer is permitted to call this method to initiate closure of the channel.
trans-unit.target: 所述 RTCDataChannel.close() 方法关闭 RTCDataChannel 。允许任何一个对等方调用此方法来启动通道关闭。

trans-unit.source: The RTCDataChannel.close() method closes the RTCDataChannel. Either peer is permitted to call this method to initiate closure of the channel.
trans-unit.target: 所述 RTCDataChannel.close() 方法关闭 RTCDataChannel 。允许任何一个对等方调用此方法来启动通道关闭。

trans-unit.source: The RTCDataChannel.onclose property is an EventHandler which specifies a function to be called by the browser when the close event is received by the RTCDataChannel. This is a simple Event which indicates that the data channel has closed down.
trans-unit.target: 所述 RTCDataChannel.onclose 属性是一个 EventHandler 指定的功能通过在浏览器被称为 close 由接收到的事件 RTCDataChannel 。这是一个简单的 Event ，表明数据通道已关闭。

trans-unit.source: The RTCDataChannel.onclose property is an EventHandler which specifies a function to be called by the browser when the close event is received by the RTCDataChannel. This is a simple Event which indicates that the data channel has closed down.
trans-unit.target: 所述 RTCDataChannel.onclose 属性是一个 EventHandler 指定的功能通过在浏览器被称为 close 由接收到的事件 RTCDataChannel 。这是一个简单的 Event ，表明数据通道已关闭。

trans-unit.source: The RTCDataChannel.onerror property is an EventHandler which specifies a function to be called when the error event is received. When an error occurs on the data channel, the function receives as input an ErrorEvent object describing the error which occurred.
